If I don't reach my goal of $3000, my personal savings will be drained. This comes at a time which I do not have any other income or a "day job" to resume after the mission.




The Impact
Funding me generously means that I will proceed with confidence. Every six months, I will return to Ghana. Each time I will recruit, train, and manage yet another team of competent professionals in IT, education, and project management to deploy 100 more desktops.
Even though we are deploying 100 desktops, 1000s of lives will be touched as this is the only source of technology for their children and their families.
By using Free Software, we save money for Computer Reach and the program recipients by using non-proprietary software. This insures no surprise
We are giving the very best in software in education. I deployed Carnegie Mellon School of Computer Science's first Free Software computer lab. This "FREE" software is the best for students because they have access to source code to study, build upon, and redistribute.
 


Other Ways You Can Help
All well-wishers are invited to participate, even if you cannot help with this campaign today.

Please help us get out the word through your social network.
The Computer Reach team will keep in constant contact regarding the status of Ghana via a mailing list. Sign up link coming soon.
There will be a bon-voyage party in Pittsburgh PA on October 8. RSVP here.

story:
Hello Indiegogo Folks, Buenos Dias, Bonjour, and welcome all to Angry Clubs !

Who are we ?

Like the 3 Musketeers, The Angry Clubs team is comprised of four individuals, but contrary to our French forefathers, we all from different countries: 2 Hispanic Americans, 1 French American and 1 Franco-British American (that would be me), hence the greetings.

We come from all walks of life, but have one thing in common...our love of Golf. We don’t play Golf…we are Golfers, and as you may not know, there is a huge difference between both.

Our Idea :

6 months ago I was having a business lunch with one of my (future partners), when during the conversation I “jokingly” threw at him, that I had an idea for a golf gadget, which I thought every relative or friend would love to offer their golfing relatives or friends.

A week later we were on the drawing board to see how we could move my (theoretical) idea to a practical one.

Did you know that last year golfers spent over $72 billion (yes that’s right, 9 zeros) on golf-related products.

There are unfortunately no statistics telling us how much of that money was spent by golfers who had to replace clubs they had broken or thrown into different hazards.

But from my (first-hand) experience, it has got to be several $millions.

Have I ever broken a $300 dollar driver out of pure disgust after a G**awful drive……Youbetcha! Once or twice…

 
And seeing my friends and so many golfers doing the same thing (and sometimes way worse) got me thinking.

There had to be a better, cheaper and why not funnier solution to breaking or throwing hundreds of dollars of equipment in the Golf courses woods or lakes.

So why not invent a Gadget which would allow us poor masochists (you have to be to play golf seriously) to vent all that anger and frustration we feel, without it not only costing us an arm and leg, but also getting a good laughout of all parties present ?

For example, If you go onto youtube and type in “golf clubs thrown into lakes”, you will be surprised to see that, when a golfer throws or breaks his club, it invariably generates hilarious laughter from his playing partners.

Angry Clubs should also make the “culprit” laugh too! And that’s no mean feat! After all let’s face it, all we are trying to do is hit a small ball into a small hole with a stick ! How complicated can that be?   

From Theory to Reality :

So any way we started brainstorming to see how we create an Angry Clubs (I had already trademarked the name and reserved the domain name) which would not only be a fun gadget, but would also be useful and above all, affordable enough to warrant the interest  of hundreds of millions of potential customers.

That is when I realized that like a puzzle, all the pieces were there, we just had to place them in their right spots.

We made our first prototype, for which we filed a utility patent 2 months ago, and this is the result:

We have in the meantime made small alterations to make both the Angry Clubs itself as well as the Angry Clubs Putter Grip (a version of the Angry Club that can be adapted to any putter) even better, but the main concept remains the same.

We then decided it was time to show our prototype to a design specialist so that he might optimize the Angry Clubs and putter grip, making it amongst other things slimmer and better looking.

We knew that we had a great name trademarked, but needed to have a great logo created, so gave it to one of our graphic designer friends, who did what I think is, a great job.

Here is the result and this is what the first Angry Clubs will look like when they will reach the market in March 2013 :

Our Target Market :

You will probably think I am as mad as a hatter, if I told you it’s not really the golfers themselves.

It’s mostly true, because I would not necessarily buy it for myself, but I would buy one for my dear friend Sam, who lives in Rhode Island (Yup Sam, I already have one of the first ones reserved for you) , and I can guarantee you that my wife or my daughter would buy one for me (if I weren’t the inventor of the Angry Clubs of course).

You don’t believe me?

All you need to do is find a golfer friend, and ask any of their relatives (especially his wife or her husband) if they don’t think that this would be perfect gift for Father’s/Mother’s day, birthday or Christmas present?

Don’t forget to mention that The Angry Clubs should retail for less than $50 compared to the average ordinary Swing trainer which costs $70-$120.

Our “Problem” :

  • How do we get our first batch of Angry Clubs manufactured ?
  • How do we get the message out to the probably over ½ billion relatives and friends of the 60 million golfers in the world?
  • How do we communicate with the 17,000 Golf club presidents in the US alone, who organize over 400,000 tournaments a year ?

Our “Solution” :

HELLO Indiegogo community...that’s where (we hope) you come in!

You can help us make it happen!

You have done it before many times, and we hope that our enthusiasm and passion for our project will entice you to do it again, for and with us.

We already have secured 3 potential manufacturers and shown them our current working prototype, explained them the technology we want to use as well as the final design that we want for the product.

If we are fortunate enough to receive your support, the promise I will make to you, is that every cent of your funds will go into ordering a first batch of 5000 Angry Clubs, which will be presented and introduced to the Market at the PGA Merchandise Show at Orlando (we already have reserved the booth), January 2013.

29 million golfers in the US is great, but there are as many in the rest of the world, so why not cater to their needs too? We will be presenting the Angry Clubs at the Rhein Golf Messe in Koeln, Germany beginning of March and at the China Golf Show in Beijing end of March 2013.

USA, Europe and Asia, all our bases are covered.

All I need now is “a little help from my friends” as John and Paul would say (I hope you are a Beatles fan, otherwise I might have lost you on that one)

That having been said, I wanted to tell you all, that whatever your eventual pledge (or non pledge) there is one thing you have already given us :

A dream…and that’s already pretty cool !

So for that, and the rest... thank you !

Patrick
ANGRY CLUBS
 
N.B : Please note that due to patent applications and  proprietary technology reasons, we have not illustrated some unique components pertaining to our Angry Clubs. The Angry Clubs is now trademarked and has a website under construction http://www.angryclubs.com. Utility patents have been filed for both the Angry Clubs and the Angry Clubs Putter Grip.

story:
Hi! 

My name is Brad Reifinger.  I was born with a genetic disorder called Marfan Syndrome.  Many researchers believe that President Lincoln had this disorder.  There is no cure and those who have it must deal with problems as they occur.  Eventual complications related to previous open-heart sugery caused by Marfan Syndrome took the life of my brother Todd in 1998 at the age of 37.  In 1999, I had a human donor aortic valve replacement open-heart surgery.  In 2008, I needed to have this valve re-replaced with an artificial aortic valve when the first one wore out.  This was also an open-heart procedure.  In 2010, I had an aortic dissection type B.  This is what killed the actor, John Ritter, of Three's Company and 8 Simple Rules fame.  I survived this and have been treated with various medications until now.  I have developed an aneurysm as a result of the aortic dissection type B.  This will require a 3rd serious heart surgery to repair.  The open heart surgery I had in 2008 was shortly before my 4 year old daughter, Saffirin, was born.  My wife had a full-time management job and I was a Red Cross Certified Swimming Instructor.

  Since then, my wife was laid off from her job and went back to school, vowing never to be laid off again.  She finished her pre-requisites and is currently enrolled in St. Luke's School of Nursing, pursuing her RN license.  She will not graduate, however, until December 2013.  I am Saffirin's primary caretaker, since we decided that child care costs would pretty much wash out my salary as a Certified Swimming Instructor.  While I have insurance coverage for the surgery, there is going to be a ton of medical related expenses and other out-of-pocket costs associated with my surgery and recovery process.  I know from the aftermath of my previous surgery (and this upcoming surgery will be the most complicated of the collective heart procedures I have had) that expenses will be severe.  We are not in the same position to combat these costs as we were in 2008, due to my wife's layoff.  I know many people are struggling right now, and serious medical problems are rough.  My wife and I have given to various friends and/or their children throughout the years when medical situations have arisen and now this is what my family needs at this time.  If a lot of people give a little, it will greatly help our family get through this time of difficulty.  My surgery is on August 2nd, but I am starting this campaign now, so we can prepare for the storm of costs we will encounter during my recovery and rehab.  Thank you so much for your consideration and your support and God bless!!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Elijah Harter and I am a husband and father of three children. I volunteered in my community to help coach baseball, soccer, and football. Since my diagnosis I am unable to continue this time commitment. My wife Amy and I have been together for almost twenty years. My son Tony "Tee" plays football, basketball, and soccer. My daughter Sarah nicknamed "Sarge" loves soccer and is her teams goalie, she is also part of the art and science clubs at her middle school. My youngest son William can only be described as a young MegaMind from the movie. He is a smart seven year old that hopefully will use his powers for good.

I am able to still work and run a retail store for the outdoor company The North Face. This is a great company that follows my sustainability beliefs and looks to help preserve our outdoor playgrounds. That brings me to my hobbies. I really enjoy the outdoors. I love to hike and do moderate bouldering. Unfortunately my cancer Islocated in my entire sternum and it makes it difficult for me to breath. It also has created an irregular shaped sternum that causes me daily pain. So now I tackle smaller trails but still try to push my limits.

My most recent favorite experience was to visit the Big Basin Redwoods State Park. Here we were with our fellow peers from The North Face. We bonded and mountain biked up one of the mountains. I lost my breath several times and I was about to turn back. My good friend Brett came down the mountain about fifty feet and didn't say a word. He just grabed the bike with me holding on and walked me that last fifty feet to the top of the trail. I was so out of breath all I could do was tear up. I made it. The ride down was breathtaking.

I also love to camp and fish. Minnesota is a great area for both. I will continue to enjoy as much of the outdoors as possible. Having just come back from a family trip to the Black Hills I want to enjoy as much of my life that I can with my family and friends. I am optimistic that I will make the most of my time.

This campaign is important to me because it will help me cover my additional medical bills and hopefully make it so I can still travel with my family and enjoy the little things in life. I can not thank you for your support enough. You will help my children create life long memories with their father.

What We Need & What You Get

My medical bills are mainly for all the tests that I need to go through. They are looking to see where my bone marrow is developing holes. This requires several bone marrow biopsies about every six months. I also have skeletal surveys, cat scans, and MRI's. My least favorite is the MRI's. The clostraphobia is difficult.

I have medical insurance with The North Face and it does cover the majority of each procedure but we still need to cover 20% of each bill. The medical bills continue to get higher and will continue for the rest of my life. Each of the funds will go to cover our medical expenses and any related expenses on our credit card..

Other Ways You Can Help

We are also planning different garage sales to help raise money. Any contributions of items to these sales would also be helpful.

Also moral support is encouraged. I am a strong believer that the only way to battle cancer is to be open about it and take as much advice as possible.

story:
Help Mission Yoga be able to offer a truly transformative, relaxing and healing experience: A Premier Samadhi Floatation Center! This urban oasis will be the only one of its kind in San Francisco’s busy Mission District. 

Thank you for checking out our Indiegogo page! Help us fulfill our dream of making Mission Yoga a truly transformative experience by adding a floatation center. We believe floating, combined with Bikram Yoga and our in-house massage, will provide San Francisco’s Mission District a much-needed wellness oasis within our bustling neighborhood.

We've been floating for years, and we’re eager to share the benefits with the community. Our plan is to build the floatation center in an unused room in the studio that will not only create bliss for you, but provide us an additional revenue stream that will allow us to stay in the heart of one of America’s most expensive cities. We’ve been in San Francisco’s Mission District since 2001, and we want to stay! 

Floating is the most powerful tool for human growth and well-being since yoga. Benefits include: 

  • Reduction of Chronic Pain
  • Decrease in Stress
  • Strengthening of Immune System
  • Promoting Creative Thinking
  • Enhancing Learning
  • Calming Mind and Body
  • Speeding of Healing and Physical Recovery
  • Lowering of Blood Pressure
  • Jet lag and Fatigue Recovery
  • Aid in the Elimination of Addictions (Smoking, Alcohol Intake and Weight Loss)(Scroll down the page for more specifics on the benefits.)


What is a Floatation Tank?

Some people know it as a “sensory deprivation tank”, but that’s a misnomer, because you aren’t really “depriving” your body. You are actually placing your body in a neutral environment where your senses are heightened.

A Floatation Tank is a sound and lightproof spa in which you float effortlessly, like a cork, on the surface of 10 inches of water that is super-saturated with 800 pounds of medical grade Epsom salt. The solution is heated to the exact temperature of your skin (93.5°F), allowing your body to be perfectly supported by a cushion of silky skin-temperature liquid.


Relaxing in a floatation tank is the closest thing to feeling the weightlessness of outerspace, here on earth. It allows the user an experience of deep relaxation in an almost weightless environment, giving the body a chance to heal itself and allowing the mind to drift into the deepest state of relaxation possible.


The Experience

Floatation tanks are some of the few places on earth where you can experience your body free from the forces of gravity.

The temperature of the water means that once you are settled in the tank, it is virtually impossible to distinguish between parts of the body that are in contact with the water and those parts which are floating above the water. The effect is that it “fools” the brain into believing that you are floating in mid-air.

Every single muscle in the body is allowed to totally relax, and your brain falls into the theta wave state -- the most relaxed you can get without being asleep. With the tank’s interior lights off, the quietness and the darkness allow the mind to drift into a deep state of relaxation.


The Plan...

Funding will go towards the creation of an oasis in an urban center that is both beautiful and comfortable that needs to be sound-proof, light-proof and well-ventilated. The installation of the tank will require plumbing and electrical plus waterproofing and salt-proofing. Finally, we will need to procure salt for the tank.

The good news is we already own one tank and have access to another. We plan to install the tank in our existing yoga business with no interruption to our class schedule.

Swag, Yoga, and Massage will be available as soon as we hit our goals, the Floats will be available as soon as we complete the Float Center. (Scroll down for more details!) Our goal is to have the float center up and running by the end of the summer and our Indiegogo contributors will be among the first people to float.


About Us...

We are Steve23 and Juicy Liberty Sanchez of Mission Yoga. Together we have over 30 years in business. We're joining forces with  Shoshana Leibner of Float Dreams to create Mission Float, San Francisco's premier Samadhi tank float center located in the Heart of San Francisco’s Mission District.

The Effects of Floating...

Unparalleled Mental Calm

You may have tried other methods relaxation or meditation -- but until you've tried floating, you're missing out on an incredible experience.

A float tank creates a weightless environment in which the body is completely supported, external stimuli is reduced, and there is nothing left for the brain to do. As such, the logical side of the brain is rendered redundant and its activity slows down until it reaches a theta level. Although the user is technically awake, they will enter a “dream-like” state in which the brain begins releasing endorphins and stress hormones, like cortisol, will drop.

For many people, floating is the only way to achieve a deep level of relaxation and calm.

Physical Relief

Flotation therapy is a wonderful way to assist the body in healing itself.

The environment inside the tank allows the body to work unencumbered, bringing itself back to optimum health more effectively and efficiently than any other form of rest. The weightless environment allows your spine and muscles to stretch out and realign themselves, while the epsom salt pull toxins and lactic acids from your body, aiding in the recovery process and lifting your mood.

Flotation therapy has numerous physical benefits:

  • A refuge from chronic pain such as fibromyalgia, arthritis, and back injuries

  • Enhances athletic performance & sports rehabilitation

  • Speeds the healing process

  • Decreases the production of Cortisol, ACTH, Lactic Acid and Adrenaline

  • Improves circulation and distribution of oxygen and nutrients

Our rewards:


------------------------------------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Risks & Challenges

Our biggest concern is dealing with the San Francisco Planning Department. Fortunately, we have two things going for us: we will be able to do construction without impacting our primary business, and, most importantly, we have Shoshana, who has consulted the construction of over 100 Float Centers in over 30 countries.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't have the fund, buy still want to help us out, please share this campaign with friends and family, people that are interested in Floating, and anyone rooting for the little guys.

We have a live social media stream that will share your comments with the students in our lobby. 

Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

expensive cities. We’ve been in San Francisco’s Mission District since 2001,
and we want to stay! 

Floating is the most powerful tool for human growth and well-being since yoga. Benefits include: 






Reduction of Chronic Pain


Decrease in Stress


Strengthening of Immune System


Promoting Creative Thinking


Enhancing Learning


Calming Mind and Body


Speeding of Healing and Physical Recovery


Lowering of Blood Pressure


Jet lag and Fatigue Recovery


Aid in the Elimination of Addictions (Smoking, Alcohol Intake and Weight Loss)(Scroll down the page for more specifics on the benefits.)







What is a Floatation Tank?


Some people know it as a “sensory deprivation tank”, but that’s a misnomer, because you aren’t really “depriving” your body. You are actually placing your body in a neutral environment where your senses are heightened.
A Floatation Tank is a sound and lightproof spa in which you float effortlessly, like a cork, on the surface of 10 inches of water that is super-saturated with 800 pounds of medical grade Epsom salt. The solution is heated to the exact temperature of your skin (93.5°F), allowing your body to be perfectly supported by a cushion of silky skin-temperature liquid.





Relaxing in a floatation tank is the closest thing to feeling the weightlessness of outerspace, here on earth. It allows the user an experience of deep relaxation in an almost weightless environment, giving the body a chance to heal itself and allowing the mind to drift into the deepest state of relaxation possible.
   
The Experience 
Floatation tanks are some of the few places on earth where you can experience your body free from the forces of gravity.The temperature of the water means that once you are settled in the tank, it is virtually impossible to distinguish between parts of the body that are in contact with the water and those parts which are floating above the water. The effect is that it “fools” the brain into believing that you are floating in mid-air.Every single muscle in the body is allowed to totally relax, and your brain falls into the theta wave state -- the most relaxed you can get without being asleep. With the tank’s interior lights off, the quietness and the darkness allow the mind to drift into a deep state of relaxation.The Plan...Funding will go towards the creation of an oasis in an urban center that is both beautiful and comfortable that needs to be sound-proof, light-proof and well-ventilated. The installation of the tank will require plumbing and electrical plus waterproofing and salt-proofing. Finally, we will need to procure salt for the tank.The good news is we already own one tank and have access to another. We plan to install the tank in our existing yoga business with no interruption to our class schedule.Swag, Yoga, and Massage will be available as soon as we hit our goals, the Floats will be available as soon as we complete the Float Center. (Scroll down for more details!) Our goal is to have the float center up and running by the end of the summer and our Indiegogo contributors will be among the first people to float.


About Us...
We are Steve23 and Juicy Liberty Sanchez of Mission Yoga. Together we have over 30 years in business. We're joining forces with  Shoshana Leibner of Float Dreams to create Mission Float, San Francisco's premier Samadhi tank float center located in the Heart of San Francisco’s Mission District.


The Effects of Floating... 
Unparalleled Mental Calm
You may have tried other methods relaxation or meditation -- but until you've tried floating, you're missing out on an incredible experience.
A float tank creates a weightless environment in which the body is completely supported, external stimuli is reduced, and there is nothing left for the brain to do. As such, the logical side of the brain is rendered redundant and its activity slows down until it reaches a theta level. Although the user is technically awake, they will enter a “dream-like” state in which the brain begins releasing endorphins and stress hormones, like cortisol, will drop.


For many people, floating is the only way to achieve a deep level of relaxation and calm.
Physical Relief 
Flotation therapy is a wonderful way to assist the body in healing itself.
The environment inside the tank allows the body to work unencumbered, bringing itself back to optimum health more effectively and efficiently than any other form of rest. The weightless environment allows your spine and muscles to stretch out and realign themselves, while the epsom salt pull toxins and lactic acids from your body, aiding in the recovery process and lifting your mood.


Flotation therapy has numerous physical benefits:

A refuge from chronic pain such as fibromyalgia, arthritis, and back injuries
Enhances athletic performance & sports rehabilitation
Speeds the healing process
Decreases the production of Cortisol, ACTH, Lactic Acid and Adrenaline
Improves circulation and distribution of oxygen and nutrients


Our rewards:




------------------------------------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------------------------------------


------------------------------------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------------------------------------
Risks & Challenges


Our biggest concern is dealing with the San Francisco Planning Department. Fortunately, we have two things going for us: we will be able to do construction without impacting our primary business, and, most importantly, we have Shoshana, who has consulted the construction of over 100 Float Centers in over 30 countries.
    Other Ways You Can Help


If you don't have the fund, buy still want to help us out, please share this campaign with friends and family, people that are interested in Floating, and anyone rooting for the little guys.

We have a live social media stream that will share your comments with the students in our lobby. 
Please use the Indiegogo share tools!  And that's all there is to it.

story:
Here's the gist of things. I need to get breast enlargement surgery. It costs much more than I can afford, and insurance, for obvious reasons, will not cover any portion of it. You may think that I am being shallow, doing this for a man, and have low self esteem. Well, one of the three is right.

I need this surgery. I have bipolar disorder, PTSD, and debilitating  body dysmorphia. I have never been comfortable in my skin, and I really feel getting the enlargement would help my psyche. 

I am currently a 32A cup, stuffing my bra just so I feel comfortable enough to leave the house. I will not go outside of my home until I am completely comfortable with how I look, which includes padding my bra multiple times to give me that really full look.

Not only do I want this surgery, my psychiatrist also feels it would be a good idea. If I feel better about myself, that could lead to me taking better care of my mental and physical health. 

This seems like a highly superficial surgery, but deep down it really does have a great meaning. I need to be comfortable with myself so I can take care of myself.

story:
Organizacije civilnog društva, sindikati, učitelji i učiteljice, aktivisti i aktivistice, pozvali su građanke i građane Hrvatske da jasno pošalju poruku da je obrazovanje prioritet hrvatskog društva te da iskažu svoju podršku učiteljicama i učiteljima te Cjelovitoj kurikularnoj reformi, na prosvjedu Hrvatska može bolje.

Odazvala se cijela Hrvatska, od Osijeka do Dubrovnika i u srijedu 1. lipnja 2016. u 18 sati okupljamo se u prosvjednim akcijama diljem Hrvatske.

Za organizaciju prosvjeda potrebno nam je još najmanje 20.000 kuna (plus provizija Indiegogo platforme i Paypala). Troškovnik prosvjeda bit će uskoro dostupan na internetskim stranicama Inicijative.

Popis organizacija u Inicijativi (organizatorica i podržavateljica) dostupan je na LINKU.

Sredstva će biti uplaćena na žiro-račun udruge Roditelji u akciji - Roda, a na stranici www.hrvatskamozebolje.org objavljivat ćemo informacije o svim učinjenim troškovima i uplaćenim sredstvima.

Pitanje obrazovanja je pitanje budućnosti naše djece – budućnost stavlja to pitanje pred nas. Ovo je ispit naše zrelosti i ispit naše odgovornosti prema našoj djeci, našim nećakinjama i nećacima, prema budućnosti. Učiteljice i učitelji su svoju stručnost, svoje iskustvo, znanja i vještine stavili na raspolaganje Hrvatskoj da se oblikuje škola koja će odgovarati na zahtjeve budućnosti, koja će učenike pripremiti da aktivno pridonose dobrobiti Hrvatske i Europe. Zauzvrat su doživjeli političke napade. Vrijeme je da Hrvatska pokaže da može bolje od aktualne političke garniture!

Detalji o prosvjedu se nalaze na www.hrvatskamozebolje.org i na Facebook eventu.

Potencijalni višak sredstava skupljen putem crowdfunding kampanje Inicijativa Hrvatska može bolje uložit će u stipendiranje učenika/ica koji su oštećeni nefunkcioniranjem Nacionalne zaklade za potporu učeničkom i studentskom standardu putem javnog natječaja. Za više o problemu s NZPUSS-om pročitajte na ovoj poveznici.

story:
Guardian keeps you always connected with your kids

All parents know what it’s like taking children to parks, malls and amusement parks. With all the people around, sometimes it’s quite nerve-racking trying to keep an eye on your children while they’re running about. You don’t want to be overprotective, but there’s always the chance that you might lose sight of them.

BeLuvv, a Taiwanese start up company has come up with an answer to this problem: "Guardian", a wearable devices that can help parents locate their kids if they wander off, and aid in the location of children before they go missing permanently.

As seen on



Kids wear it

Guardian is a tiny Bluetooth piece that can be inserted into a bracelet. Its minimalist design fits right in with the fashion of the day. Besides, the bracelet are made of natural silicone that are comfortable and so easily to slip on. Your kids will love wearing them everyday!



Parents download it 

Guardian is an accessory that interacts with an App on your phone. As long as your kids are wearing the device, you can see their exact whereabouts on your smartphones through the Guardian App.The app alerts you if your child wanders out of the perimeter you set. Parents can also add trusted ones, such as neighbors, teachers, nannies and relatives, to their group as co-guardians, so that more people can help keep an eye on the little ones.

  

    


Guardian network

The Guardian app is free. The more people who install it, the more watertight the network becomes. Here's why: If a child is found missing, parents can immediately launch a global search. When the child in question passes by a person using Guardian app, the cloud system immediately sends the location to the parents. The user may accidentally save s child's life. 



Your privacy is ensured

Parents may have a privacy concern :"How to avoid someone dangerous downloading the app and locating lost kids?" BeLuvv takes the safety of your loved ones very seriously. When the lost child passes by a user of the Guardian app, only the parents of the lost child and anyone else the parents chose to include as co-guardians are notified. The user does not know about it. 



Features


Be a hero, bring them home.


There are 8,000,000 instances of missing children all around the world each year. According to the National Center for Missing and Exploited Children, roughly 800,000 children are reported missing each year in the United States -- that's roughly 2,000 per day. It is notable that 76.2 percent of abducted children who are killed are dead within three hours of the abduction. The first three hours are the most critical when trying to locate a missing child. If we could successfully locate the missing child before the end of the 72 hours "golden window", tragedy would not have happened. Even more, if the child did not go missing, there would be no sad story. Every child around the world needs your help.

 


The campaign is raising children safety awareness and funds on behalf of BeLuvv, a startup company who launched Guardian recently. BeLuvv pledges to donate 1 unit for every 2 sold. When our customers buy two BeLuvv products, we will donate one to those in need. Your support can more than protect your kids but others. We believe that by doing this, we will be taking a small step toward making the world a better place. We have set a long-term target of donating 8 million devices, which corresponds to the number of children that go missing every year. We need every hero like you to help us to end the sad story of missing children. Children around the world need your donation to protect them from missing, abduction and sexual abuse. 


Together we can make a difference and we will make a difference. 


Together we can build the world's strongest safety network for your children and other 8 millions.


Tell the world

Your every action is the key to save a child. Your spreading the world will help us make the world a safer place for children. Tell your friends, family, neighbors, co-workers, random strangers...Tell EVERYBODY about our campaign! Send them the link to donate. Share, post, comment, tweet, repost, like, and retweet as much as possible. 



About Beluvv

 


BeLuvv is derived from the words “be loved.” We sincerely hope to allow people to experience love through our products. This is a motivation that has been with us since the beginning. Products by BeLuvv are ultimately products about love.


Why buy Guardian now?

Limited set

Each set includes 1 Guardian + 2 Bracelets (Get your TWO bracelet set NOW! Only available during our crowd funding campaign! ) 


Exclusive colors
Cool, popular and limited color only for the donators of BeLuvv crowd funding campaign!(You will never see them again!)


We provide 5 options: 
Pre-ordered your Guardian for your kids, and get early bird price!

$ 1 donation! You will get 1 ticket to enter our lucky draw!! Get your chance to win one Guardian set Now!!!
$ 5 donation!! Now you got 5 tickets for our lucky draw!!!
Basic package / 1set for $24
Small family package / 2 sets for $48
Big family package / 5 sets for $116
Reseller package / 10 sets for $224


Other Ways You Can Help

The Guardian app is free. The more people who install it, the more watertight the network becomes. If a child is found missing, parents can immediately launch a global search. When the child in question passes by a user of the Guardian app, the child’s location is immediately relayed to the parents.
Each app installer is essentially a guardian angel to help make the world a safer place for children. You may help by simply installing the free app or like our Facebook fan page. 
  • Installing BeLuvv App: It is not yet approved by App store. It will be released before the first shipping. 
  • Like us on Fan page: www.facebook.com/beluvv

story:
Production Status
Thank you so much to all of our campaign backers - because of your support we are kicking off production.
 
Our campaign is now closed but watch for news of our live launch later this year.
 
_____________________________________________________________________

 

 

What is Hedkayse?

Hedkayse is a revolutionary new helmet technology, design, and approach.

We started with the challenge of creating a better folding helmet. But this quickly led us to completely rethink the design of cycle helmets, forcing us to develop our own our unique, safer, rugged, soft material 'Enkayse' to replace traditional Expanded Polystyrene EPS.

 

The resulting Hedkayse One is not only the simplest and most compact folding helmet possible, it's also a better all round helmet for cyclists.

Whatever, type of cycling you do, wherever you go - 'The One' Offers you:

  • INCREASED SAFETY - The world's first multiple-impact protection helmet, which conforms to world safety standards.
  • TOUGHNESS! - Throw it on the floor, in a bag, wherever - it's fine. No more worrying about every small knock to your expensive but fragile helmet.
  • ONE SIZE THAT FITS ALL - the flexibility & patented adjustment system give the Headkayse unprecedented ability to fit any size of head, from children to large adults. It even quickly adapts to woolly hats!
  • AMAZING COMFORT - Whatever shape your head is (we're all different!) Hedkayse will adjust & mould to your head, quickly feeling incredibly comfy and secure.
  • CUTTING EDGE STYLING - Carefully crafted to blend the best helmet shapes that suit the human head - Hedkayse looks surprisingly good on all people. 

 

Where are we?

 

 

The team have undertaken the research, testing and time to develop this solution. We have the design, we’ve tested it, and we have taken on-board the feedback. 

We’re now ready for production.

We have designed, developed and will manufacture entirely in the UK; even the bag and strap webbing is made locally. We want to remain in control, overseeing every single step of this process in order to give you the very best.

Help us make this a commercial reality and enjoy the benefits of a Hedkayse helmet.

 

 

Why do I need a flexible Helmet?

 

Hedkayse embraces individuality. Because of its flexibility, and our patented adjustment system, the helmet simply just adapts to your head shape, making it more comfortable, fit more securely and look more compact.  For the first time since the days of leather helmets in the 1930’s, a cycle helmet conforms to your head shape. And it's truly one size fits ALL, need we say more?

 

OK nothing personal but let's be honest, cycle helmets are pretty strange looking things on most people. Aerodynamic wedges for roadies are great if you're in the Tour de France, but a bit weird when yoou're just poppping to the shops. The 'skate park bowl' looks great on a dude with a BMX, but a bit suspect on a middle aged commuter.

So Hedkayse has been designed as an urban hybrid to look good wherever. Flexibility allows it to follow your head shape, meaning there's no sticky out bits making it look like you're wearing a plastic pie.

 

So how small does it pack?

 

Clever use of materials means we don't need any crazy hinges and folding mechanisms. It just folds flat. Simple and quick.

Hedkayse flattens by 70% to just 5cm wide, reducing in volume by 50% from 5L to 2.5L

 

Is it tough?

 

Hell yea - We've spent over three years exhaustively testing, retesting and testing again to get the in-depth material knowledge to develop "Enkayse"

With this helmet, you can drop it on the floor, bosh, bang or scratch it and you don't need to worry about whether you *ought* to get a new one. Our unique “Enkayse” materials will just suck up the punishment and spit it back out! Hoo Ha!

 

Is it safe? Yes!

 

 

 

For the last 40 years nearly all cycle helmets have used Expanded Polystyrene (EPS). It’s a good energy absorber at high speed impacts, but it's destroyed in the process, meaning traditional EPS cycle helmets only perform once; sacrificing themselves to absorb the energy and providing little help on a second hit.

At lower speeds EPS’s rigidity means a small knock passes the energy straight to your skull, adding up to some nasty long term affects to the brain. Try knocking your knuckles hard (not too hard) on the top of your EPS helmet – it’ll shake your eyeballs about.

So we set out to find a better material. During what turned out to be a much longer process than we thought, we discovered and tested many amazing materials, but none provided the protection we needed when exposed to real life heat or cold.

 

 

“Testing some of our prototype samples at Inspec Insternational Ltd”

 

Helmet standards specify testing across a temperature range of -20deg C to +50deg C, a temperature range that, by a particular quirk, only suits the polystyrene helmets... Until now. 

Enkayse is the result of all our hard work. Its special combination of slow response and elasticity means it can absorb impacts without permanent damage, whilst the extremely tough outer protection layer is tear proof, and resistant to sharp objects.

Enkayse exceeds the requirements of the European cycle helmet standard (EN1078), maintaining performance and keeping you safe.

 

 

 

The flexibility of Enkayse means it can absorb impacts without permanent damage whilst the extremely tough outer protection layer is tear proof, and resistant to sharp objects….Grrr!

When exposed to large impacts, traditional cycle helmets made from Expanded Polystyrene (EPS) only perform once; sacrificing themselves to absorb the energy. There is little forgiveness when exposed to small impacts which don’t meet the threshold for EPS to compress.

 

 

 

 

Media & Press

 The Guardian

 Sky Swipe reviews Headkayse

 

The Times Online

 

 The Times "On Your Bike" Headkayse review

 

 DailyMail Online

 

 Yahoo Sport

 

 CoachMag Review

  Cycling Weekly

 

Cyclo Headkayse needs you!

 

Gizmag Headkayse News

 London Live TV interview

 Award winning blogger "Fiona Outdoors" gets a sneak peek!

 Road.cc fantastic article

 BBC Radio Bristol - Andrew in action

 

 Great review by Bike Radar

 

 SportsVibe

 The Gear Caster

 Jebiga Review

 

Is it adaptable? Lights, Cameras

Yes! Our unique shape allows a high amount of adaptability, Andrew's showing off here!

 

 

How Much?

 

After our Indiegogo campaign, Hedkayse will retail for £89

Even at the full Indiegogo price this is a chance to grab yourself a bargain as a thank you for your support.

 

 

 

What's next? Why we need you!

This has been a huge undertaking for us. As a team we have already invested a substantial amount to bring us to pre-production. But we now need your help for a final push to get the product launched:

· Final production tweaks and detailing - For example, we're introducing an even tougher but thinner 3mm Shell Outer layer, which is flexible, enormously strong and tear/scratchproof.

· Setting up our UK production

· Establish shipping, logistics and warehousing partnerships

· Mass production tooling for the helmet

· Final testing and approvals in accordance to all world safety standards from production units.

 

 

We’re on an all or nothing route with Indiegogo so if we don’t make our target we’ll have to search hard to fill the gap (We’re eyeing up George’s kidneys as we type). But with your help this can happen NOW. Be part of our journey (Save George some pain) and become a proud Headkayser!...

 

How You Can Contribute - The Perks

Option 1 - buy helmets!

There is of course the Early bird offers for those of you who help us early - important because Indiegogo will notice and boost the campaign.

Even better of course if you need more than one, how about the family pack (you'll save on postage)

Are you a club, shop or bike hire company? The "team" version gives you the early bird price and cheapest postage, WITH customised option of colour and branding applied to the helmets. Woop woop!"

 

Option 2 - don't need a helmet but do want to contribute?

...In that case donate £15 and get one of these luxurious HK branded Beanie hats as a huge warm thank you from us. This a lovely thermal head upgrade which feels warm whilst looking cool.

 

Better still this will fit under a Hedkayse One (because it's so adjustable) converting that into a full winter helmet - great for keeping your ears warm while bashing into sleety winds.

Or like snow sports? - the Hedkayse One + Beanie is perfect for hitting the slopes (hopefully not literally) and packs neatly into a rucksack. No annoying helmet hanging off the hand luggage.

 

Option 3 - Give a lucky loved one a Voucher

There are a couple of ways of doing this:

1. Give them the £25 discount voucher - which secures them the Early Bird rate and £25 off, meaning they can buy a final Headkayse for £50. This is a great smaller present or mega stocking filler.

2. Go the whole hog and give them a Headkayse One for Christmas - or at least a voucher version of it. This gives them something to look forward to in 2016 other than a diet, and makes them feel part of this story.

For both of these options you will receive a beautifully designed voucher by email, which you can choose to print and give to your "giftee" (is that a word?). Each voucher will have a unique code linked to your name. Almost as good as a Wonker Chocolate Golden Ticket, and a lot more real.

 

So - let's get on it... Oh Gosh LOOK Up There TOP RIGHT (hint hint!)

We need to achieve a £60K target in order to manufacture. But after that, here are some additional stretch goals we would love to include so your helmet will be even better.

 

Stretch Goal 65K = Hedkayse Buckle

Our current speed buckles are standard issue and red, we really think it should be green. End of!

 

 

Stretch Goal 70K = Quick Release

 

 

Crossing fingers, at £70K this is where it gets even more awesome, a bespoke "HK" designed clip for quick release use will replace our current velcro fastening solution.

 

 

Stretch Goal 100K = Colours

 

 

You know you want these! Hitting £100K will allow us to produce a variety of colours in production, even if you buy before this amount on reaching £100K we will get in touch with everyone asking for them to specify the colour they want, taking a poll and working out the top 8. Seriously how cool will this be!  
 

The rocky road ahead ! 

We do understand that the current versions are in need of refining tweaks in order to make them as close to perfect as we possibly can. This has never been done before as this is a brand new/world first in cycle helmet technology.

Everything is working up to this point; the professionals we have recruited have decades of experience in what they do.

During our timeline from completion to dispatched goods, we will personally update all progress big or small, good or bad. We pride ourselves as being clear and straightforward. Almost as safe as our helmets!

 

What do we still need to do?

On completion of this campaign, fingers crossed with funding successful, we will be in a position to proceed at 100% into the finalisation of production for HK01.

Your support to us on this project is fantastic and we know you will want your Headkayse helmet as soon as physically possible. We will push to ensure the highest levels of quality and safety are achieved prior to dispatch and plan to have you Headkaysing by Summer 2016.
story_txt:
Production StatusThank you so much to all of our campaign backers - because of your support we are kicking off production. Our campaign is now closed but watch for news of our live launch later this year. _____________________________________________________________________  What is Hedkayse?Hedkayse is a revolutionary new helmet technology, design, and approach.We started with the challenge of creating a better folding helmet. But this quickly led us to completely rethink the design of cycle helmets, forcing us to develop our own our unique, safer, rugged, soft material 'Enkayse' to replace traditional Expanded Polystyrene EPS.
 

The resulting Hedkayse One is not only the simplest and most compact folding helmet possible, it's also a better all round helmet for cyclists.
Whatever, type of cycling you do, wherever you go - 'The One' Offers you:


INCREASED SAFETY - The world's first multiple-impact protection helmet, which conforms to world safety standards.

TOUGHNESS! - Throw it on the floor, in a bag, wherever - it's fine. No more worrying about every small knock to your expensive but fragile helmet.

ONE SIZE THAT FITS ALL - the flexibility & patented adjustment system give the Headkayse unprecedented ability to fit any size of head, from children to large adults. It even quickly adapts to woolly hats!

AMAZING COMFORT - Whatever shape your head is (we're all different!) Hedkayse will adjust & mould to your head, quickly feeling incredibly comfy and secure.

CUTTING EDGE STYLING - Carefully crafted to blend the best helmet shapes that suit the human head - Hedkayse looks surprisingly good on all people. 

 
Where are we?
 
 
The team have undertaken the research, testing and time to develop this solution. We have the design, we’ve tested it, and we have taken on-board the feedback. 
We’re now ready for production.
We have designed, developed and will manufacture entirely in the UK; even the bag and strap webbing is made locally. We want to remain in control, overseeing every single step of this process in order to give you the very best.
Help us make this a commercial reality and enjoy the benefits of a Hedkayse helmet.
 
 
Why do I need a flexible Helmet?
 
Hedkayse embraces individuality. Because of its flexibility, and our patented adjustment system, the helmet simply just adapts to your head shape, making it more comfortable, fit more securely and look more compact.  For the first time since the days of leather helmets in the 1930’s, a cycle helmet conforms to your head shape. And it's truly one size fits ALL, need we say more?
 

OK nothing personal but let's be honest, cycle helmets are pretty strange looking things on most people. Aerodynamic wedges for roadies are great if you're in the Tour de France, but a bit weird when yoou're just poppping to the shops. The 'skate park bowl' looks great on a dude with a BMX, but a bit suspect on a middle aged commuter.
So Hedkayse has been designed as an urban hybrid to look good wherever. Flexibility allows it to follow your head shape, meaning there's no sticky out bits making it look like you're wearing a plastic pie.

 
So how small does it pack?
 
Clever use of materials means we don't need any crazy hinges and folding mechanisms. It just folds flat. Simple and quick.
Hedkayse flattens by 70% to just 5cm wide, reducing in volume by 50% from 5L to 2.5L
 

Is it tough?
 
Hell yea - We've spent over three years exhaustively testing, retesting and testing again to get the in-depth material knowledge to develop "Enkayse"
With this helmet, you can drop it on the floor, bosh, bang or scratch it and you don't need to worry about whether you *ought* to get a new one. Our unique “Enkayse” materials will just suck up the punishment and spit it back out! Hoo Ha!
 
Is it safe? Yes!

 
 
 
For the last 40 years nearly all cycle helmets have used Expanded Polystyrene (EPS). It’s a good energy absorber at high speed impacts, but it's destroyed in the process, meaning traditional EPS cycle helmets only perform once; sacrificing themselves to absorb the energy and providing little help on a second hit.
At lower speeds EPS’s rigidity means a small knock passes the energy straight to your skull, adding up to some nasty long term affects to the brain. Try knocking your knuckles hard (not too hard) on the top of your EPS helmet – it’ll shake your eyeballs about.
So we set out to find a better material. During what turned out to be a much longer process than we thought, we discovered and tested many amazing materials, but none provided the protection we needed when exposed to real life heat or cold.
 

 
“Testing some of our prototype samples at Inspec Insternational Ltd”
 
Helmet standards specify testing across a temperature range of -20deg C to +50deg C, a temperature range that, by a particular quirk, only suits the polystyrene helmets... Until now. 
Enkayse is the result of all our hard work. Its special combination of slow response and elasticity means it can absorb impacts without permanent damage, whilst the extremely tough outer protection layer is tear proof, and resistant to sharp objects.
Enkayse exceeds the requirements of the European cycle helmet standard (EN1078), maintaining performance and keeping you safe.

 

 
 
The flexibility of Enkayse means it can absorb impacts without permanent damage whilst the extremely tough outer protection layer is tear proof, and resistant to sharp objects….Grrr!
When exposed to large impacts, traditional cycle helmets made from Expanded Polystyrene (EPS) only perform once; sacrificing themselves to absorb the energy. There is little forgiveness when exposed to small impacts which don’t meet the threshold for EPS to compress.
 
 
 
 
Media & Press
 The Guardian

 Sky Swipe reviews Headkayse
 
The Times Online
 
 The Times "On Your Bike" Headkayse review
 
 DailyMail Online
 
 Yahoo Sport
 
 CoachMag Review
  Cycling Weekly
 
Cyclo Headkayse needs you!

 
Gizmag Headkayse News
 London Live TV interview
 Award winning blogger "Fiona Outdoors" gets a sneak peek!
 Road.cc fantastic article
 BBC Radio Bristol - Andrew in action
 
 Great review by Bike Radar
 
 SportsVibe
 The Gear Caster
 Jebiga Review
 
Is it adaptable? Lights, Cameras
Yes! Our unique shape allows a high amount of adaptability, Andrew's showing off here!
 
 How Much?
 
After our Indiegogo campaign, Hedkayse will retail for £89
Even at the full Indiegogo price this is a chance to grab yourself a bargain as a thank you for your support.
 

 
 
What's next? Why we need you!
This has been a huge undertaking for us. As a team we have already invested a substantial amount to bring us to pre-production. But we now need your help for a final push to get the product launched:
· Final production tweaks and detailing - For example, we're introducing an even tougher but thinner 3mm Shell Outer layer, which is flexible, enormously strong and tear/scratchproof.
· Setting up our UK production
· Establish shipping, logistics and warehousing partnerships
· Mass production tooling for the helmet
· Final testing and approvals in accordance to all world safety standards from production units.
 

 
We’re on an all or nothing route with Indiegogo so if we don’t make our target we’ll have to search hard to fill the gap (We’re eyeing up George’s kidneys as we type). But with your help this can happen NOW. Be part of our journey (Save George some pain) and become a proud Headkayser!...

Even better of course if you need more than one, how about the family pack (you'll save on postage)
Are you a club, shop or bike hire company? The "team" version gives you the early bird price and cheapest postage, WITH customised option of colour and branding applied to the helmets. Woop woop!"

Or like snow sports? - the Hedkayse One + Beanie is perfect for hitting the slopes (hopefully not literally) and packs neatly into a rucksack. No annoying helmet hanging off the hand luggage.

There are a couple of ways of doing this:

2. Go the whole hog and give them a Headkayse One for Christmas - or at least a voucher version of it. This gives them something to look forward to in 2016 other than a diet, and makes them feel part of this story.
For both of these options you will receive a beautifully designed voucher by email, which you can choose to print and give to your "giftee" (is that a word?). Each voucher will have a unique code linked to your name. Almost as good as a Wonker Chocolate Golden Ticket, and a lot more real.

The rocky road ahead ! 
We do understand that the current versions are in need of refining tweaks in order to make them as close to perfect as we possibly can. This has never been done before as this is a brand new/world first in cycle helmet technology.

During our timeline from completion to dispatched goods, we will personally update all progress big or small, good or bad. We pride ourselves as being clear and straightforward. Almost as safe as our helmets!

story:
WHO ARE WE?

We are a voluntary team of UK based Medics, Nurses, Paramedics, Health Professionals, & Support Staff providing essential first aid and care to the refugees living both in the 'Jungle' and smaller camps in Calais.  

WHY ARE WE DOING THIS?

We are currently one of the only first aid care teams on the ground in The Jungle in Calais, providing first aid and emotional support to refugees.

From 3 first aid & 1 dental caravans we work with limited resources, and a constant queue of patients with coughs, colds, cuts, bruises, sprains, scabies etc alongside a need for our team to walk the camp to find the vulnerable and the sick.

We visit the smaller refugee camps In Northern France with emergency first aid and dental care at weekends, and are now also sending members out to Greece to provide emergency care in Lesvos.

WHAT DO WE NEED?

Your donations will be used to replenish medical supplies, maintain our facilities, and cover vital costs to help sustain our service.

HOW CAN YOU HELP?

Please share this, and our Facebook page with your friends and family to help us garner as much support as possible.

If you are a healthcare professional who would like to volunteer, please contact us via www.facebook.com/CRS.UKMEDTEAM

story:
A Major Health Risk for Children: Obesity

Approximately 10% of children worldwide, and a full third of children in the United States, are obese. Of these children, 70% of them have at least one risk factor for cardiovascular disease.

1 out of 7 low-income, preschool-aged children are obese, and this is no coincidence! Many children who come from low-income families do not have access to the physical education or facilities that they need to stay active and stay healthy.

There is Help!

Team for Kids is an organization that helps fund health and fitness programs for children who would otherwise have little to no access to regular physical activity.

TFK's programs serve 100,000 children each year in more than 400 community centers and schools in the United States and in Africa.

My Part

In order to raise money for this amazing organization, I am running the 2012 ING New York City Marathon. Yes, all 26.2 miles of it! My goal is to raise $2,844 for this organization. $2,844 represents the number of miles I will have run in 1 year on the day of the marathon, November 4th, 2012.

Training for the marathon and being able to raise money for Team for Kids has truly been amazing.

What You Can Do!

For starters, run the marathon. Just kidding! I am only asking for your money! =) All donations are welcome, big and small. Please help to support TFK by donating any amount. You will help children living in low-income areas get physically healthy.

Then, come support the marathoners (including your truly) in person on November 4th, starting at 8:30am in all Five Boroughs of New York City.

Thanks in advance, everyone! P.S. anyone looking for a tax ID # email me: shannoneberly@gmail.com.

story:
Water is the most abundant and powerful element on earth used for various cleansing and replenishment purposes. However, the real problem comes in the picture when water loses its purity and cleanliness due to certain factors. You don’t want your family to use dirty water for drinking, washing and bathing, right?

To solve the predominant water issues in this generation, Ecstazy offers high quality and revolutionary water filter that comes with top of the line features. Our company has been in the industry for years, providing top caliber, effective and durable water filter products and systems both for commercial and residential establishments. Our mission is to secure that people drink and use safe and clean water to achieve optimal health benefits.

Every product we manufacture is well-designed and engineered to reach the highest standards and to provide satisfaction to customers around the world. High class materials were also used to ensure that they will deliver optimal functionality and performance. This serves as our driving force to create water filter products and system that will pave the way for every home and commercial establishment to use the cleanest and safest water free from any harmful chemical residues.

They come available with the following features:

Elegant Design – what sets us apart in themarket is our unique and elegant water filter design that can fit any kitchen or bathroom décor. Every piece and detail is crafted with refinement.

Durable Construction – the design is nothing if the construction is a complete failure.This is the reason why we make sure that everything is balanced to guarantee the satisfaction of our customers. We make use the highest grade of materials to ensure that our water filter products will be able to stand the test of time.

High Technological Integration – technology has always been our partner in creating the most amazing and high-tech water filters. If you use our products, you will be amazed on how technology can provide you a clean and safe water to use every day.

Simple Installation – our water filter products also require just a simple installation, so you can use them immediately after your purchase.

We also boast our team of experienced and expert professionals that devote their effort and time to come up with water filter products that can address the needs and concerns of customers. They make sure that every detail of the product is taken care of to produce a perfect output.

We also take pride in offering 24/7 customer support to our valued customers who want to experience the benefits of using Well Blue water filters. Our customer support team is driven by passion to serve and to assist customers in whatever way they can. So, if you have any concerns or problems, just call us and we will always be willing and ready to help you.

It is the right of every individual in this planet to use clean water for drinking, washing and bathing. Well, when it comes to water filtration system, there is only one name you can trust—Ecstazy. Surf our website to know more about the things we have in store for you. 

Main Under Sink Water Filter


Whole House / Undersink Water Filter

This is our main Product

Quick Details

  • Type: Ultrafiltration
  • Use: Household Pre-Filtration
  • Place of Origin: UK
  • Brand Name: Ecstazy
  • Model Number: L-KF101A
  • Product size: 134 X 400mm
  • Designed Water output: 600L/HR

Packaging & Delivery

Packaging Details:

1pcs/color box 6pcs/ctn

Delivery Detail:

20 Days

Specifications

1.Catridge material is ultrafilteration membrane.
2.Energy and room saved.
3.Pure physical filteration principle

Descriptions

1. Shell material : 304 stainless steel

2. Cartridge material : Foodgrade UF membrane + wool KDF

3. Feed water source : Municipal tap water

4. Pressure of feed water : 0.1-0.3Mpa

5. Operating tempreture : 5-45°C

6. Service life : ≥3 year

7. Joint dimension : 1/2”

  Advantage of Ecstazy water filter

1. Catridge material is ultrafilteration membrane, which filteration precision is 0.01 micron. It can remove the harmful substance from the water , such as mud,sand, rust, colloid, bacteria, virus and so on.

2. Keep mineral substance and microelement which is benefical to human body.

3. Advanced flushing function design can ensure 3 years service life.

4. The flux is large enough to satsify with the family life demand.

5. Save energy, not need to add pressure and electricity, and no waste water appearing.

6. Pure physical filteration principle, not add any chemical substance

7. KDF can remove the heavy metal and chlorine from the water.

8. It can be installed in the cabinet ,save the room.

Water Pitcher

  Quick Details

  • Type: water filter pitcher
  • Use: water purifier
  • Power (W): 0
  • Voltage (V): 0
  • Place of Origin: UK
  • Brand Name: Ecstazy
  • Model Number: L-PF601A
  • Body material: AS
  • Lid and handle material: ABS
  • Color: blue
  • Inside material: Active carbon, ion exchange resin
  • Capacity of pitcher: 3.5 L
  • Cartridge housing material: PP

Packaging & Delivery

Packaging Details:

1pcs/color box, 12pcs/ctn

Delivery Detail:

20days

Specifications

Water filter pitcher capacity:3.5L
smart Digital indicator
humanity design
Inside material:Active carbon, ion exchange resin

Ecstazy alkaline Water Filter Pitcher

Make your own bottle water yourself !

A glass of filtered water a day ,leave the cancer away !

Water is the one of the important origin to cause cancer. The reason is farm fertilizers/chemicals and industrial pollutants run into our water resource that more and more effect our living enviornment.

Well,from now on, the problems can be easily solve with Ecstazy Water Filte Pitcher!

Simply pour your tap water into the filter pitcher, a few seconds later, you can get the good and pure tasted water. And them, you can definately taste the difference immediately between tap and filtered water. Using this for your tea and cooking everyday and you just won’t live without it !

Item No : L-PF601

1. Body material: AS

2. Lid and handle material: ABS

3.Cartridge housing material:PP

4. Inside material: Active carbon, ion exchange resin, natural bio-ceramic minerals ball

5. Capacity of pitcher: 3.5L, filteration capacity: 2L

Ecstazy water filter pitcher offers many advantages

1. Increase water pH from 7 to 10.5, balance the acid and alkaline in human body.

2. Reduce ORP from 100mv to -350mv, make the water is absorbed easily

3. Reduces lime scale and substance, eg. Chlorine, that affects taste and odor.

4. Improves taste of hot and cold drinks.

5. Prolongs domestic appliance life by preventing lime scale

6. Gives full flavor and better tasting tea and coffee..

The pitcher cartridge is the key for cleaner & clearer great tasting filtered water.

1. Reduces limescale and substance, eg. Chlorine, that affect taste and odour.

2. Permanently absorbs metals such as lead and copper.

Lifetime of the cartridge

The cartridge life depends on local water quality,such as water hardness, chlorine content.

Based on reduction of chlorine and organic impurities, the cartridge filters up to 300 litres..

To ensure optimum performace, you should change the cartridge in time. To remind you of the next cartridge change, water filter pitcher is equipped with a smart cartridge exchange indicator.

Character

1. ”Smart” digital indicator will remind you to replace the cartridge in time based on the drinking  people number.

2. Humanity design make convenience usage

* Easy opening fill lid

  You don't need to take out the cover to pour into the water. Just need to press the lid slightly and pour the water inside. 

* Easy pour-out

  It has a active pur out lid, make you pour out the water easily.

* Smooth grip handle make your hand feel very comportable.

* Easily replaceable cartridge, replacement just only by gently screwing.

3.Fashion design to fit inside refrigerator door to save your space

Package

1pc/color box  12pcs/CTN

Meas : 585*405*555mm

Gross Weight : 16KG

Net Weight : 12KG

Cautions

1. Do not expose to direct sunlight and keep it away from the heating elements

2. Please repalce the cartridge on time to ensure the filtering quality When the indicator light reminds

3. The lid with indicator must not be washed in the dishwasher . Please clean the lid by hand.



KDF shower Filters


Quick Details

  • Type: Kdf shower filter
  • Use: Shower Filtration
  • Certification: RoHS
  • Place of Origin: UK
  • Brand Name: Ecstazy
  • Model Number: L-SF301B
  • color: Chrome ABS
  • Inlet: Female 1/2"
  • Outlet: Male 1/2"

Packaging & Delivery

Packaging Details:

1pcs/color box 60pcs/ctn

Delivery Detail:

15-30 days according to order quantity

Specifications

1. shower filter for chlorine
2. Remove the heavy metal
3. Protect skin and hair
4. Install easily

 KDF shower filter for chlorine

Tap running water for shower is not safe ,stop showering in chlorine!

Chlorine is a toxic gas which attacks living cells.Today it is used to kill micro-organisams in municipal water. It strips protein from skin and hair,leaving the body dry and causing hair split ends and broken hair shafts.Chlorine is absorbed into the body through the skin when it vaporizes in hot water.

It is a water treatment product better than the hair product !

This is Shower Filter----

Rmove the chlorine and many kinds of heavy metal in water effectively and instantly.

Relief from dry skin and scalp.

Healthier younger looking skin.

Softer more manageable hair.

Improved lathering and sudsing.

Reduces fading of color treated-hair.

Replaceable cartridge makes maintenance simple and affordable. 

 Meanwhile, competitive in price!

Specification

Products size: 90 X 120mm

Inlet : Female Thread G1/2”

Outlet: Male Thread G1/2”

Cartridge housing material:ABS

Package: 1pc/color box  40pcs/CTN

Inside material

Calcium sulfite + KDF  +Crystal quartz

1). Suitable for the water where chlorin is too much.

 2). Calcium sulfite is a new filter material, which can remove chlorine in the water instantly so to attain the purpose of purifying, mineralizing the water quality and adjusting the PH value of the water. Meanwhile, it can also sterilize various pathogenic bacteria and restrain multiplying of the microorganism.

 3). KDF is from USA, which could also filter chlorine , besides it could remove heavy metal from the water,make the water more healthy.

 4).Service life: 1 year

Installation

Can be configured with virtually any shower head.

Simply screw into place between existing shower heard and shower arm.

Immediately upon use , you will no longer be showering “in chlorine”.

 In about 5 to 7days, the natural balance of your skin and hair should be restored, contributig to healthier,softer skin and less brittle hair.
story_txt:
Water is the most abundant and powerful element on
earth used for various cleansing and replenishment purposes. However, the real
problem comes in the picture when water loses its purity and cleanliness due to
certain factors. You don’t want your family to use dirty water for drinking,
washing and bathing, right? 
To solve the predominant water issues in this
generation, Ecstazy offers high quality and revolutionary water filter that
comes with top of the line features. Our company has been in the industry for
years, providing top caliber, effective and durable water filter products and
systems both for commercial and residential establishments. Our mission is to
secure that people drink and use safe and clean water to achieve optimal health
benefits. 
Every product we manufacture is well-designed and engineered
to reach the highest standards and to provide satisfaction to customers around
the world. High class materials were also used to ensure that they will deliver
optimal functionality and performance. This serves as our driving force to create
water filter products and system that will pave the way for every home and commercial
establishment to use the cleanest and safest water free from any harmful chemical
residues.
They come available with the following features: 
Elegant Design – what
sets us apart in themarket is our
unique and elegant water filter design that can fit any kitchen or bathroom
décor. Every piece and detail is crafted with refinement.
Durable
Construction – the design is nothing if the construction is a
complete failure.This is the reason
why we make sure that everything is balanced to guarantee the satisfaction of
our customers. We make use the highest
grade of materials to ensure that our water filter products will be able to stand
the test of time. 
High Technological
Integration – technology has always been our partner in creating the
most amazing and high-tech water filters. If you use our products, you will be
amazed on how technology can provide you a clean and safe water to use every
day. 
Simple Installation
– our water filter products also require just a simple installation, so you
can use them immediately after your purchase. 
We also boast our team of experienced and expert
professionals that devote their effort and time to come up with water filter products
that can address the needs and concerns of customers. They make sure that every
detail of the product is taken care of to produce a perfect output. 
We also take pride in offering 24/7 customer support
to our valued customers who want to experience the benefits of using Well Blue water
filters. Our customer support team is driven by passion to serve and to assist customers
in whatever way they can. So, if you have any concerns or problems, just call
us and we will always be willing and ready to help you. 
It is the right of every individual
in this planet to use clean water for drinking, washing and bathing. Well, when

story:
Thank You for all the support during the campaign. Visit www.getbodydryer.com for more information and your chance to order the Body Dryer Today!


Thank You for All the Media Support!


Short Summary

Hello, my name is Tyler Overk and I have been working with the Body Dryer Team on this project for over 2 years.  We created this product to replace bacteria filled and environmentally harmful bathroom towels. I have worked in the environmental studies field for many years and am constantly looking for simple inventions that have long lasting positive impacts on the environment, and peoples lives.  This product certainly hit the mark and we set out on the journey to bring this invention to market.

We are looking to raise $50,000 to put this invention into a full production line.  We sought out some of the top manufacturers with the highest quality tooling and safety records.  These manufacturers do have certain minimum orders we must reach in order to put our invention into full production and this is our goal for the campaign.

Contributing to this project is really a contribution to our dream of bringing the body dryer to market, and doing our part to help improve the world we live in.

What We Need & What You Get

  • The funding of this project is going into an initial production minimum we need to meet with the manufacturer we have identified as being the best.  Without this initial production minimum we would be unable to bring this product to market as the cost would simply be astronomical.
  • We always envisioned this product to be in households across the world and not just for the wealthiest 1% of the population.  Therefore we need this production minimum to put the product within reach of people anywhere with 6-20 towels currently sitting on shelves in the bathroom, and taking up considerable energy to wash every week.

The Perks

At the top of our reward level we have an actual body dryer.  This is the only place in the world where you can get this product and we are willing to basically pass it along at cost so we can hit our production min.

Early Adopters Reward $125 (limited to 150): An actual numbered Body Dryer off the production line. SOLD OUT

Platinum Reward $150 (Unlimited):  The Early adopters may have gotten here first but we still have a Body Dryer for you!

2 Pack Bundle $250 (Limited 150): We have received substantial interest from households looking to put more than one of these products in their home, and with this perk you can can have 2 Body Dryers to use. Please note that the shipping costs are per unit.  Domestic shipping for the 2 pack bundle would be $50 ($25 each) and International would be $100 ($50 each).

Distributors Package $425 (limited to 40): For those people interested in distributing the product or those with large families we offer 4 body dryers at a considerable discount.  SOLD OUT

Distributors 6 Pack Bundle $650 (Limited to 20):  If your looking to resell this product and join the Body Dryer revolution we have the perk for you.  This perk includes 6 Body Dryers and will be the largest increment offered during this campaign.

Other Ways You Can Help 

If you can't contribute to our campaign that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Please pass on a link to our campaign and spread the word of the Body Dryer
  • Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

  • Q. How is the product powered?
  • A. The invention is powered by a 5 foot power cord that connects to an electrical outlet
  • Q. Will the invention work in countries outside of the USA?
  • A.  Yes, we will produce two versions of the invention to allow for users outside of the USA to use the invention with their voltage requirements.
  • Q.  I forgot to add shipping, what should I do?
  • A.  You can either add shipping ($25 domestic $50 international per unit) at the time of making your contribution or after by selecting the shipping perk that fits your shipping needs.
  • Q.  What is the weight limit for the machine?
  • A.  The listed weight limit for the machine is 325 pounds but can sustain additional weight if needed.
  • Q.  When buying the 6 pack, 4 pack, or 2 pack bundle what is the shipping cost?
  • A.  The shipping cost is still calculated by unit and is $25 per domestic unit (4 pack perk would be $100 to ship domestically) and $50 Internationally per unit (4 pack perk would be $200 to ship internationally).

Body Dryer Contest Winner

We had over 400 applicants for our Body Dryer contest.  Each applicant was awarded a number and then a random number selection was done and...

Heather Hagoort was the winner.  We will contact everyone via email and thank you for your participation in the contest, and hope you will support the campaign as well!

Thank you for your time and consideration!

We had over 400 applicants for our Body Dryer contest.  Each applicant was awarded a number and then a random number selection was done and...Heather
