 was the winner.  We will contact everyone via email and thank you for your participation in the contest, and hope you will support the campaign as well!Thank you for your time and consideration!

story: My name is Shay and I  work with baby Kaden's mother, Angie Griffith. At the age of 6 weeks old, Kaden was diagnosed with Spinal Muscular Atrophy (SMA Type 1). It all began when he was not able to hold his head up and he seemed he was losing strength in his arms and legs, Angie and her husband rushed Kaden to the Children's Mercy Hospital in Kansas City MO where they did multiple test and genetic testing which came back positive for SMA type 1. The medical team at CMH explained the disease and the prognosis as not good. SMA type 1 is a very serious disease and most kids do not live long because it affects and deteriorates the muscle which will affect his lungs, and his ability to eat. At this point while Kaden is healthy, they have an appointment for him to have a GI tube inserted so when the time comes they can still feed him.  They have many more doctor visits and hospital visits in their future, which can add up and become very costly and not to mention all of the medical equipment such as bi-pap, c-pap machine, and new car seat that lays down in the back of a car so when the time comes he can lay down to help him breath. I am asking for donations to help support this family and help pay any medical bills or pay for any equipment that is not covered by insurance. This is a terrible disease and no family should have to deal with and watch their child die slowly. It is very heartbreaking and I want to try to help them out as much as possible so they can spend every moment with Kaden and not worry about expenses. Please help out this family in this tough time. If you want to learn more about SMA here is a website that explains the disease in more detail fsma.org. Thank you!

story:
Starsignia.de - Vorbilder und Helden beflügeln!


Wir glauben an die Bedeutung von Vorbildern

  • Starsignia glaubt an die positive Macht von Vorbildern.


  • Die meisten Menschen haben keine Möglichkeit, mit Ihrem Idol in direkten Kontakt zu treten.

  • Wir inspirieren Menschen, über sich hinaus zu wachsen indem wir Ihnen Nähe zu ihrem Vorbild schaffen.

  • Wir bieten mit dem individuellen Audiogramm ein Produkt, das diese positive Energie zwischen Star und Fan erlebbar macht. 


Fan Feedback Januar 2014: "Hallo Starsignia-Audiogramm-Team! Heute kam das Audiogramm von Dominic Peitz für die Hochzeit meines Bruders. Es ist super! Gerne hätte ich auch das Echtheitszertifikat. Vielen Dank für Ihre Hilfe! Viele Grüße!"

http://play.starsignia.de/be0f3570-87f2-11e3-b6f0-a9df0fa618b7



Was Starsignia braucht & was wir den Fans und ihren Helden zurückgeben

  • Wir sind live! Seit dem Go-live letztes Jahr wurden bereits hunderte von Fans persönlich von ihren Vorbildern angesprochen. Und mit dem Karlsruher Sportclub und den Stuttgarter Kickers haben wir bereits zwei Bundesliga Vereine überzeugt, mit etlichen weiteren sind wir bereits im Gespräch!
  • Wir wollen erreichen, dass möglichst viele Vorbilder und Fans mitmachen. Dazu werden wir die Vertriebspower erhöhen, mit Eurer Hilfe wird es uns gelingen viele Helden aus der 1. Fußball Bundesliga zu überzeugen!
  • Auch beim Produkt werden wir nachlegen: Design, Videogramm, PlayerApp sollen für ein emotionales Erlebnis ausgebaut werden.

http://play.starsignia.de/af478b40-9338-11e3-9ab6-35b44386543a



Deine Chance auf Nähe zum Vorbild!

  • Keine Möglichkeit auf ein persönliches Autogramm von Deinem Star? Starsignia löst das Problem!
  • Stars und Vereinen fehlen heutzutage effektive Tools für die digitale Vermarktung - Starsignia löst das Problem. 

  • Innovativ: Der Markt für Sportmerchandising beträgt 18 Mrd. $ plus zusätzliches Potenzial in anderen Branchen wie Musik, Entertainment und TV. Die Starsignia Innovation greift diesen Markt digital an.

http://play.starsignia.de/4265abd0-5f3d-11e3-9636-89defd3c2383



Das einzigartige Erlebnis der Audiogrammkarte - powered by starsignia.de 


Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann

  • Habt ihr einen Verein oder einen Hero? Jeder kann bei Starsignia mitmachen!

  • Glaubt an die positive Energie von Vorbildern und macht mit!

story:
We want to become the First and Biggest International Beach Volleyball Tour for Amateurs. We want to offer you the chance to enjoy your vacations playing beach volleyball on the most beautiful beaches in the world. To do so, we need your help. To be able to carry out tens of events all over the world every year, publishing the official calendar well in advance to give you the chance to organize your holiday's time. We need your investment in this first step onto the new level. Become a BVAW 2.0 member and enjoy vacations for the rest of your life like you never did before!!




IS IT BEACH VOLLEYBALL YOUR PASSION ALL YEAR LONG ?

COME TO PLAY ALL YEAR LONG ALL OVER THE WORLD


WANT TO DISCOVER AMAZING PLACES TO PLAY ?

BE A MEMBER AND TAKE THE OPPORTUNITY TO PLAY IN EACH CONTINENT

WANT TO HAVE BEACH PARTY AFTER A GREAT PLAYING DAY ?

BE A BVAW 2.0 MEMBER AND ENJOY BEACH PARTIES ON ALL THE EVENTS


Join BVAW 2.0 and be part of the future on beachvolley!

ATTENTION: all BVAW 2.0 events will be reserved to members only.

To take part to BVAW 2.0 events you just need to be a member! and 25$ will be the annual fee.

By participating to this campaign, you can take the opportunity to:


LIFETIME MEMBER for 50$ only!


Donate now 25 $ and become member for 2 years instead of 1 year!


JOIN THE NEW ERA OF BVAW

Starting from 2016, all the events will be reserved to BVAW members only!

And there will be 4 kind of events (4 formats):

BVAW CHALLENGE

Locations proposed by BVAW 2.0 members!  

4 days events and 2 beach parties, closed to 500 BVAW 2.0 members

BVAW TRAINING CAMP

BVAW coaches and PRO beachers to lead the trainings

7 days from Monday to Sunday, closed to a maximum of 100 BVAW 2.0 members

BVAW MAJOR EVENT

Institutional event organized, amazing locations all around the world

4 days events and 3 beach parties, closed to 1000 BVAW 2.0 members

More than 10 different categories to choose to play with a maximum of 3 in which you can participate

PREMIUM EVENT

High standard hotels located right by the sea to host a unique high class event

7 days events and 3 beach parties, closed to 400 BVAW 2.0 members

Local excursions and high quality extra services included in the packages to make you live the best sport vacation of your life

BVAW 2.0 means at least 18 events in the next two years


…and more than 200 events before 2020 with more than 100.000 people!!!

Join BVAW 2.0 and you can take advantage of the largest offer of beachvolley events all around the world.

To develop this plan, BVAW 2.0 will be supported by "BeachVolley Services": a start-up dedicated to design, promote and realize all BVAW events.


HELP US to MAKE IT HAPPEN WITHOUT RISKS...

If this "BVAW 2.0 campaign" will not completely reach its goal, we'll carry on our program but a bit slowly and planning less events every year. We can ensure in any case all perks to all contributors, starting from the launch event of Mallorca in May 2016...


 BEACH VOLLEY AROUND the WORLD

BVAW 2.0 means a PROFESSIONAL APPROACH for AMATEURS.
BVAW is the most spectacular and structured association of amateur beach volleyball able to arrange events all around the world. Even FIVB (International Volley Ball Federation) defines BVAW as a benchmark (http://www.fivb.org/download/FIVB_BVE_Promotion...) with its worldwide tour characterized by an experienced  and professional approach. They also underline the unique combination of fascinating locations, people integration, every day celebrations and fantastic beach parties, taking care also in the mean time about sporting side and playing beach volleyball all days long with pro athletes and amateurs.

 BVAW 2.0, from an ASSOCIATION to a COMMUNITY!

2016 is for BVAW a turning point. It's the moment to OPEN this association to all people and associations who interested to spread all around the world the events and principles of BVAW. Transforming BVAW in a real 2.0 COMMUNITY.

All members will have the opportunity to actively live in the biggest beachvolley community! To enjoy amazing locations, playing tens of beachvolley match and partecipating at the most exciting beach parties... but, overall, sharing experiences with people coming from all over the world.

          

The "BVAW 2.0" has mainly three objectives:

- to create the most fantastic beach volleyball international tour for amateurs all around the world

- to develop the association by creating BVAW 2.0 COMMUNITY, where each member can propose an event and  the community will define the annual calendar of events to be run worldwide

- to create "BeachVolley Service", the operating structure that will work alongside with the new BVAW 2.0, to realize and manage the BVAW events all around the world.

As it has always been, in every BVAW event "You are the Star!" Regardless of your technical or phisical capabilities. Starting from 2016 each BVAW Event will be dedicated only to BVAW 2.0 members. And, participating to BVAW 2.0, you can ensure yourself the posibility to participate to next BVAW events not only as "the Star", but also as the producer of your BVAW event!!!

 What We Need & What You Get

To reach our goals, that means implement "BVAW 2.0" & create "BeachVolley Services", we need US $200.000 to:

-  increase the number of annual events all over the world;

-  develop actual association by creating the new BVAW 2.0, communication and marketing to approach members, institutions and sponsors, and to keep the community alive; 

-  support the startup of "BeachVolley SERVICE", which is the new company that will be in charge to organize all the BVAW events.

Participating in this campaign you will help us to realize our project and you will get an unique opportunity to be part of the new BVAW 2.0!!! You will join the biggest beachvolley community where sport is the vehicle to meet people and beaches, sharing cultures,  languages,  all together united by the same spirit of sharing and solidarity.

 Who we are

BVAW - “Beach Volley Around the World” - was founded in Switzerland in 2009 and aims to organize beach volley events worldwide. Each event is a perfect mix of sport, holiday and party. Characterized by friendship, people integration, solidariety and care for the environment..

We are a group of experienced professionals in all managerial, operational and technical areas:

- OTELLO VIZZINO  

President & co-founder of BVAW - General Coordination

- JOSE SALEMA 

Former Olympian International Beach Volleyball Athlete representing Argentina

Vice president e BVAW co-founder BVAW - Operations Coordination

- KARIM LEVY 

Official International Beach Volleyball Photographer & Social media / Beach volleyball coordinator at the FFVB

Communications Coordination 

- CHEMA SANCHEZ 

Professional speaker and event entertainer for international events

Entertainment Coordination

- and tens of others people joined us in the last 5 years. 

BVAW is also partner of the International Federation FIVB and several National Federations. BVAW always works closely with local authorities and government to ensure the success of each event in full compliance with laws and regulations.

 

 

Since 2009 BVAW has organized so many events in several countries such as Spain, Italy, Holland, Greece, Austria, Switzerland, France, Thailand, Argentina, Morocco and Turkey. With thousands of participants coming from 35 countries.


Each member will also be engaged to discuss about organizational issue, from technical ones, to stages, locations, dates, etc... You really become the "producer" of your next BVAW event!

BVAW 2.0: founders, management and members

BVAW 2.0 is born as an evolution of  BVAW, so founders of this new association are the founders of BVAW themselves.

Otello Vizzino will be confirmed as the PRESIDENT of the new BVAW 2.0.

The management of the community will be delegated to two teams:

- a BOARD of DIRECTORS, composed by the President and 6 others directors; three of them named by the President and three elected every two years by BVAW 2.0 Gold members. The board will have mainly in charge the definition of the annual calendar of BVAW events and the official partnership with institutions.

- a TECHNICAL COMMITTEE, composed by 5 people named by the Board of Directors every two years.

They have mainly to coach and support  all members interested in organizing a BVAW event and to assessment and validate all event proposals coming from the members.

 There will be two kinds of members:

- Gold Members: those who really believe in BVAW 2.0 and partecipate to the crowdfunding campaign by paying (at least) 50 dollars. They will be lifetime members and will enjoy BVAW 2.0 forever! Moreover, they will also have the right to vote, every two years, for the election of three directors in the Board of Directors.

BE CAREFUL : Available only during the crowfunding campaign


- Members: everyone can decide in any moment to become a member of BVAW 2.0 by paying a 25 dollars as annual fee.  Take this chance: for this crowdfunding campaign those who choose the perk of 25 dollars will become member for two years


REMEMBER: STARTING FROM 2016 ALL BVAW 2.0 EVENTS WILL BE RESERVED TO MEMBERS ONLY!!!

Why to become MEMBER of BVAW 2.0

 SPECIAL OFFERS for ASSOCIATIONS

You are a beach-volley amateur association? Join us with all your members and get the opportunity to access to special discount !

Contact us for any details: development@bvaw.org

story:
Hello Everyone and Namaste (I honor and respect you)

My name is Kristin Mirabelle. I started Bushwick Brooklyn's 1st Donation Based Yoga & Healing Arts Community, in New York.

What you are supporting:

For the first time ever I am reaching out to the public to help me, as I strongly feel the calling right now to advance my studies within shamanic and other healing modalities, so I may bring that to empower peoples' physical and mental health.

Alto Paraiso, Brazil, is a meeting place for shamans and holistic health gurus from around the world. It also is a clear place for me to go through my healing process, as is always a part of any training to advance in this type of work.

With this wisdom, I will be working towards advancing my knowledge to be a clear healer, helping treat and prevent "dis-ease", by empowering your own internal healing tools. I wish to break people free of their dependency on the American health care system (however sometimes it has its uses and is very necessary also).

More About Me:

For over 2 years I have made healing available to people of all backgrounds and financial income.

Within this time my beloved partner,John Kazar- founder of the Boutique Yoga space, have been hosting shamans and other healers from around the world to provide extremely deep and powerful healing.

In this time we have not generated an income from these efforts, as we have been in service from the purity of our heart, with the hope of bringing transformation through divine light.

More about the Magic Land in Alto Paraiso, Brazil:

We have been involved in helping our dear friend Seroshka with his new development of the Magic Land, a beautiful "center" being birthed in Alto Paraiso, Brazil, which is on top of the largest quartz crystal deposit on the planet. http://triptomagicland.com/

Here I hope to offer a bridge for New Yorkers to come and experience the pure and natural healing of the earth, the jungle, the animals, and the sense of community and family that is available here.

More on My Goals:

I turn to you now to help me follow my dream so I may reap the benefits of this healing, and also be in assistance to support those who wish to visit us here on this magical land.

With this monetary goal, I will be purchasing my ticket and covering my travel expenses for the 2 months that I am there, and with being frugal, hopefully having a little of it left over to allow myself to safely land back on my feet here in Brooklyn, NY.

Any money I make over my goal will go to the next campaign we will be launching to give birth to a new home in nature for Boutique Yoga, here in NY. More to come....

I am open to receiving these gifts and will be sure to return the love to all who contribute. Thank you for your support and God Bless.

story:
There's something about a haircut and what it does to a man that stirs my passion. It gives a man more confidence in himself than he had before. Confidence in going to an interview and getting that job. Confidence in going to a meeting and giving the best presentation. Confidence in himself to walk up to his long time crush, and finally asking her out. Getting a fresh clean cut, there's nothing like it. It almost draws a line between "success" and "failure". What a man thinks of himself, he is and I truly believe that. 

In this life you either "build" or "destroy". And I feel that every time I'm giving a man a haircut, not only am I making him look good, but I'm also building him up for success. This is my way of giving back to my community and to this world. A community/world of men that have the confidence to be successful one haircut at a time. 

I grew up in the housing projects in Bayview San Francisco, a well known community that I love. There are things as a young man growing up here that you know is prevalent, drugs, violence, shootings. You see it all day, everyday, and when it hits our community it hits everyone but young men of color the most. I sit with them for a couple of minutes and we talk about things that our happening, could be a job interview, the future, going out with a girl. These are conversations that don't happen often here, to talk about "a future". There is a confidence that come within those moments that you're able to make your next move confidently. Even if it seems like just a haircut to some.

To cut hair in a barbershop has been my dream for so long. I don't want for this dream to just be a dream. I want this dream to be an accomplishment. I want to be able to say "I'm a Barber and I "Love" my job!" Most people can't say that. But even more so, I want to be able to get my kids out the hood and into a better environment. I want to build my kids up in a better neighborhood. Away from the drugs, violence, gun shots and killings. They're still babies and they do not need to be exposed to those things. My kids stay in the house all day because I'm afraid to let them play outside. This Barbering skill is our ticket out of this trap. I want to come back though and organize community events for free hair cuts for the kids of my neighborhood who have to stay here.

All contributions towards this campaign will go towards barber college tuition, books, supplies. With your contribution, not only will you help instill confidence in men everywhere, but you will also be helping a father get his family out of the hood. Your contribution would mean so much to my family and I no matter if it's a $1 or $5. We would still be grateful. And if you're not able to contribute, just a re-post on your Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, or whatever/whoever you network with would mean a lot.

story:
Garine Lapoyan was not only my cousin but also one of the most caring, beautiful and fun loving people I knew. We were always close, despite the geography that separated us and we always looked forward to hanging out during those long summer holidays. 

Garine had a fighting spirit that truly amazed me. It was this will to survive that pulled her through four cancer battles. Doctors told us her chances were slim and to prepare for the worst but she proved them wrong every time. 

On August 1st 2012, Garine was unable to overcome her cancer battle the fifth time around. Her passing left a void which will never disappear. 

When I took the decision to climb Mount Ararat only a couple of weeks' ago, I knew I wanted to challenge my body and push myself to the limit. I will not lie. The prospect of rising over 5,137m (16,854 feet) above the ground is daring but it's a mountain that is surmountable.

This mission to reach the top of Mount Ararat celebrates the will to fight, to not give up and ultimately grab all of life's wonderful opportunities.

If you would like to support my journey, please leave messages on the wall and donate. The proceeds will be going to the Ewing's Sarcoma Research Foundation, a non-profit organisation founded by Garine to help fund global research to find the cure. 

Thanking you from the bottom of my heart. 

Gio

#4GARINE

story:
Tomorrow there is a concert in Wayne NJ with a bunch of cool bands!  Some of the bands have been feeling under the weather so we have decided to chip in to help keep them safe and rockin every night! 

 Our goal is $19 but indiegogo has required a minimum goal of $500.  All the money funded towards this campaign will be donated to the bands tomorrow night at the concert!  Here are some of the bands playing!

LA LUNA - From Cananada

The Sky Above and Earth Below - from Portland!

Carrion Spring - From Portland!

Capacities - from NJ

all the hours you wait - from NJ!

Please consider attending this concert!  We will be accepting cups of self heating soup and Flinstones Chewable Vitamins.  All of the touring bands will be on tour until mid-august and definitely appreciate any help they can get!  You can read more about the concert here!

story:
My nephew Ian. What can I say he is the most amazing child I have ever met with the most amazing sense of humor and always greats you with a smile. He is resilient and strong yet every day he faces pain constant pain.

Ian has what's known as EB (Epidermolysis Bullosa). you may ask "what is that"? Well it is an inherited connective tissue disease causing blisters in the skin and mucosal membranes, Its severity ranges from mild to lethal.


As a result, the skin is extremely fragile. Minor friction or trauma will separate the layers of the skin and form blisters. Often referred to as Butterfly Children due to the fact that their skin is as fragile as the wings of a butterfly. It's much like a severe burn in Ian's case all over his body. Ian lives in severe pain on constant pain medication to try to help keep him comfortable.
A bump or scratch or even moving the wrong way can case the skin blister and break. It's a constant battle, one area of the skin heals and then blisters again or won't heal at all. Scar tissue develops making it even worse restricting the movement of arms and legs and even opening the mouth. It doesn't stop there, blisters also develop internally in the eyes, nose, mouth and throat. For EB kids the risk of infection is high and can be fatal. Regular bandage changes are required and are nothing short of horrible and extremely painful.


In short it is a horrific disease, extremely painful and debilitating. Ian was born with RDEB which is considered to be a severe strain of this disease. Ian is bandaged from head to toe  with blistering and open wounds over most of his body. Ian is unable to walk and is confined to a wheel chair. Ian can not sit up on his own or dress himself and requires constant care. When born Ian was not given much chance of survival and wasn't expected to still be with us today. It is a shear miracle Ian is still with us today and has reached the age of 14.


87% of children born with one of the more sever forms of EB like Ian's do not live more then 12 months.


Ian enjoys arts and crafts, likes painting and drawing and watching the Food Network on TV. He enjoys spending time with his Brothers and Sister and his little kitten. Ian dreams of being a Firefighter when he grows up. He collects firefighting memorabilia and just loves all things do do with firefighting. He has an amazing attitude for a child who is in so much pain. With all the procedures he has to endure Ian still manages to retain his sense of humor and I don't know how.


Ian had the chance of a life time a few weeks ago to travel to Ohio to the Cincinnati Children's Hospital EB Clinic. The reason for his visit was to tackle the issue of how Ian will be able to eat.
Ian has a feeding tube in his nose which provides him with vital nutrition. However in order to continue to insert a feeding tube every few months Ian has to undergo the procedure of having his esophagus dilated. This is alway a risky procedure as the esophagus is very thin and fragile to start with. Ian has had this procedure so many times it is no longer safe to continue to insert this tube. Without it Ian would be unable to eat and unable to survive. High amounts of nutrition are required to help the body heal the skin and fight infection.


His trip to Cincinnati was to hopefully find another way for Ian to be given food. In the past other methods had been tried and failed due to the deterioration of his skin.


Ian's visit was a huge success in one way as the doctors will in the coming weeks be able to dilate his esophagus and remove the tube from his nose. However he will have to under go a surgical procedure to insert a Mickey Button in his belly. At the same time Ian will have to have a total of 10 teeth removed, children with EB often have huge issues with teeth.


If that is not enough during his visit to Cincinnati it was discovered that his spleen and liver were enlarged and after further investigation they found 2 tumors one on each adrenal gland. Ian has spent the last 4 weeks in Cincinatti Childrens Hospital. currentley they have discovered Ian has Fibrosis of the liver and his liver is leaking fluid and we have yet to find a resolution. 

Ian is experiancing an awful lot of pain and is becoming very home sick for his family. Ian and Delicia have been alone at CCH while the rest of the family is at home. Ian is missing his family and his brothers and sister as well as his Daddy and Grandparents. He is finding it very hard at the moment.
 .
Ian's brothers and sister have to continue with school and my sisters husband has to continue work to keep the roof over their head and it is going to be impossible for them to manage all this without help. A one income family who is struggling to survive as it is can not possible manage this and that's why we need your help.

Our aim is to raise as much as we can to help cover the costs the on going costs for Delicia and Ian to remain at CCH and to assist the family with visits on the weekend to help keep Ian's spirits up.

Any future medical care for Ian will be address in Cincinnati as they have the specialist with the experience needed to treat Ian. The local hospital where Ian has been treated feels that Ian's medical needs have become to specialized for them to continue to handle. So Ian will now be faced with traveling to Cincinnati for just about everything.


We just can't afford to cover the trips to Ohio alone we need to raise as much as we can to help Ian and his family during this very dificult time. The cost of travel, food, accommodation for extended stays will mount quickly and Ian really need your help.

If you could find in your heart to help Ian it would mean the world to Ian and his family. Any donation no matter how small can help. If you would like to offer any assistance at all in any way please email at helpian@hotmail.com.
We will be posting regular updates on Ian's Facebook Page,

Twitter Page & Blog.
Facebook: www.facebook.com/ian.swarr.37 please follow Ian's Story.

You can visit Ian's web page: www.helpian.weebly.com
Follow Ian on Twitter: https://twitter.com/HelpIan1
Please follow Ian's Blog Online

Thank You For Taking The Time To Read About Ian
Ian's Aunt Jessica

 

Please see Ian's Web page for Updates as we had run out of space here to share them all!

 

www.helpian.weebly.com

story:
I’m Ruth Ann Bowen and I’m Dave Lutzweiler’s daughter.  As most of you know, my dad has Squamous-Cell Carcinoma.  This is a rare and aggressive form of cancer.  The tumor is currently located in his left jaw which is swollen outward approximately 3 inches and stretches about 5 inches across his face.

Conventional treatment meant cutting away a major portion of his lower-left face, followed by radiation and chemotherapy.  The doctors offered no guarantees or reassurances.  Therefore, he opted for alternative hyperthermia treatments in Germany; he has been there twice and will likely need to return.

We all know that dealing with insurance companies these days is both complicated and frustrating.  My dad's insurance company refused to pay anything toward these treatments.  He was then forced to pay out of pocket on his credit cards.  This has left my parents in a dire financial situation.  

Frankly, they need your help.  Without your assistance they simply cannot pay their bills.  His creditors are demanding payments immediately.

The Impact

You know my father.  He would not ask for help if it wasn't truly needed, and he's spent a lifetime helping others.  To be honest, it took a lot of work to convince him to allow me to start this campaign.

Every penny you donate will go to paying the cost of these cancer treatments.  In doing this, you will literally save my parents from financial ruin.  Furthermore, you just might help save his life.

By donating to this cause you'll also be making a statement about our choices in medical care.  Currently, insurance companies and drug companies hold all the cards.  They refuse to allow doctors and patients viable alternatives.  This is unacceptable.  My dad shouldn't have been made to choose between having his face disfigured beyond recognition and flying to Germany for weeks at a time.

Other Ways You Can Help

I know you might not be able to assist financially.  The economy has hit many of us very hard.  You can still pray.  You can still ask others to pray.  You can get the word out to others who might be interested in aiding my father in this life and death struggle.

Please remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

 

Thanks in advance and many blessings,

Ruth Ann Bowen

story:
GREAT NEWS!!! THE BILL CAME IN FOR THE REPAIRS AND IT WAS ONLY $405!!!!!!! WE ONLY HAVE $234 TO GO. THANKS TO EVERYONE WHO HAS DONATED!!!!!

Every year we throw a Luau party! My mom and Joe are always gracious enough to have this party at their house as they have plenty of room. A lot of time, effort and money go's into this party every year. We do it because its fun and gives people, friends and the community a chance to get together.

This year, someone hit their well pump. In order to do this, they had to drive beyond where the cones were set up in the front yard. There is no way that they could not have any damage to their vehicle. This person has yet to come forward but a police report has been filed. Homeowners insurance deductible was $3,994. (This very well may have been an accident and the person did not know they hit the pump.)

I will be accepting donations in ANY amount to try to help them recoup some of the cost. There is no obligation on anyones part to donate but I thought it would be a nice thing to do since they graciously allow the Luau party to be held at their property.

story:
Riocath catheter represents a new method of catheterization of urinary bladder which is expected to virtually eliminate pain and trauma during insertion as well as the risk of urinary tract infection often caused by catheterization. It is suitable both for all acute urinary bladder catheterizations as well as for paraplegics´ who require chronic, intermittent catheterization.

 

 

 

How the “IDEA” evolved…

 

 

 
It may sound crazy but the inventor of Riocath catheters, Dr. Miroslav Svoboda,  literally woke up one morning with the idea of inside-out principle of catheterization in his head. It actually felt quite odd to him initially, because he couldn't understand where were dreams like that coming from...
But in a short time he started feeling sort of internal pressure, because he felt that if this idea could be changed into a real functional catheter, it could truly revolutionize the present practice and procedure of catheterization and more importantly, it could really, really help a lot of seriously ill people.
It is likely no coincidence that he has a unique mix of experience in this particular area - he underwent multiple catheterization as a patient, because he spent two years in hospitals recovering from serious injuries he suffered from rock-climbing. In addition, in his work as a doctor and surgeon he often applied catheters to his patients. Being able to experience these procedures from both sides has compelled him to dedicate all of his efforts over the past year to this project and bring these catheters to people in need.
 
 
Legal coverage - Riocath Medical Devices, a.s. (Inc.)

At present, we have established a company dedicated to development, production and marketing of catheters based on the “inside-out” RIOCATH principle. Shareholders in this corporation are, besides the inventor, also some of his business partners as well as strategic partners you have heard mentioned in the videos. We have determined that a private corporation (designated by Inc. in the US or a.s. in Czech) is the most appropriate form of legal entity for this purpose.

 

 

 

Target groups

Above anything else we would be happy for support from anybody who will find this idea beneficial and useful and we hope you will use ongoing Christmas and advent time to make a sincere decision.

But the fact is, that this project is designed for people who will appreciate the advantages of RIOCATH catheterization, because their lives depends on them being able to use urinal catheters several times per day – that’s especially true for paraplegics and similarly affected people practicing so called "intermittent catheterization", modern way of bladder management. Especially for these people our catheter will be of valuable help by protecting them from urinary tract infections, injuries and consequently increasing their quality of life…

Very close to these patients are also home care and healthcare insurance companies, who are involved in long term care of patients, which can also benefit very much from this project.

And finally, we would like to maximize production of our catheters to make them available to as many patients as possible. We therefore offer medical device producers an open license for the duration of our patent protection (c/a 20 years).

For all these groups we prepared Perks specifically designed for each of them.

 

 

What we want
We are also offering to all producers an opportunity to apply RIOCATH principle according to their needs and wishes. Anybody can buy an open license for a very reasonable fee and start production of its own line of catheters based on the RIOCATH principle.

With the help of market-management tools, especially by keeping the price of our own products affordable and fully comparable to price of standard catheters, we will regulate the price of RIOCATH urinary catheters at the level of present catheters. We will need to build up our own producing plant to be able to fulfill this. Despite the tremendous advantages of our RIOCATH catheters we WILL NOT charge any „additional premium“.

 

 

 

Our supporters

First, we would like to stress that because of the collective efforts of all involved parties we have passed the idea stage and moved to a completely defined project phase with a proven prototype, developed manufacturing solution and a strong professional team. We are supported by Institute of Organic Chemistry and Biochemistry (well known as the workplace of professor Holy, inventor of the most effective medicals for treating of AIDS. We are fully prepared and equipped to realize the project.

 

 

 

How we will use funds

During the year 2015 we will complete all phases of development, enforcing of global patent protection, clinical testing, certification and registration minimally in the EU and USA.

Also we are in a close co-operation with a company specialized in 3D printing. Currently we are using 3D printing for the production of master models and molds. We expect being able to apply this technology on production level enabling direct 3D printing of catheters for us.

 

 

 

 

 

Budget 

 

(in thousands of USD)

 

Producing blueprints (CAD/CAM) for catheters and production plant 80
Building of production plant (buying and completing of hardware) 1.250
Renting of space for production plant placement 22
Basic clinical testing necessary for certification and registration 250
Certification and registration EU, USA 40
Presentation at trade fairs and medical congresses 30
IP protection (patent applications and trade mark applications) 60
Raw materials for samples and perks production 36
Salaries of our own employees 75
Energy (6 months production) 6
Perks shipment, tax and customs payments 11
Payment to INDIEGOGO provider (c/a 4 % ) 40
Payments to providers of credit cards
Reserve 100
 
Total funding need (100%) 2,000
Possible funding from European funds (40 %)  800
Funding from Indiegogo (40 %)  800
Our invested money (20 %)  400


 

 

 

 

What is our own investment to this day?

 

  • Two and half years of inventor’s individual work (looking for, finding and negotiating members of team, designing of basic patent application, creating business plan, establishing shareholding company as subject implementing this project), finding strategic partners.
  • 1 year work of 8 team members.
  • development and production of models and samples at development workshops.
  • development of protocol for clinical testing.
  • development of documentation necessary for certification and registration.
  • … and much more

story:
PLEASE help us with this HUGE Triple Fundraiser. By making a donation today you will be helping 3 HUGE benefits at the same time.  Your donations will make a HUGE difference today.  HOPE FOR HAILEY, Saving our Trees and Global Warming, Hope for hundreds of Children with Cancer every year that attend Nationwide Children's Hospital Foundation.

1)Hailey is 15 years old & has a VERY rare stage 4 lung cancer (Myofibroblastic sarcoma) and has numerous cancer growths within her body. She has had several surgeries to remove multiple tumors as well. Hailey is currently taking chemo pills to reduce the size of the nodules In her lungs. EACH pill cost $200 and she takes them once a week. They are considering removing 25% of her lung,  & they found one of the nodules might be closely wrapped to one of the main arteries in her heart and may not be able to be removed. Hailey also has tumor growths on one of her legs, which may result in her leg being amputated. Hailey is a sophomore in High School in Medford, Oregon. She is currently very active in school, and has been chosen as one of the schools Sparrow Girls, which is a non-profit organization of school based clubs that assists children in medical crisis and their families.    It has been VERY rough for Hailey keeping active & being enrolled in school and keeping her grades up, while having to be in & out of hospitals, surgeries and doctor appointments.  But Hailey is a VERY bright girl, and a very STRONG girl. And although she has already been through so much, we know there are still rougher roads ahead.  By helping HOPE FOR HAILEY you will be making a huge difference in her life, and helping her with the proper medical treatments she needs. Every donation will also help Hailey's family be able to support her through this fight.  Please consider donating to help Hailey and her family to cover expenses through this devastating time. If you would like to donate through check, or would like to contact the organizer of this campaign, please send an email to: rnshelmer@aol.com

2)We are a Company that manufactures Lifetime Lumber and we have agreed to donate 10% of each board that is manufactured each and every year to "Nationwide Children's Hospital Foundation of Columbus, Ohio. At Nationwide Children’s Hospital Foundation, they are creating the future of pediatric health care. They are more than just a hospital. They are one of America’s largest pediatric health care and research centers delivering care to more than one million patients visiting each year. Families travel from around the nation and around the globe to access life-saving treatments – many unavailable anywhere else. They have 68 facilities extending out across Ohio and even further. It’s the pediatric expertise every child needs. At this hospital, the future health and potential of all children is being shaped. Their doctors and researchers are revolutionizing your child’s health and the health of future generations.

.http://www.nationwidechildrens.org/about-nation...

3)By helping the Environment with Saving Millions of Trees, and helping with Global warming at the same time.     Our company "PRESERVA BOARD INC"  which manufactures Lifetime Lumber, will SAVE millions of TREES by our lumber being a lifetime lasting product,  unlike the lumber used on boat docks and home decks that is available in todays markets, The lumber doesn't last long at all, and then you have to replace boards frequently. This is wasting our lumber and our trees.    SAVING the trees helps our environment with global warming. 

 Preserva Board is Dedicated to HELP with Children's Cancer, and we have decided to Team up with Nationwide Children's Hospital Foundation, and we will Donate 10% of each & EVERY lifetime lumber board we manufacture, to HELP with Childrens Cancer.

YOUR Help is Greatly needed today. All we are asking is for YOU to Help out as well,    Even if it is a Single dollar, For HAILEY- every dollar counts.  If we can Donate 10% of every board we manufacture, indefinitely,  then all we ask of you is to  PLEASE make a contribution. Spread the word to everyone you know and help us get Hailey the help she needs, so she can overcome her cancer.

By making a Donation of $5.00 or more, you will receive a Custom Neon orange silicon wrist bracelet to show your support for HOPE FOR HAILEY.  Show off your Orange Neon today and help Brighten up HAILEYS tomorrow.

story:
I am a Life Coach and have Loved Dancing most of my life. Through my "Positive Life Skills" program, I've experienced a spiritual and physical transformation. Having created a healthier, happier life, feeling worthy of Love.. No longer feeling I had no Value, I went back to my Passion.. DANCE! Then continued to release over 150 lbs. My Mantra is "A Positive In Is A Positive Out.” 

The Light Body Healing Center acquired a very large partially renovated older home in Provo, Utah and built in the early 1900's. Due  to unexpected and needed repair costs, we are now unable to complete mandatory projects such as framing, painting, plumbing, electrical and for safety reasons, replace flooring. These projects add up to approximately $30,000.. This is The Healing Center's Campaign Target. We also have a short Wish List, extra items that would greatly increase our ability to provide services for the Clients in our community. We would like to install a third Sensory Deprivation Float Tank in order to provide incredible healing to more of our community each day!

"Light Body Healing Center" provides a safe haven in order to help Children and Adults to work through issues that tell them they are unworthy of being who they truly want to be, A happy, healthy, positive person!
Along with several other like-minded Practitioners & Staff, we help Clients struggling with Pain Management, Fibromyalgia, Stress Relief, PTSD, Depression, Anxiety, Sports Injuries, Weight Loss, Addiction Recover and much more.

Healing is painful and the Tank Floats, LED Light Therapy, Massage and Yoga are all part of the process. These modalities are an incredible tool and resource to help clients understand why it is important to reconnect the physical, spiritual and emotional connections again. We share tools that help Clients create new Life Skills. These skills empower Clients to honestly say, "They have Value and are Worthy."

*** BODY: We believe that a healthy and strong body is the foundation of an abundant life. We offer several therapies and classes that will assist one in achieving optimal physical, emotional and spiritual health. *** MIND: The mind is a garden to be cultivated.  We offer meditation and other modalities that will help one achieve heightened mental states, relaxation, and transformation.  *** SPIRIT: With the body and mind in balance the spirit is able to speak its truth and we are able to better understand the messages. When all three are thriving we are limitless.

story:
Short Summary

 

   Our names are Jason and Audra and we have a story to tell. We met in Feburary of 2010, got engaged Christmas Eve that same year. We were married on July 30th, 2011 and headed down the happy life. It continued when we found out we were pregnant with our soon to be grace of a daughter Kylie on Feburary 16th, 2012. On May 10th, 2012 we found out baby Kylie was hydronephrosis on her kidneys. At that time we were unsure of what that was or how it effected our baby, however we would soon get the diagnosis and scare of our lives. If one of her kidneys was damaged or non-functioning Kylie would be able to do so many things in life unaffected, with no kidneys there was nothing she could do but hold on after birth and live on dialysis until a donor could be found.

     The ultrasound when Audra was 20 weeks pregnant with Kylie had numerous abnormalities that concerned every doctor and tech in the room. Both kidneys were retaining fluid round the skin of the kidney and starting to squeeze the kindeys effecting their ability to work even then. After that we had to have a weekly ultrasounds to monitor how the kidneys were developing (not well). Hard decisions had to be made even before Kylie was born so we had a plan of action when she was born. Doctors were brought in specializing in pediatric kidney problems, a surgical team, and counsellors to help us better understand what was going on and how to deal with it. It was decided that within 24 hours of being born we would need to have a radioligical study performed, this was to be the first of many. She was poked, prodded, sedated and placed in a catheter to be tested for hours shortly after her birth to find out one kydney functioned at 50% of normal and the other at 10% of normal capicity.

   Her left kydney was obstructed and could not function normally. She had fluid building up around her kidney, she also had reflux on the same side pushing fluid back from her bladder. Three issues on the same side was unheard of according to all the doctors studying the case. It was at this time she was labeled as having sever hydronephrosis. The severity of her diagnosis was so much of a mystery that three her doctors wrote papers and journals on the findings. This however did not offer any solution on how to correct the issue. A temporary solution was to put her on antibiotics from day 1 to limit any possible urinary tract infections due to the reflux; however, this has caused Kylie to build an immunity to common childhood antibiotics and has not given her immune system a chance to develop. This has done nothing to fix her kidney problems, just eleviate a possible system.

   Kylie has had 20 ultrasounds starting in utero, 2 renograms (a nuclear medicine test where she is sedated, administered a radioactive dye through an IV, then placed under an X-ray machine for an hour taking constant pictures), 11 ER visits, and over 50 consults with pediatric kidney specialists, surgeons, primary pediatrician, pre-natal physichians, and counsellors. Kylie has made it all the way to the operating table, but it was cancelled while in surgery because the surgeon believed she was cured once on the table. His reasoning was because of a camera and dye test that he did prior to operating, he claims miraculously that she healed herself and it was the first of 30 years of practice. 

 

 

Unfortunately another ultrasound and meeting with the pediatric kidney specialist shows that Kylie is now worse than she has ever been. Doctors here in Albuquerque want to continue to wait and do more studies in time to see if she will fix herself as she gets older, even as all the tests show she is getting worse. 

   We have been recommended to the Colorado Children's Hospital, one of the best childrens hospitals in the country with multiple pediatric kidney experts on staff. Where we can get the expertise we need to get a diagnose and treatment plan for Kylie so she has a chance at a healthy hospital free life going forward.

   We have been able to manage the expenses up to this point, however having to pay specialists and travel to Denver will make it very difficult for us and the rest of our family. Funds will not stop us from helping our baby girl regardless of the cost, we will do what is right for her. This is the story behind our campaign and we appreciate all those that can help.

story:
Like kids?

Don't like fires?

Hate burns?

I'm your man.

This gala is to raise money for the burn society of Calgary for burned children. I know that many of you want to come to the gala but may not be able to. This is your chance to STILL make an impact. Please donate IF YOU ARE UNABLE to make it to the gala. I would be grateful for any amount, you feel free to set the level.

Thank you very much for your help in raising money, this is a cause near and dear to my heart, and I truly thank you for it.

I know that many of you want to come to the gala but may not be able to. This is your chance to STILL make an impact.  Please donate IF YOU ARE UNABLE to make it to the gala.  I would be grateful for any amount, you feel free to set the level.Thank you very much for your help in raising money, this is a cause near and dear to my heart, and I truly thank you for it.

story:
On Thursday,June 19th, on the way from work, our friend Charlene Collins collapsed and was rushed to the hospital. A ruptured  aneurysm was subsequently diagnosed requiring brain surgery.

This surgery took place successfully on the 21st but for the next six weeks, friends and family held their breath. Charlene's network of friends, family and coworkers gave blood and watched Charlene fight her way back from a second stroke while recovering on ward on the 28th, and a month in ICU complicated by blood pressure issues and an infection.

She was released from hospital on Emancipation Day, August 1st, and has begun to work from home with physiotherapy to restore full motor function to her left side which was affected during the second stroke event.

Rodina and Marcia had the idea of a fundraiser to assist with the expenses associated with the physiotherapy which is now critical. Marcia approached the Collins family and after deliberation, word was received that we had their approval. I'm David and the three of us as "Friends of Charlene Collins" then sat down to plan. We reached out to her many friends, in her various groups of talented people, photographers, artists, health and wellness practitioners across social media networks as we looked at ways to do this.

The local Fundraiser on the 27th September, 2014 at 7pm at The Deck is one result of this planning committee.

We hope to raise a minimum of a half million Jamaican Dollars, approximately U$5,000.00
Charlene is 100% Charlene MENTALLY
We want to see
Charlene restored 100% PHYSICALLY.


For this to happen Charlene needs to do just what she is doing - staying optimistic, positive attitude and working everyday at her physiotherapy in the loving supportive environment of friends and family.
That is what we want.
To help offset the costs associated with the quality and quantity of physiotherapy that is now required to restore our Charlene to full and acceptable function. 

I hope that the friends and family overseas, will find this Indiegogo platform as useful as I have found it to be in facilitating funds being raised for worthwhile projects. We have set the target lower than the U$2,500.00 I feel is achievable.
If we make that unstated target, Indiegogo will retain 4% (U$100), Credit card charges of 3% (U$75) and charge a wire transfer U$25.
That would allow U$2300 to be disbursed by them and sent to the account being set up here for Charlene.

If we fail to make the U$1000 target then the Indigogo fee of 4% goes to 9%.

We feel that this is the best way to allow you, friends and family overseas, to be able to participate in the fundraiser with as little inconvenience and as much transparency as possible.  Our tickets locally for the fund raiser is J$1000/ U$9/£6.
I hope that at a minimum, 100 people will find it within reason to donate at least the equivalent of one ticket.
With the flexible funding option chosen, whatever is contributed will be disbursed less the fees mentioned above.

PLEASE MAKE THIS HAPPEN!

    *Mule Train Recovery refers to a dream Charlene had while in ICU of Marcia riding in on a mule to break her out of hospital.*

    A friend just put this note up which made me think of her.
    https://www.facebook.com/notes/rock-stone/mount...

Our Vision

Hi, I’m Kelly, Entrepreneur, Designer, Wife, Mom, and passionate Creator at heart. I help ambitious women transform their personal style and mindset while balancing their career and family. 

I am very passionate about empowering women to look and feel confident, stylish and successful. Every day, I get the opportunity to serve women in my own unique way…and I love it!!

Something that every woman needs...

story:
INTRO AND SUMMARY OF MY PLEA

Every day I feel the impact and torturous effects of constant pervasive “pure tone” noise in my environment and home, in the quiet town of Monterey, MA.

I am not alone. 

Dozens of witnesses have heard the same noxious tones while visiting our town.  Some, forced to shorten their visit, reported to State Public Health Officials about symptoms of pressure in their heads, waking up repeatedly throughout the night, feeling nauseous, anxious, overheated, and experiencing heart palpitations, and problems with hearing aids. 

Others report hearing the noise in their own towns.  Day after I day I hear from people suffering like myself.

Several experts who have investigated this noise, report it is a byproduct of radio frequency radiation pollution caused by dirty electricity, wireless telecommunication devices, DSL, Wi-Fi, and wireless meters.  The air in my town, and yours, is different than it was 10 years ago.  Now it is polluted with invisible carcinogenic electromagnetic radio frequency radiation and its byproducts, pure tone noise, delivered to every neighborhood and home by way of the new emerging Smart Grid infrastructure.  

While higher ambient levels in urban towns (cars, traffic, industries) may disguise the pure tone noise that is so clearly heard in rural areas like Monterey, the hazard of the radiation is equally distributed across the nation.   Our children now play on playgrounds and baseball fields blanketed with free-flying microwaves and the resulting pure tones, blending eerily with sounds of birds chirping and wind through the trees.  This pollution will only get worse, as wireless technology increases exponentially each day.  

The advancement of the smart grid infrastructure coupled with wireless microwave transmitting devices has created a dragon of pollution for all of us to fight.  

I have waged my own battle with utility companies in MA for over 6 years.   Without any background in electricity or radio frequencies, I have been able to persist despite scant legal assistance.  Most lawyers I consulted with confessed to an inadequate grasp of the subject, or demanded exorbitant retainers.   I spent hours, daily, learning about noise and radio frequency pollution, while attempting to work with State Regulatory Agencies, submitting complaint after complaint, in an effort to compel National Grid and Verizon to mitigate the pollution and end the noise byproduct.   Each time, State Regulatory Officials met behind closed doors with utility company representatives.  Each time, we were denied a proper hearing.   Each time, the State Regulatory Agencies allowed National Grid to design testing protocols that were blatantly inadequate.   Each time the tests were exposed for their flaws, State Regulatory Agencies failed to compel any corrective testing as per MA Law.  Each time, they failed to bring in independent experts to be sure testing would be done properly.  Each time, State agencies closed the case even when they had some data indicating a clear problem.   And each time, they ignored reams and reams of evidence provided from experts who substantiated our claims. 

Is it any surprise that corporations have become so powerful and corrupt when State regulatory agencies collaborate with them to disguise the truth?

My days of waking up joyfully ready for a new day and its wonderful possibilities are gone.  Instead I wake up exhausted, picking up the phone, and calling again for help that doesn’t come.   It is like “Ground Hogs Day” The same hell repeating itself over and over and over.  

I have been willing to stand up alone to this dragon for over 6 years. The dragon has tried to divert me, exhaust me, to try to take me down the wrong path.  Each time I have exposed the truth.  Each time I have gained more insight, more knowledge of the way they work and what they are hiding.

I cannot walk away from this without accomplishing what I set out to do.  While this started out as an issue of my personal suffering, it has become an issue with global consequences.  Each day I hear from more and people suffering in the same way that I am.

Now I realize I need your help to bring this dragon to its knees, expose the truth about radio frequency pollution and the Smart Grid, and to begin to live without this torture.

 

THE REST OF THE STORY, THE EVIDENCE, AND THE OUTCOME SO FAR

I have done many years of homework and talked to hundreds of specialists to get to the truth.  The constant assault of high frequency hissing, buzzing, and rumbling harmonics led to nights, then months, then years of insomnia, nose bleeds, headaches (no previous history) nervous tension, sinus problems, skin rashes, frustration, and anger.   Up until that time I had been in perfect health.  In 2006, while being unable to escape the noise, I started an intensive investigation in my surroundings.  I began by evaluating all the appliances and electric wiring in my home.  They all checked out.  I brought in code enforcement officers and electrician after electrician to try to locate the source in my home, to no avail.   I consulted with audio experts, and power quality specialists.  I read every scientific study I could about the subject.  I called physicists and radio frequency experts.   I had many, many, many noise studies conducted of the air outside my home.  I purchased and was trained in the use of sensitive recording and analyzing equipment from certified electricians and audio engineers.  I paid numerous experts to study and explain the noise. 

Here is what they have concluded: The source is outside my home and most likely related to telecommunication signals being broadcast in the environment and delivered to my home by way of the power lines.  These forensic audio experts, power quality engineers, and electricians all verified the presence of a constant man-made audio noise pulsing in the air 24/7. 

Our experts confirmed each other’s studies, reporting that the signal delivered to our home, and many other homes across the State of MA and across the US, has microwave characteristics, bursting every second with a 1/8 second microburst.   It was discovered that the dominant audible frequency is 217Hz, originated by microwave signals in the Gigahertz range.  This frequency has been widely researched, with published studies considering it to be a cause of DNA strand breakage in the brain.  

An FCC engineer in Washington asked to see the noise studies and spectrum plot results obtained by our forensic audio expert, and was stunned to see same results in three different study locations.   Never before in the history of mankind has this microwave frequency exposure been so widespread.  This same FCC engineer advised the State Regulatory agencies to investigate the matter more closely.   However, the State Regulatory agencies rely on FCC standards.  The FCC’s guidelines for radio frequency radiation exposure were set in 1986, almost three decades before our current technology was introduced.   The FCC had no idea the extent of toxic emissions that would occur in our lifetime.   The advent of layers of wireless technology over the past thirty years has also created byproducts of the RF pollution, such as this constant noise leaking into our environments and homes.    The electric power grid provides one continuous web of connecting wires, which naturally act as antenna, carrying the torturous noise and illegal emissions as far and wide as the web itself.   Yet, the FCC regulations still stand, antiquated and woefully inadequate to address today’s current combined exposure levels.  

That is how time and again, the State Regulatory agencies and the FCC were able to wash their hands of the issue in my town.   What they won’t tell you is that this is going to get a lot worse for everyone if it hasn’t already done so. 

Legislation allowing cell towers to be erected on buildings demonstrates how little interest the FCC has in the health impact of radiation and microwave pollution from cell towers.   Likewise, electric and utility companies are not fully regulated in their installation or use of radio frequency radiation or microwave wireless devices.  They have been permitted to install wireless transmitters in every town, without applying for permits, and without notifying customers, as they prepare for a widespread Smart Grid.  Already homes have been provided with wireless or Smart meters which contain these transmitters.  Soon the entire nation will be serviced under the widespread umbrella of the Smart Microwave Grid. 

If you read about the “Smart Grid” on electric companies’ websites, like National Grid, they will use a lot of words but will explain very little.  They will call the system “intelligent” but they won’t tell you it utilizes radio frequency radiation or microwave signals through and across the airwaves to “read” your appliances and meters, and accumulate data about your usage habits to assist them in designing more profitable returns for the company.  They will not tell you that your home environment and the environment outside your home, and all areas with electric grid consumers, will be polluted with massive amounts of radio frequency radiation, microwaves.  No, they will mislead you with propaganda using words like “green” and environmentally friendly, when it is far from either.  They will not tell you that these microwaves are able to detect habits and trends in your daily life, and when you are home or away.  This is an invasion of privacy, and against the law.   

 Even when people take matters into their own hands, and go to great lengths to remove wireless devices from their own homes, removing smart or wireless meters, removing EMF producing lights and appliances, installing radiation blocking devices, or using hard wired phone lines, it is impossible to escape the pollution.   All of the other wireless devices in neighborhoods and on neighbor’s homes will continue to broadcast the signal and contribute to the pollution of radiation in the environment. 

Exposure is going to happen if you live in areas where wireless transmitters and devices are installed.  Wireless transmitting devices are installed on just about every section of the power lines, on every utility pole, on every street corner, on every home.  The amount in our environment now is far above what is normal for our planet and exceeds the amounts humans should be exposed to on a daily basis.   The World Health Organization deems radio frequency radiation emissions as potential carcinogens.

While this free flying air borne radiation is clearly a hazard, my fight is not about doing away with all radiation.  That would be impossible.  My fight is instead about mandating choices and minimizing exposure.   It is about awareness and prevention of harm.  There must be safer technology that will meet our needs as well as the current industry.   Safer options, such high speed internet utilizing fiber optics and wired phone service, have been relegated to take a back seat to wireless plans, with talk among industry leaders that they will soon be obsolete.  The government has not funded any studies to determine if wireless devices are safe.  Likewise, there are no studies by any source proving they are safe.  This gives free rein to the industry continuing to market wireless devices.   Left to their own schemes, the industry that promotes wireless devices has no interest in making safer choices.  They are purely interested in profit.  Our purchase of the technology and naïve use of it without an awareness of how it impacts our health is what they are banking on. 

WHO HAS ALLOWED THIS POLLUTION TO GO UNMITIGATED?

The years I spent attempting to raise the consciousness of State Department Heads, speaking passionately about our suffering, have only resulted in apathetic indifference and accusations of harassment.  Kerry Bowie, Assistant Commissioner DEP, Barbara Kwetz DEP air and compliance, John Aurbach, Commissioner, Environmental Affairs, Martha Coakley, AGO’s office, EPA, FCC, Bob Knorr, Dept of Public Health, Governor Duval Patrick’s Office, Christine O’Toole, Department of Public Utilities, Karen Robinson, Director of Consumer complaints for DTC and DPU, our town officials, our Senator, Benjamin Downing, and our Rep, “Smitty” Pignatelli, have all dismissed my pleas for help, passing the word on to others that listening to me is a waste of their time. 

The response from the utility companies has been just as dismal, with Corporate Officers like Verizon’s Cheryl Wenning, saying there is nothing they can do to assist us, and National Grid Corporate Representatives threatening us to stop communicating with their officers and technicians.  The State and the Utility companies have played a red tape, blame game, accusing the other of not cooperating or blaming them for delays or lack of contact.  The truth is that they work quite well together minimizing and then eliminating our concerns.

 

THE ROLE OF THE FCC

The FCC has allowed this to happen.  The FCC is allowing the current and drastically elevated amounts of a known carcinogenic to be delivered to all of us without demanding any updated assurances of safety, and without investigating the impact of levels far beyond what they imagined when they first set the standards for allowable exposure in 1986, decades before the advent of wireless technologies we live with today, exceeding the FCC’s original projections.  The FCC has not updated its guidelines to include it’s own recommendations to consider the amounts and combinations of wireless devices contributing to current exposure levels.   

The following information is taken directly from the FCC.  The points which are relevant to this issue, addressed above are underlined, (FOLLOWED BY ITALISIZED COMMENTARY IN PARENTHESIS):

 On May 31, 2011, the World Health Organization's International Agency for Research on Cancer (IARC) classified radiofrequency fields as “possibly carcinogenic to humans.” The FCC guidelines are based on exposure criteria recommended in 1986 by the National Council on Radiation Protection and Measurements (NCRP) and on the 1991 standard developed by the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) and later adopted as a standard by the American National Standards Institute (ANSI/IEEE C95.1-1992). (tThis regulation is woefully outdated and did not take into consideration the cumulative impact of the huge amounts of wireless technology bombarding us constantly.)

Determining whether a potential health hazard could exist with respect to a given transmitting antenna is not always a simple matter.   Several important factors must be considered in making that determination.   They include the following: (1) What is the frequency of the RF signal being transmitted?  (2) What is the operating power of the transmitting station and what is the actual power radiated from the antenna? [1] (3) How long will someone be exposed to the RF signal at a given distance from the antenna? (4) What other antennas are located in the area, and what is the exposure from those antennas?  (Current cumulative effects are understated.)

In practice, however, since it is unrealistic to measure separately the exposure of each square centimeter of the body, actual compliance with the FCC limits on RF emissions should be determined by “spatially averaging” a person’s exposure over the projected area of an adult human body (this concept is discussed in the FCC’s OET Bulletin 65). (This may not address current significant direct exposure to particular areas of the body.)

Transmitters and antennas that operate at 300 MHz or lower include radio broadcast stations, some television broadcast stations, and certain personal wireless service facilities (e.g., some paging stations).  Most personal wireless services, including all cellular and PCS, as well as some television broadcast stations, operate at frequencies above 300 MHz.

The MPE limits are specified as time‑averaged exposure limits.  This means that exposure can be averaged over the identified time interval (30 minutes for general population/uncontrolled exposure or 6 minutes for occupational/controlled exposure). (Current exposure is not limited to 30 minutes, as it is constant, 24 x 7.)

Illustration 3.   FCCLimits for Maximum Permissible Exposure (MPE)
