NOTE 1: Occupational/controlled limits apply in situations in which persons are exposed as a consequence of their employment provided those persons are fully aware of the potential for exposure and can exercise control over their exposure.  Limits for occupational/controlled exposure also apply in situations when an individual is transient through a location where occupational/controlled limits apply provided he or she is made aware of the potential for exposure.

NOTE 2: General population/uncontrolled exposures apply in situations in which the general public may be exposed, or in which persons that are exposed as a consequence of their employment may not be fully aware of the potential for exposure or cannot exercise control over their exposure.

(The electric companies have their equipment all over the place, in effect making your environment and my environment an extension of their work place.  Technicians work on our lines, climb our utility poles and install equipment on our homes daily.  This is their work place.  However, residents are not afforded the same protections as the utility workers.  Furthermore, many of us are not aware of the exposure risks and if we are, cannot control it.)

[1] Power travels from a transmitter through cable or other connecting device to the radiating antenna.  “Operating power of the transmitting station” refers to the power that is fed from the transmitter (transmitter output power) into the cable or connecting device.  “Actual power radiated from the antenna” is the transmitter output power minus the power lost (power losses) in the connecting device plus an apparent increase in power (if any) due to the design of the antenna.   

 

NOW THAT YOU KNOW THE FACTS. . . . . . . 

WHY MUST WE WORK TOGETHER TO STOP THIS?

Only until large groups of people unite and take a stand against the utility companies’ abuse of our rights, will change be realized.  We can demand safer progressive technology. We can expose the lies, demand the truth and demand less radio frequency exposure.

I believe this trampling of our constitutional rights is grounds for a Supreme Court Decision, and possible Class Action.  My goal is that such action will result in calling the utility companies and their affiliates to task, compelling them to spend the billions of blood money, made while compromising our well-being, to stop the Smart Grid and use our money to mitigate illegal and deadly emissions from existing wireless sources. 

The utility companies know how to reduce the pollution. They just do not want to, nor are they required to, spend OUR money to do so.  Current regulatory standards have allowed them to do what they want to do at our cost.  

 
For Distribution - March 20, 2013
 

Please go to the Marketwire link below and read the entire Press Release.  Please watch the embedded short video and send this out as widely as possible.  Our goal is to make this video go "viral".
 
On Twitter at:  https://twitter.com/emrpolicy
On Facebook at:  http://www.facebook.com/pages/EMR-Policy-Institute/188070864579167
 
Americans Beware: Nationwide Violations of FCC Radiation Limits
at Wireless Antenna Sites

Mar 20, 2013 09:02 ET

MARSHFIELD, VT--(Marketwire - Mar 20, 2013) - The EMRadiation Policy Institute (EMRPI) releases Videos revealing the FCC's failure to protect Americans from wireless radiofrequency (RF) radiation.

US workers and families are at risk of overexposure to RF at hazardous levels. Hundreds of wireless industry-operated antenna sites from Maine to California have been tested by EMRPI and found to be in gross violation -- up to and in excess of 600% -- of the FCC's public exposure limits. These sites > ...

Want to read more about it? http://www.marketwire.com/press-release/-1770139.htm

Contact US Senators at: http://www.senate.gov/general/contact_information/senators_cfm.cfm
Contact US House Members at: http://www.house.gov/representatives/
 
Contact Information:
Janet Newton, President
The EMRadiaton Policy Institute
JNewton@emrpolicy.org
(802)426-3035
www.emrpolicy.org 
 
 

 Please help me fight for the benefit of all of us.

 WHAT I NEED AND WHAT YOU GET

I knew I was fighting a dragon.  I did not realize how big and corrupt the dragon was.   I now know I cannot stand up to this dragon alone, especially when it is being fed by powerful interest groups and corporate funded government.  I need help in the form of numbers and financial donations, large and small, to fight the corrupt alliance between powerful utility companies, State government regulatory agencies, and the FCC. Money is the one tool of power that corporations will respect.  Money will enable us to fight a precedent setting legal battle.

I need your help nationally.

The only way to fight this is to fight BIG and to expose this fight on a national scale.

I need your help to question the FCC and compel them to investigate the impact of exposure to combined radio frequency radiation devices.  

I need your help to fight this in Massachusetts and other States.

I need your help to launch a full-scale legal battle against the Utility Corporations in our State and in many other States (often the same entity) who have allowed this pollution without restraint, creating a network of leaking radio frequency radiation and pure tone signals at never before experienced levels. 

The State has failed to protect us, thereby causing serious, irreversible health risks to my family, my animals, our community, and me.  The same thing is happening in your towns and homes, and to you and your families.   We need your help to bring our State Regulatory Agencies to task, to compel them to do their jobs, and force the utility companies to end radio frequency radiation emissions. 

The Utilities, especially power companies like National Grid, with blessings given by the State and Federal Regulatory Agencies, have been allowed to proceed at our peril, with advancements of wireless on an outdated grid infrastructure, a structure that cannot safely handle what has been placed upon it and one they themselves have admitted is in grave need of repair.  Leakage of radiofrequency electromagnetic pollution is pervasive wherever there are power lines.

My family and I want to hire a new team of lawyers now that we have what we need, evidence and grounds, to bring this case to light.  Your help will allow these lawyers to persevere on our behalf even in the face of political and corporate obstacles.  Our lawyers will want to hear from other MA State residents who are suffering from the same pollution.

This case will be precedent setting, making it that much easier for others who wish to follow suit in other States and globally.  Our team is willing to fight this until it is resolved, until the Regulatory Agencies and the FCC realize they may no longer ignore our demands. 

 If you have an interest in joining this legal battle, we need to hear from you.  If you have an interest in helping fund this legal case, your donations will be greatly appreciated.

The fight will be long and costly.  We can’t do it without your help.  We can’t do it alone.

We need your help to help you.

Our fear is that the stress of what we are involuntarily being subjected to will manifest in epidemic illness for all of us.  There are thousands of homeowners who have fled their homes like refugees, seeking new homes or places where the radiation levels are tolerable, but are finding that extremely difficult because of the multiple layers of wireless radio frequency radiation technology and its pollution.  It has saturated every environment on the planet.  Many people are too sick to defend themselves and the major portion of the public are unaware of this pollution let alone the possibility that it may be the cause of health issues. 

Your help will give a voice to millions of children and families.  We will speak out against the proliferation of massive levels of radio frequency radiation pollution so we can be restored the choice to live without illness. 

If you participate in this fight and/or send any amount of donation for our legal battle it will help.

 

THE IMPACT OF ACHIEVING OUR GOAL

A single well-fought case can make a huge difference in many people’s lives, exposing the lies the utility companies have told and validating the truth others have experienced across the State and Nation.  

The impact of this case is HUGE and will be felt on a personal, National, and global level, as everyone is impacted by radio frequency radiation pollution.

We have the right to a safe and hazard free environment.  

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

In addition to providing financila support, there are many other ways you can act now to help preserve a healthy legacy for our children and avoid one of illness and struggle for them to bear. 

Not to act shows compliance with the increasing amounts of radio frequency radiation pollution, raising the risk of illness for all of us. 

Awareness and activism are the only ways to force corporations to develop technology that will not harm us.   It is possible to create safe technology.  We have the brain power to do this.  We are accepting inferior products and technology because we don’t know any better.  How many of the ideas generated by physicists to help correct this problem are being explored by corporations?   How many of their ideas are being funded by our government?  ZERO. 

Corporations who have one goal, profit, are cheating us from solutions that would preserve our well-being.  These corporations have kidnapped our Government.  

What can you do to be active in the fight against this pollution?

1.  We can come together as one strong voice demanding an end to this corrupt abuse of power.  We can bring our voices to Washington demanding effective regulatory legistation before it is too late.

2.  We can write letters to our editors again and again asking why our corporations are not being compelled by our government to design safer technology for us. 

3.  I also encourage those who can hear and feel the symptoms to join me in this fight by filing the proper complaints with their respective Departments of Public Utilities, by signing petitions asking for updated research and lower acceptable RF levels.  THE FCC is woefully behind the times, has not proven that RF devices of the magnitude we are being forced to live with are safe, and has yet done nothing to help.

4.  We can demand all wireless or radio frequency transmitting devices be removed from our homes, such as Smart or wireless meters, and wireless modems. 

5.  We can speak at schools and churches about the impact of radio frequency radiation for children, and ask that these institutions set an example for the safety of our children and families by reducing wireless technology in schools and churches. 

These are just a few things we can do.

 Visit my blog at http://sandaura.wordpress.com/

 Thank you in advance for understanding the urgent call to act and for your generosity.

INTRO AND SUMMARY OF MY PLEA
Every day I feel the impact and torturous effects of constant pervasive “pure tone” noise in my environment and home, in the quiet town of Monterey, MA.
I am not alone. 
Dozens of witnesses have heard the same noxious tones while visiting our town.  Some, forced to shorten their visit, reported to State Public Health Officials about symptoms of pressure in their heads, waking up repeatedly throughout the night, feeling nauseous, anxious, overheated, and experiencing heart palpitations, and problems with hearing aids. 
Others report hearing the noise in their own towns.  Day after I day I hear from people suffering like myself.
Several experts who have investigated this noise, report it is a byproduct of radio frequency radiation pollution caused by dirty electricity, wireless telecommunication devices, DSL, Wi-Fi, and wireless meters.  The air in my town, and yours, is different than it was 10 years ago.  Now it is polluted with invisible carcinogenic electromagnetic radio frequency radiation and its byproducts, pure tone noise, delivered to every neighborhood and home by way of the new emerging Smart Grid infrastructure.  
While higher ambient levels in urban towns (cars, traffic, industries) may disguise the pure tone noise that is so clearly heard in rural areas like Monterey, the hazard of the radiation is equally distributed across the nation.   Our children now play on playgrounds and baseball fields blanketed with free-flying microwaves and the resulting pure tones, blending eerily with sounds of birds chirping and wind through the trees.  This pollution will only get worse, as wireless technology increases exponentially each day.  
The advancement of the smart grid infrastructure coupled with wireless microwave transmitting devices has created a dragon of pollution for all of us to fight.  
I have waged my own battle with utility companies in MA for over 6 years.   Without any background in electricity or radio frequencies, I have been able to persist despite scant legal assistance.  Most lawyers I consulted with confessed to an inadequate grasp of the subject, or demanded exorbitant retainers.   I spent hours, daily, learning about noise and radio frequency pollution, while attempting to work with State Regulatory Agencies, submitting complaint after complaint, in an effort to compel National Grid and Verizon to mitigate the pollution and end the noise byproduct.   Each time, State Regulatory Officials met behind closed doors with utility company representatives.  Each time, we were denied a proper hearing.   Each time, the State Regulatory Agencies allowed National Grid to design testing protocols that were blatantly inadequate.   Each time the tests were exposed for their flaws, State Regulatory Agencies failed to compel any corrective testing as per MA Law.  Each time, they failed to bring in independent experts to be sure testing would be done properly.  Each time, State agencies closed the case even when they had some data indicating a clear problem.   And each time, they ignored reams and reams of evidence provided from experts who substantiated our claims. 
Is it any surprise that corporations have become so powerful and corrupt when State regulatory agencies collaborate with them to disguise the truth?
My days of waking up joyfully ready for a new day and its wonderful possibilities are gone.  Instead I wake up exhausted, picking up the phone, and calling again for help that doesn’t come.   It is like “Ground Hogs Day” The same hell repeating itself over and over and over.  
I have been willing to stand up alone to this dragon for over 6 years. The dragon has tried to divert me, exhaust me, to try to take me down the wrong path.  Each time I have exposed the truth.  Each time I have gained more insight, more knowledge of the way they work and what they are hiding.
I cannot walk away from this without accomplishing what I set out to do.  While this started out as an issue of my personal suffering, it has become an issue with global consequences.  Each day I hear from more and people suffering in the same way that I am.

WHO HAS ALLOWED THIS POLLUTION TO GO UNMITIGATED?
The years I spent attempting to raise the consciousness of State Department Heads, speaking passionately about our suffering, have only resulted in apathetic indifference and accusations of harassment.  Kerry Bowie, Assistant Commissioner DEP, Barbara Kwetz DEP air and compliance, John Aurbach, Commissioner, Environmental Affairs, Martha Coakley, AGO’s office, EPA, FCC, Bob Knorr, Dept of Public Health, Governor Duval Patrick’s Office, Christine O’Toole, Department of Public Utilities, Karen Robinson, Director of Consumer complaints for DTC and DPU, our town officials, our Senator, Benjamin Downing, and our Rep, “Smitty” Pignatelli, have all dismissed my pleas for help, passing the word on to others that listening to me is a waste of their time. 
The response from the utility companies has been just as dismal, with Corporate Officers like Verizon’s Cheryl Wenning, saying there is nothing they can do to assist us, and National Grid Corporate Representatives threatening us to stop communicating with their officers and technicians.  The State and the Utility companies have played a red tape, blame game, accusing the other of not cooperating or blaming them for delays or lack of contact.  The truth is that they work quite well together minimizing and then eliminating our concerns.
 
THE ROLE OF THE FCC
The FCC has allowed this to happen.  The FCC is allowing the current and drastically elevated amounts of a known carcinogenic to be delivered to all of us without demanding any updated assurances of safety, and without investigating the impact of levels far beyond what they imagined when they first set the standards for allowable exposure in 1986, decades before the advent of wireless technologies we live with today, exceeding the FCC’s original projections.  The FCC has not updated its guidelines to include it’s own recommendations to consider the amounts and combinations of wireless devices contributing to current exposure levels.   
The following information is taken directly from the FCC.  The points which are relevant to this issue, addressed above are underlined, (FOLLOWED BY ITALISIZED COMMENTARY IN PARENTHESIS):
 On May 31, 2011, the World Health Organization's International Agency for Research on Cancer (IARC) classified radiofrequency fields as “possibly carcinogenic to humans.” The FCC guidelines are based on exposure criteria recommended in 1986 by the National Council on Radiation Protection and Measurements (NCRP) and on the 1991 standard developed by the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) and later adopted as a standard by the American National Standards Institute (ANSI/IEEE C95.1-1992). (tThis regulation is woefully outdated and did not take into consideration the cumulative impact of the huge amounts of wireless technology bombarding us constantly.)
Determining whether a potential health hazard could exist with respect to a given transmitting antenna is not always a simple matter.   Several important factors must be considered in making that determination.   They include the following: (1) What is the frequency of the RF signal being transmitted?  (2) What is the operating power of the transmitting station and what is the actual power radiated from the antenna? [1] (3) How long will someone be exposed to the RF signal at a given distance from the antenna? (4) What other antennas are located in the area, and what is the exposure from those antennas?  (Current cumulative effects are understated.)
In practice, however, since it is unrealistic to measure separately the exposure of each square centimeter of the body, actual compliance with the FCC limits on RF emissions should be determined by “spatially averaging” a person’s exposure over the projected area of an adult human body (this concept is discussed in the FCC’s OET Bulletin 65). (This may not address current significant direct exposure to particular areas of the body.)
Transmitters and antennas that operate at 300 MHz or lower include radio broadcast stations, some television broadcast stations, and certain personal wireless service facilities (e.g., some paging stations).  Most personal wireless services, including all cellular and PCS, as well as some television broadcast stations, operate at frequencies above 300 MHz.
The MPE limits are specified as time‑averaged exposure limits.  This means that exposure can be averaged over the identified time interval (30 minutes for general population/uncontrolled exposure or 6 minutes for occupational/controlled exposure). (Current exposure is not limited to 30 minutes, as it is constant, 24 x 7.)
Illustration 3.   FCCLimits for Maximum Permissible Exposure (MPE)

NOTE 1: Occupational/controlled limits apply in situations in which persons are exposed as a consequence of their employment provided those persons are fully aware of the potential for exposure and can exercise control over their exposure.  Limits for occupational/controlled exposure also apply in situations when an individual is transient through a location where occupational/controlled limits apply provided he or she is made aware of the potential for exposure.
NOTE 2: General population/uncontrolled exposures apply in situations in which the general public may be exposed, or in which persons that are exposed as a consequence of their employment may not be fully aware of the potential for exposure or cannot exercise control over their exposure.
(The electric companies have their equipment all over the place, in effect making your environment and my environment an extension of their work place.  Technicians work on our lines, climb our utility poles and install equipment on our homes daily.  This is their work place.  However, residents are not afforded the same protections as the utility workers.  Furthermore, many of us are not aware of the exposure risks and if we are, cannot control it.)

[1] Power travels from a transmitter through cable or other connecting device to the radiating antenna.  “Operating power of the transmitting station” refers to the power that is fed from the transmitter (transmitter output power) into the cable or connecting device.  “Actual power radiated from the antenna” is the transmitter output power minus the power lost (power losses) in the connecting device plus an apparent increase in power (if any) due to the design of the antenna.   
 
NOW THAT YOU KNOW THE FACTS. . . . . . . 
WHY MUST WE WORK TOGETHER TO STOP THIS?
Only until large groups of people unite and take a stand against the utility companies’ abuse of our rights, will change be realized.  We can demand safer progressive technology. We can expose the lies, demand the truth and demand less radio frequency exposure.
I believe this trampling of our constitutional rights is grounds for a Supreme Court Decision, and possible Class Action.  My goal is that such action will result in calling the utility companies and their affiliates to task, compelling them to spend the billions of blood money, made while compromising our well-being, to stop the Smart Grid and use our money to mitigate illegal and deadly emissions from existing wireless sources. 
The utility companies know how to reduce the pollution. They just do not want to, nor are they required to, spend OUR money to do so.  Current regulatory standards have allowed them to do what they want to do at our cost.  
 














For Distribution - March 20, 2013
 

Please go to the Marketwire link below and read the entire Press Release.  Please watch the embedded short video and send this out as widely as possible.  Our goal is to make this video go "viral".

 
On Twitter at:  https://twitter.com/emrpolicy
On Facebook at:  http://www.facebook.com/pages/EMR-Policy-Institute/188070864579167
 
Americans Beware: Nationwide Violations of FCC Radiation Limits 
at Wireless Antenna Sites

Mar 20, 2013 09:02 ETMARSHFIELD, VT--(Marketwire - Mar 20, 2013) - The EMRadiation Policy Institute (EMRPI) releases Videos revealing the FCC's failure to protect Americans from wireless radiofrequency (RF) radiation. US workers and families are at risk of overexposure to RF at hazardous levels. Hundreds of wireless industry-operated antenna sites from Maine to California have been tested by EMRPI and found to be in gross violation -- up to and in excess of 600% -- of the FCC's public exposure limits. These sites > ...Want to read more about it? http://www.marketwire.com/press-release/-1770139.htm




Contact US Senators at: http://www.senate.gov/general/contact_information/senators_cfm.cfmContact US House Members at: http://www.house.gov/representatives/


 


Contact Information:
Janet Newton, President
The EMRadiaton Policy Institute
JNewton@emrpolicy.org

(802)426-3035www.emrpolicy.org 
 
 












 Please help me fight for the benefit of all of us.
 WHAT I NEED AND WHAT YOU GET
I knew I was fighting a dragon.  I did not realize how big and corrupt the dragon was.   I now know I cannot stand up to this dragon alone, especially when it is being fed by powerful interest groups and corporate funded government.  I need help in the form of numbers and financial donations, large and small, to fight the corrupt alliance between powerful utility companies, State government regulatory agencies, and the FCC. Money is the one tool of power that corporations will respect.  Money will enable us to fight a precedent setting legal battle.
I need your help nationally.
The only way to fight this is to fight BIG and to expose this fight on a national scale.
I need your help to question the FCC and compel them to investigate the impact of exposure to combined radio frequency radiation devices.  
I need your help to fight this in Massachusetts and other States.
I need your help to launch a full-scale legal battle against the Utility Corporations in our State and in many other States (often the same entity) who have allowed this pollution without restraint, creating a network of leaking radio frequency radiation and pure tone signals at never before experienced levels. 
The State has failed to protect us, thereby causing serious, irreversible health risks to my family, my animals, our community, and me.  The same thing is happening in your towns and homes, and to you and your families.   We need your help to bring our State Regulatory Agencies to task, to compel them to do their jobs, and force the utility companies to end radio frequency radiation emissions. 
The Utilities, especially power companies like National Grid, with blessings given by the State and Federal Regulatory Agencies, have been allowed to proceed at our peril, with advancements of wireless on an outdated grid infrastructure, a structure that cannot safely handle what has been placed upon it and one they themselves have admitted is in grave need of repair.  Leakage of radiofrequency electromagnetic pollution is pervasive wherever there are power lines.
My family and I want to hire a new team of lawyers now that we have what we need, evidence and grounds, to bring this case to light.  Your help will allow these lawyers to persevere on our behalf even in the face of political and corporate obstacles.  Our lawyers will want to hear from other MA State residents who are suffering from the same pollution.
This case will be precedent setting, making it that much easier for others who wish to follow suit in other States and globally.  Our team is willing to fight this until it is resolved, until the Regulatory Agencies and the FCC realize they may no longer ignore our demands. 
 If you have an interest in joining this legal battle, we need to hear from you.  If you have an interest in helping fund this legal case, your donations will be greatly appreciated.
The fight will be long and costly.  We can’t do it without your help.  We can’t do it alone.
We need your help to help you.
Our fear is that the stress of what we are involuntarily being subjected to will manifest in epidemic illness for all of us.  There are thousands of homeowners who have fled their homes like refugees, seeking new homes or places where the radiation levels are tolerable, but are finding that extremely difficult because of the multiple layers of wireless radio frequency radiation technology and its pollution.  It has saturated every environment on the planet.  Many people are too sick to defend themselves and the major portion of the public are unaware of this pollution let alone the possibility that it may be the cause of health issues. 
Your help will give a voice to millions of children and families.  We will speak out against the proliferation of massive levels of radio frequency radiation pollution so we can be restored the choice to live without illness. 
If you participate in this fight and/or send any amount of donation for our legal battle it will help.
 
THE IMPACT OF ACHIEVING OUR GOAL
A single well-fought case can make a huge difference in many people’s lives, exposing the lies the utility companies have told and validating the truth others have experienced across the State and Nation.  
The impact of this case is HUGE and will be felt on a personal, National, and global level, as everyone is impacted by radio frequency radiation pollution.
We have the right to a safe and hazard free environment.  
OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP
In addition to providing financila support, there are many other ways you can act now to help preserve a healthy legacy for our children and avoid one of illness and struggle for them to bear. 
Not to act shows compliance with the increasing amounts of radio frequency radiation pollution, raising the risk of illness for all of us. 
Awareness and activism are the only ways to force corporations to develop technology that will not harm us.   It is possible to create safe technology.  We have the brain power to do this.  We are accepting inferior products and technology because we don’t know any better.  How many of the ideas generated by physicists to help correct this problem are being explored by corporations?   How many of their ideas are being funded by our government?  ZERO. 
Corporations who have one goal, profit, are cheating us from solutions that would preserve our well-being.  These corporations have kidnapped our Government.  
What can you do to be active in the fight against this pollution?
1.  We can come together as one strong voice demanding an end to this corrupt abuse of power.  We can bring our voices to Washington demanding effective regulatory legistation before it is too late.
2.  We can write letters to our editors again and again asking why our corporations are not being compelled by our government to design safer technology for us. 
3.  I also encourage those who can hear and feel the symptoms to join me in this fight by filing the proper complaints with their respective Departments of Public Utilities, by signing petitions asking for updated research and lower acceptable RF levels.  THE FCC is woefully behind the times, has not proven that RF devices of the magnitude we are being forced to live with are safe, and has yet done nothing to help.
4.  We can demand all wireless or radio frequency transmitting devices be removed from our homes, such as Smart or wireless meters, and wireless modems. 
5.  We can speak at schools and churches about the impact of radio frequency radiation for children, and ask that these institutions set an example for the safety of our children and families by reducing wireless technology in schools and churches. 
These are just a few things we can do.
 Visit my blog at http://sandaura.wordpress.com/
 Thank you in advance for understanding the urgent call to act and for your generosity.

story:
Who the heck are Valhalla?

In Norse mythology, Valhalla is the hall of the slain, presided over by the god Odin. It is there that Odin gathers his chosen warriors who have fallen in battle, preparing them for a second life in the hall of the Gods. Much as Odin hand-picked his compatriots, a young man with equally epic flow did gather the finest Quidditch players in southern Ontario for their second Quidditch-lives with Canada's first community team. Valhalla came together as a team just five short months ago and this past weekend, defeated the University of Guelph in a fiercely competitive match to snag Canada's final berth in IQA World Cup VII. The World Cup will take place April 5th-6th in North Myrtle Beach, SC, and we can't wait to realize our dream of making the trip as a first-year team. Help put Southern Ontario on the Quidditch map. Send Valhalla to WCVII.

What do they want? What's in it for me?

Unfortunately, South Carolina is not in Canada. In fact, it's rather far away. Sending our full roster of 21 players to World Cup comes with various costs, including car rental, gas, food, lodging, and tournament fees. Most of us are students, with not a ton of money to spare. Since we qualified under fairly short notice, our goal is to raise $1000 to help subsidize costs. Any more than that would be amazing. Specifically, the $1000 would go toward:

  • $400 for the tournament fee
  • $600 to be put towards hotel accommodation (approx. $2000 total)

We have a pretty interesting cast of characters on the team, and there are a number of unique perks for donors. Check 'em out on the right --------->

The Impact

There are 74 American teams attending this year's World Cup. Including Valhalla, there are only 5 teams attending from Canada. Canadian quidditch has come a long way since its inception, with uOttawa making the Round of 32 at last year's World Cup, falling to Baylor University, a consistently top-5 ranked team worldwide. This year's 5-team delegation marks the largest Canadian contingent ever to attend World Cup, and we're excited to show our friends south of the border how we get it done in the Great White North. 

But I'm Broke!

Not everybody has money to throw around, but that's ok! Share the campaign! Let people know about us! Learn about quidditch and spread the word!

story:
The first barefoot shoes, that make no compromise between functionality and style. Our shoes combine the health benefits of barefoot shoes with a great casual look.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Your feet contain a quarter of all the bones in your body! One foot alone contains 26 bones, 33 joints, 107 ligaments, 19 muscles and over 200,000 nerve endings.

Wide Toe Box vs. Normal Toe Box

When your foot has to conform to a shoe that is not shaped like a natural foot, your whole body shifts out of alignment.

Zero Drop vs. Heel Elevation

We at Feelgrounds™ believe that our feet are the roots of our body. If you strengthen the roots you’ll strengthen the tree. Live a life with better balance, mobility and sensory feedback!

 

New to Barefoot Shoes? Unlock your Sixth Sense!

The soles of your feet contain over 200,000 nerve endings that send information directly to your brain. The thin sole allows you to feel the ground under your feet and to perceive your surroundings - called proprioception. Proprioception is the sense of self-movement and body position, sometimes described as the "sixth sense". A great feeling!

 

 

 

Check your size with our printable Sizing Guide:

We also offer a 30 Day Return Policy. Please see FAQ for more information.

 

 

We have designed and redesigned the Feelgrounds™ shoe to be the best fitting barefoot shoe for the widest variety of feet. Our shoes conform to your foot and not the other way around. Whether you have a wider or a narrower foot, Feelgrounds™ will bend and mold to your foot as you walk, run and play!

We finalised development, tested the shoes under different conditions and are proud to present you an awesome long lasting shoe.

Production will start as soon as the crowdfunding campaign is successfully backed. The molds and patterns are ready and we already ran a low quantity sample production. We are planning to ship the shoes worldwide this Summer 2019 and we will keep you up to date along the way.

Our shoes will be manufactured under fair conditions in Vietnam. We will visit the production and share pictures and videos on our social media channels and here on Indiegogo.

 

 

 

 

Please see our FAQ section first. We tried to answer all questions there.

 

More questions? Write us on Facebook Messenger, Email or Social Media.

 

 

 

feelgrounds.com

story:
Hello Everyone,

I am running my first marathon, the Marine Corps Marathon in Washington D.C. on October 27th of this year. I am running for a charity, the US Soccer Foundation's Soccer for Success.

About the Foundation

Soccer for Success is the U.S. Soccer Foundation’s free soccer-based afterschool program that uses soccer as a tool to combat childhood obesity and promote healthy lifestyles for children in under-resourced urban communities. The Foundation partners with community-based organizations across the country to operate Soccer for Success sites – providing thousands of children with free afterschool programming three times per week for the entire school year.

In 2011, Soccer for Success received a two-year grant from the Corporation for National and Community Service's Social Innovation Fund to promote helathy lifestyles among youth in urban areas. The Foundation was one of five organizations to receive this prestigious grant for its groundbreaking work. Check out our video here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=HaKCUfYXpsE#!

 

My Goal

I have a goal to raise $600 in order to help this foundation bring soccer, health and fittness to those who don't have access. My othe goal is to finish my first FULL marathon!

 

Any donation would help me reach my fundraising goal!

Thank you,

Ali Barry

story:
RESPA™ The World's First Breathing Sensor to Boost Workouts! Just Clip-Press-Go!

Meet RESPA™, your clip-on coach to gain the edge in your next race, guide your fitness routine & deepen your yoga practice. RESPA™ is an easy-to-use wearable sensor that tracks your breathing for the duration of your workout. With the RESPA™ companion app, you can train smarter and practice better as you get real-time alerts for staying in optimal breathing zones.

RESPA™ to Integrate with Amazon Alexa!

Respa is going to have Amazon Alexa to easily monitor physical activities such as running and yoga and health metrics to offer a path to better health.  Just ask Alexa!

BENEFITS

The algorithm interprets breathing data collected by sensors to notify in real-time when you should push harder, stay in your sweet spot, or slow down for optimal performance.

Breathing is a function that can be trained. Strategies that encourage deep, slow, paced breathing help to control respiratory rate changes during activities and are beneficial to extend the duration of an activity prior to reaching VT thereby maximizing the conditioning effect.

Whether you’re training for your first race or just trying to get in better shape, RESPA™ Fitness 2.0 helps you build stamina and maximize calorie burn every time you exercise.

Crossing ventilatory threshold (VT) can damage muscle from lactic acid buildup/overtraining. The device beeps/vibrates in real-time, notifying to dial down or stop training.

The sensor gives gentle alerts that remind you to come back to your breath during your yoga practice, and it provides breathing data visualizations and coaching to help you improve your practice over time.

EASY TO USE

 

 

 

 

 

 

APP SPECS

  • Wireless connectivity via Bluetooth for real-time data sync
  • Available for both iOS and Android platforms
  • Get your post-workout analysis to get your performance metrics
  • Customized separate apps for all four models: 
    RESPA™ Better Yoga, RESPA™ Elite Fitness 3.0, RESPA™ Fitness 2.0, and RESPA™ Coach
  • Classified breathing patterns in different zones: 
    RESPA™ Elite Fitness 3.0 & RESPA™ Coach have (1) warm-up, (2) training, (3) exhaustion workout zones. RESPA™ Fitness 2.0 has (1) warm-up, (2) calorie burn, (3) fitness exercise zones. RESPA™ Better Yoga has (1) rhythmic, (2) non-rhythmic breathing zones

After each workout, the RESPA™ app provides easy-to-understand breathing data visualizations that allow you to track your progress and prepare for your next session. The companion app will track your progress to provide positive reinforcement and achieve your personal fitness goal, whether it is to lose some weight, improve fitness enough, complete 5k community run, race for a marathon or achieve your desired breathing pattern during yoga.

COMPARISON CHART

REWARD SUMMARY

 

 

WIRELESS CHARGING

Your RESPA™ comes with an easy to use, rechargeable battery that gives you up to 36 hours of functionality in any exercise session.

PRODUCT SPECS & DIMENSIONS

  • Portable small wearable device size of a quarter 
  • Easy to wear with a spring clip to use on shirts or sports bras 
  • On-board microphone, 3-axis accelerometer, 3-axis magnetometer (for direction/compass) and barometer (for elevation- only in Elite Fitness & Coach models) sensors 
  • Wireless charging (Qi charging)
  • Bluetooth communication to send to mobile app
  • The battery can last 36 hours in one exercise session
  • Flash memory
  • Material: Fitness models have a plastic enclosure, over-molded rubber material, and durable mechanical spring clip. Yoga models have a  plastic enclosure and a non-mechanical clip

 

 

    RESPA INVENTION & MANUFACTURING

    Respa has strong intellectual property (IP) behind its science and technology, and we're very excited to bring this new device to you. We have filed utility patents for the algorithm, design patents for the look-and-feel, and a trademark for the name.

    We have a strong history of winning approval from the United States Patent & Trademark Office (USPTO). The Respa team, powered by Zansors, has been awarded four utility patents, five design patents, and six trademarks in the last three years. A strong IP portfolio for Respa means that this invention can endure so that many can enjoy and benefit from it for years to come.

    Not only is Respa strong on the science and IP side, but we also have a sharp manufacturing strategy to ensure 100% quality. As a benchmark, companies like Apple and Qualcomm own their proprietary designs but they have their products manufactured by third-party contract manufacturers. Respa will follow this same model., which has many benefits.

    First, Respa will be made right here in the USA. The device will be manufactured in Michigan - known for its electronics and automobile manufacturing - which means that its durability and quality will be excellent. Finally, we hand our proprietary blueprint designs to a specific third-party contract manufacturer who has the highest quality standards including ISO 9001 standard.

    Our partner has been in business since 2002, and they are experts in printed circuit board assembly and electronics manufacturing. Plus, they have an FDA certification for medical products. When you receive your very own Respa device, you can feel confident that you're getting the highest quality product.

    SCIENTIFIC SIGNIFICANCE

    • Measuring heart rate (HR) alone is not enough for fitness training.
    • Hard to determine personal training zone from HR 
    • Baseline varies by person 
    • Depends on current training level of a person 
    • Doesn’t feel intuitive to the person

    WHY BREATHING?

    “Breathing always wins”. No matter an individual’s physical endurance level or functional capacity, they fundamentally need a way to breathe. Under periods of physical exertion, the body will find ways to maximize oxygen intake through breathing and in doing so sometimes even compromise other systemic or structural functions.

    What is Lactate Threshold/Ventilatory Threshold and what happens in the body chemically?

    When a person exercises they eventually get to a point where the level of exertion requires an increase in oxygen uptake to continue the activity. At this point, they begin breathing more frequently and/or with greater depth to meet the needs of physical exertion. Ventilatory threshold (VT) is the point after which ventilation begins to increase disproportionately relative to oxygen uptake. This point is often considered a submaximal point for optimal moderate exercise prescription.

    PATHWAY TO OPTIMIZING WEIGHTLOSS & INCREASING LEAN MUSCLE MASS

    Breathing strategies using real-time monitoring can help an individual maximize time to reach VT which optimizes training and endurance and mitigates stress response on the body. In deconditioned and compromised populations, this breathing sensor technology may be a critical physiological pathway to optimizing weight loss, increasing lean muscle mass, and reconditioning endurance.

    TIMELINE

    THE TEAM

    Zansors team has been doing research and product development for breathing sensor technology for medical applications for over 5 years. The application specifically for athletes and yoga started to materialize in late 2017. Since then, our team of researchers, engineers and designers have worked tirelessly to design, build and test the Respa line of breathing sensors and collaborated with yoga instructors and competitive athletes to fine-tune their performance and efficacy.

    WHY INDIEGOGO?

    We believe that developing even a breakthrough technology is sufficient in itself to reach masses. We want to involve our customers in the development process in the spirit of co-creation that is necessary to democratize our innovation so that it benefits people. While we have made great strides as a company in developing the product, launching into marketing is a big step and comes with substantial order minimums. This campaign will provide the much-needed capital to fund our first production run. We also firmly believe that this is our best product yet and we want to share it with the world starting with our backer community.

     

    RISKS & CHALLENGES

    In terms of scaling of manufacturing, printed circuit board and enclosure designs are finalized as well as embedded software development is complete. Third-party contract manufacturer based in the USA is also selected. App screen design is complete. Provisional utility and design patents are submitted. We’re ready to start manufacturing for the first batch.
story_txt:
RESPA™ The World's First Breathing Sensor to Boost Workouts! Just Clip-Press-Go!Meet RESPA™, your clip-on coach to gain the edge in your next race, guide your fitness routine & deepen your yoga practice. RESPA™ is an easy-to-use wearable sensor that tracks your breathing for the duration of your workout. With the RESPA™ companion app, you can train smarter and practice better as you get real-time alerts for staying in optimal breathing zones.RESPA™ to Integrate with Amazon Alexa!Respa is going to have Amazon Alexa to easily monitor physical activities such as running and yoga and health metrics to offer a path to better health.  Just ask Alexa!BENEFITSThe algorithm interprets breathing data collected by sensors to notify in real-time when you should push harder, stay in your sweet spot, or slow down for optimal performance.Breathing is a function that can be trained. Strategies that encourage deep, slow, paced breathing help to control respiratory rate changes during activities and are beneficial to extend the duration of an activity prior to reaching VT thereby maximizing the conditioning effect.Whether you’re training for your first race or just trying to get in better shape, RESPA™ Fitness 2.0 helps you build stamina and maximize calorie burn every time you exercise.Crossing ventilatory threshold (VT) can damage muscle from lactic acid buildup/overtraining. The device beeps/vibrates in real-time, notifying to dial down or stop training.The sensor gives gentle alerts that remind you to come back to your breath during your yoga practice, and it provides breathing data visualizations and coaching to help you improve your practice over time.EASY TO USE      APP SPECS
Wireless connectivity via Bluetooth for real-time data sync
Available for both iOS and Android platforms
Get your post-workout analysis to get your performance metrics
Customized separate apps for all four models: RESPA™ Better Yoga, RESPA™ Elite Fitness 3.0, RESPA™ Fitness 2.0, and RESPA™ Coach
Classified breathing patterns in different zones: RESPA™ Elite Fitness 3.0 & RESPA™ Coach have (1) warm-up, (2) training, (3) exhaustion workout zones. RESPA™ Fitness 2.0 has (1) warm-up, (2) calorie burn, (3) fitness exercise zones. RESPA™ Better Yoga has (1) rhythmic, (2) non-rhythmic breathing zones
After each workout, the RESPA™ app provides easy-to-understand breathing data visualizations that allow you to track your progress and prepare for your next session. The companion app will track your progress to provide positive reinforcement and achieve your personal fitness goal, whether it is to lose some weight, improve fitness enough, complete 5k community run, race for a marathon or achieve your desired breathing pattern during yoga.COMPARISON CHARTREWARD SUMMARY  WIRELESS CHARGINGYour RESPA™ comes with an easy to use, rechargeable battery that gives you up to 36 hours of functionality in any exercise session.PRODUCT SPECS & DIMENSIONS
Portable small wearable device size of a quarter 
Easy to wear with a spring clip to use on shirts or sports bras 
On-board microphone, 3-axis accelerometer, 3-axis magnetometer (for direction/compass) and barometer (for elevation- only in Elite Fitness & Coach models) sensors 
Wireless charging (Qi charging)
Bluetooth communication to send to mobile app
The battery can last 36 hours in one exercise session
Flash memory
Material: Fitness models have a plastic enclosure, over-molded rubber material, and durable mechanical spring clip. Yoga models have a  plastic enclosure and a non-mechanical clip
  RESPA INVENTION & MANUFACTURINGRespa has strong intellectual property (IP) behind its science and technology, and we're very excited to bring this new device to you. We have filed utility patents for the algorithm, design patents for the look-and-feel, and a trademark for the name.We have a strong history of winning approval from the United States Patent & Trademark Office (USPTO). The Respa team, powered by Zansors, has been awarded four utility patents, five design patents, and six trademarks in the last three years. A strong IP portfolio for Respa means that this invention can endure so that many can enjoy and benefit from it for years to come.Not only is Respa strong on the science and IP side, but we also have a sharp manufacturing strategy to ensure 100% quality. As a benchmark, companies like Apple and Qualcomm own their proprietary designs but they have their products manufactured by third-party contract manufacturers. Respa will follow this same model., which has many benefits.First, Respa will be made right here in the USA. The device will be manufactured in Michigan - known for its electronics and automobile manufacturing - which means that its durability and quality will be excellent. Finally, we hand our proprietary blueprint designs to a specific third-party contract manufacturer who has the highest quality standards including ISO 9001 standard.Our partner has been in business since 2002, and they are experts in printed circuit board assembly and electronics manufacturing. Plus, they have an FDA certification for medical products. When you receive your very own Respa device, you can feel confident that you're getting the highest quality product.SCIENTIFIC SIGNIFICANCE
Measuring heart rate (HR) alone is not enough for fitness training.
Hard to determine personal training zone from HR 
Baseline varies by person 
Depends on current training level of a person 
Doesn’t feel intuitive to the person

story:
THE TEA

Classified as ‘Lippia javanica’ (our green tea) and Fadogia ancylantha (our black tea) by the US National Institutes of Health and US National Library of Medicine, Zumbani and Marange have grown in the jungles and forests of Africa for thousands of years.

Different tribes and villages keep their exact harvesting areas unknown to each other. Traditionally only served as part of a steady diet to warriors before tribal battles, to African royalty for promoting longevity, and to ailing tribesmen for their rejuvenating properties, they are found nowhere else in the world. These herbal teas are incomparably abundant in anti-oxidants, essential oils and nutrients, with unique earthy and 'citrusy' notes.

Published laboratory research shows that they have properties which act against a host of ailments; from arthritis to diabetes, and many more. It has long been known that the forests and jungles of South America and Africa harbor an array of plants known to treat and prevent a wide range of ailments, a fact which drives more bio-prospecting. Many of these plants are currently used in producing modern medicines.

CLICK LINKS TO GO TO US NATIONAL LIBRARY OF MEDICINE:

See published lab research on Zumbani     See published lab research on Marange

 OTHER NAMES FOR ZUMBANI (Lippia javanica)

  • Fevertea: Hundreds of early European settlers to southern Africa succumbed to various ailments until local villagers introduced them to Zumbani, which the settlers went on to name "fever tea".
  • Lemonbush: Stemming from its 'citrusy' notes and aromas.

 THE STORY

I have three passions in life; travel, tennis and tea. I love to sample all the local fare wherever I am, and above all, the local teas. While on a heritage discovery trip in southern Africa many years ago, I visited a small village in the southern parts of Zambia. Although I had read about them before in research journals, it was there that I first encountered these super-teas. From the moment of that first sip, I knew that the villagers had to share these delicious and unexplored nutrient-dense beverages with a progressively health-conscious global population.

My family traces back to these small villages and I have distant relatives there still harvesting these wild teas, thus my passion for this project. So far, we have harvested the initial batch of tea slated for this campaign, provided some equipment and clothing to our harvesters, designed and created the packaging.

Until now, the villagers have been living on less than US$1/day per family; the success of this undertaking would vastly improve their standard of living. In a part of the world where so many people have very little and depend on foreign aid, they have embraced this as a win-win venture for their villages and for global consumers. Our financial goals are inextricably linked to our desire for promoting the well-being of the small village communities which play a major role in bringing the tea to market. They have organized themselves into local cooperatives; each responsible for a particular aspect of the harvesting, withering and logistics. For the last 2 years, we have been packaging these teas for small local African markets to hone our production and logistics processes. The communities are drawing fulfillment from providing unique plants to the world; plants which can change many people's lives and have a meaningful impact on the world!

story:
Short Summary

     My name is Scott Monteiro and my son Joshua Monteiro has SMA (Spinal Muscular Atrophy) Type II. Joshua was diagnosed with this terminal and debilitating disease when he was only 18 months old. Joshua has continued to beat the odds as this disease has slowly taken away things we take for granted everyday. Joshua is confined to a wheelchair and his mobility has become more difficult and also painful.

     SMA causes scoliosis in most cases and Joshua is no exception. Joshua currently has a curve of 57 degrees and has begun to affect his lung function, ability to sit up straight and sleep at night. Joshua will be having surgery on August 30, 2012 at Vanderbilt Childrens Hospital to help correct this curve and insert rods. Following his surgery, Joshua will have to make almost exclusive use of his electric wheelchair.

     It is important to keep Joshua active not only at home but within the family and community. Staying active will help him recover from his surgery quicker and will also help him with the depression that follows most when they are restricted to their homes due to inability to get around. Your contribution will go a long way to not only heal Joshua physically, but also mentally and spiritually.

What We Need & What You Get

     Joshua is in need of a wheelchair ramp for a Minivan. These small portable ramps allow the electric chair to be easily driven up into a van with the seats taken out. The ramp is also lightweight and capable of folding into small, more manageable parts. The ability to fold the ramp and take it apart makes it light enough for my wife to carry and small enough to fit inside the vehicle.

     A second item Joshua is in need of is a Trailer Hitch Mounted Wheelchair carrier for the SUV we also drive. The minivan is a very old vehicle and is not reliable to get Joshua back and forth to his doctor appointments in Nashville. However, with the trailer hitch mounted carrier, we can continue to get Joshua to his appointments.

     The ramp for the minivan and the hitch carrier will cost at least $1,000 and that is not including the shipping, handling, and taxes. Any extra that we have after the ramp and carrier is purchased will go towards repairing a wheelchair ramp and deck to the house so Joshua can continue to come in and out of the house safely.

    With each donation up to $25 you will receive a signed thank you card. For donations between $26 and $35 you will receive a signed thank you card and signed picture of Joshua. For larger donations we have a few brand new Partylite items in addition to the signed thank you card and signed picture of Joshua. We have a Valentine Velvet Rose Gift Set, Gaia Tealight Lamp, Global Fusion Hurricane Lamp, and an Infinite Reflections Candle Holder.

     Should we fail to reach our goal, we will use whatever funds are donated and put it towards the purchase of the ramp and the trailer hitch mounted carrier.

The Impact

     Through the donations that you provide, children such as Joshua have an opportunity to experience the everyday freedoms that we so often take for granted. He can go outside and play, go to the park with his family or even just simply go shopping for groceries. He can feel included in the family unit and not feel left out all the time.
     Joshua never complains nor does he ask for much. I know he wants to be included each time we leave the house and we do the best we can to accomodate him and include him. However, without the ramp and the carrier this will become increasingly difficult. The one thing Joshua asked for took him many years to obtain due to the cost of the item and mounting medical bills. Joshua only wanted a bike. His legs do not allow him to ride a normal bicycle so Joshua had to have a recumbent hand bike. His story of receiving this bike was followed on local news and you can click on this link to follow the story. http://www.newschannel5.com/story/9719427/11-year-old-boys-one-dream-comes-true
     Your contribution will be far reaching with an impact that will be immediate and long lasting. From Joshua and all of us in his family, thank you for reading his story and thank you for donating from the bottom of our hearts.

Other Ways You Can Help

     If you're unable to make a financial contribution then all we ask is for you to please place Joshua and all other children stricken with a disease on your praryer list. The value of prayer can never have a monetary unit placed upon it. Also, please visit http://www.fsma.org/FSMACommunity/UnderstandingSMA/ and read about SMA (spinal muscular atrophy).

     Please also share this story with as many people as possible using Indiegogo share tools! As each share will certainly get a prayer and bring awareness to SMA!

story:
• Good oral hygiene can prevent bad breath, tooth decay, and gum disease, while poor oral hygiene can lead to severe problems with diabetes, heart disease, and other health issues?
  •  Germs grow faster in moist areas?
  •  Your toothbrush bristles exposed to environment can get easily polluted by mote, fecal particles, and microorganisms?

Puretta 2.0 smart sterilizing toothbrush come up with a solution that would cure the world of this nasty germ problem.

 

 

Puretta 2.0 is a smart UVC sterilization toothbrush holder, which can finish UVC LED sterilization within 10S and kill 99.9% bacteria & germs.

Compared to the first generation of UV mercury light, UVC LED technology is the latest UV technology. 

It will kill bacteria and germs in just 10 seconds and 99.9% bacteria & germs will be killed. It will guarantee you and your loved ones a clean toothbrush for safe daily oral care.

Coated with a silver surface in the Puretta 2.0 that can reflect UV light, allowing it to reach different corners inside the station cleaning and sterilizing from all angles.

 

Puretta 2.0 can intelligently recognize the movement of the human body. The  sterilizing system can be activated by each body movement. When user get close, the signal light turns on, when user leaves, the UV LED light starts  sterilize. This design can effectively avoid the hurts to user caused  by UVC LED light.

 

Dually sterilizing with LED UVC light and photocatalyst which make the sterilizing rate up to 99.99%.

How to work

 

Advanced solar power technology allows the Puretta 2.0 to be charged with any type of light, sunlight, light and natural light. 

Puretta 2.0 also has USB charging line and lithium battery power storage function, charging once can be used for three months, saving energy and protecting environment.

Puretta 2.0 is designed by DC power design and storage power by lithium-battery helps to avoid the danger caused by mess lines. With this design, you can be free from mess lines and install it anywhere you want.

Built-in toothpaste adapter, food-grade silica gel, environmental and safe. With this squeezer, you can get the toothpaste  easily and properly. Enhance the accuracy of squeezing toothpaste, and reduce the waste of toothpaste.

 

The design of double storage racks help user to keep more personal nursing tools such as dental floss, tongue scraper, shaver etc. (including 4 toothbrush locations in its front part, and 1 storage slot for other tools).

 

 

Puretta 2.0 solves the problem that the first product can not be removed and washed, whether it is for the toothbrush position or the toothpaste position, it is detachable and make it easy to clean.

The dustproof clamshell design is cleaner and more sanitary.

 

The Puretta can be easily installed on any surface wall by either 3M tape (pre-attached) or open slot attachment via nail or screw. 

 

Our Team at Puretta Technology Co, Ltd. has been working on the  Puretta 2.0 toothbrush station for about one year. We take interest in  designing modern, high-end, sterilization products, and we're very  excited to now launch this project on Kickstarter!

story:
Say hello to gấc. The superfruit with super powers.  

Packed with 90 different healing compounds, it’s your drinkable beauty boost.

 

Does your smart phone greet you first thing in the morning?  Do you fall asleep on your laptop at night? Is your dry, lifeless skin begging for a break from your hectic, connected life?

What if screen time could become green time? What if there was a drink that could harness the power of nature to fix all of this without having to give up any of that?

 

What if there was a functional water that could help reduce the damaging effects of stress, blue light and sunlight?   A beauty and wellness beverage that could help protect your eyes, your skin and so much more?

Wouldn’t you drink to that?

 

Don't just take our words for it. Hear what others think!

GacLife has been featured in:

***

Here are what real users think about our drinks:

“I’m in heaven! I could immediately tell that GacLife isn’t filled with tons of sugars and fake ingredients like other juices brands are….” - Tory J., 29 

***

“Even though it’s completely organic and natural, there is a delicate sweetness to the water that makes it tasteful. It’s not too raw, or too artificial. A happy medium.” - Jessica C., 31 

***

“A lot of ‘hangover remedy’ juices actually end up giving me a worse headache because of all the sugar and fake ingredients. This was one of the only juices I could drink after a night out and actually feel better. I felt more refreshed and lighter.” - Oliver B, 27 

***

“When I am tired of my morning coffee routine and looking for a little pick up, the GacLife water is that for me. Simple taste that I know isn’t dehydrating me like coffee but giving me the pick me up I need.” - Jordan A., 26

 

The superfruit with the super weird name, gấc (Momordica cochinchinensis) is a rare fruit found only in Southeast Asia.

For thousands of years, the people of Southeast Asia have cherished this "fruit from heaven" for good reason. This prickly orange powerhouse is a treasure trove of nutrients and antioxidants.

And we bet you’ve never heard of it.

 

Gac fruit has been Asia’s best-kept health and beauty secret for centuries. When mixed into a liquid form, gac is like a fountain of youth in your water bottle.

Named after the superfruit, gấc is drinkable beauty sent straight from heaven. But don’t take our word for it. The science is real.

Here’s what science geeks love about gấc.

 

A healthy diet, rich in antioxidants including carotenoids, could serve as the best preventive strategy against skin aging.

Gac friut contains more antioxidants, including Vitamins A,C, E, and flavonoids, polyphenols than you’ll find in other fruits and vegetables.  But gac’s biggest beauty boost comes from its mega high concentration of carotenoids that your body can actually absorb. It contains high levels of α-carotene, β-carotene, lutein, zeaxanthin and lycopene.

The "low sugar" box is also checked. Gac is mild tasting, similar to avocados with cucumber-like aroma. It contains very little sugar  – only 7g sugar/100g fresh gac aril. 

 

 

Gac fruit contains the highest concentration of carotenoids, one of the world’s most potent antioxidants, than you’ll find anywhere else.

Carotenoids are cool.  But the key to absorbing them is their bioavailability (amount that your body actually digests and absorbs). And gac’s natural carotenoids got that. Not only are the carotenoids available, they’re bioavailable. Meaning your body can use and absorb them.

 

 

Our founder, Yin Zou discovered the magic of gac fruit firsthand on a business trip to Vietnam. Amazed by gac’s refreshingly mild taste and health benefits, Yin noticed improvements in her skin, vision and overall energy level by making gac a daily staple in her diet. Yin was inspired to do more research and create a functional water to share with the world.

 

Based on extensive scientific research, Yin and her team took one of the world’s rarest superfruits and bottled it for maximum beauty benefits.  

Now you can choose from five, lip-smacking tropical fruity flavors mixed with either sparkling or still water. Pineapple, peach, passionfruit, lemon or mango. Yum. 

 

How can a functional water that tastes so light and refreshing work so hard to keep you healthy, hydrated and protected? Glad you asked.  

Here’s what’s in it: 

(nutrition slightly varies by all-natural fruit juice in each flavor)

 

You may ask. How much is 20mg? What does it mean? Here is roughly what you’ll need to eat to obtain 20mg of carotenoids.

 

 

Gấc’s beauty is more than just skin deep. It’s your beverage friend with benefits. Our drinks offer you antioxidants, including Carotenoids (lycopene, beta-carotene, lutein, zeaxanthin), Vitamins A, C, E, and other healing compounds naturally occur in gac. 

  • Vitamins A,C, E & carotenoids can rejuvenate collagen, which keeps your skin looking firm and young.
  • Lutein, Zeaxanthin can protect your eyes against oxidative damage from visible blue light and UVs and improve hand-eye coordination. 
  • Lycopene can reduce oxidative DNA damage and cardiovascular risk during physical exercises. 

Gấc is antioxidant and pro beauty. Now that’s a potent elixir. 

 

 

Here’s what gấc doesn’t contain.  

No added sugars, no preservatives, and none of the yucky chemicals found in most functional water drinks, fruit juices and sodas that claim to be healthy.

Our ingredients are simple: water or carbonated water & fruit juices (not from concentrate). Each 12oz bottle contains only 0 ~ 3g sugar – all from 100% natural fruit juice. 

 

 


Stunning on the outside.  Smart on the inside. Just like your college crush. Made of 100% recyclable aluminum, our made-in-USA bottles are reusable and Mother Earth approved.

 


 

Hey, we know you’re not going to give up your devices or your busy lifestyle.  You work hard. Isn’t it time for a cool, new, functional wellness water that works as hard as you do?

So you keep doing you.  Just add gấc into the mix and let your beauty flag fly.

 

Here’s what we’ll do with your dollars when you preorder gấc.

We’re all about sustainable bottling and creating a product that’s earth friendly. If you join our crowd funding effort, you’ll help us purchase the special tools we need to package our drinks in 100% recyclable, reusable aluminum bottles here in Los Angeles, CA at our bottler Seven Up’s facility.

C’mon, let’s make funding fun.  Help us bring this rare superfruit drinkable skincare to the U.S. and beyond in the most sustainable packaging!

On behalf of the GacLife crew, thank you for your support!

 

Meet Team GacLife

  • Avalon Bauman - Social Media Manager. 
  • Graham Gould - Beverage Developer. R&D specialist.
  • Huy Nguyen - Website Developer. Default Vietnamese expert.
  • Bridgette Orten -  Marketing Strategist. Digital nomad.
  • Isis Shiffer - Packaging Designer/Illustrator. Environmentalist.
  • Lisa Tassiello - Graphic Designer. Creative Wizard.
  • Claire Weitz - Videographer & Editor. Mother to the "ginger baby" Roy in our video. 
  • James Weitz - Videographer & Producer. Father to the "ginger baby" Roy in our video.
  • Yin Zou - Founder. Foodie. 

GacLife Advisory Board Members

  • Gregg Coccari - Serial entrepreneur, former CEO of Stella & Chewy & Teleflora. 
  • Jimmy S. Firouz, M.D., FACS - Anti-aging Specialist. Founder, Firouz Institute at Beverly Hills. 
  • Martin Mitcell - GacLife Food Safety Advisor. Managing Director, Certified Laboratory, Inc.

 

 

#Drinkgaclife

Like what you're seeing? Want to help us? Just 30 seconds of your time can make a huge difference. Hit the share button below and to tag a friend or co-worker who needs this!

We can't do this without you!

FAQ's

Why should I back it now?

Take advantage of our huge discount available on Indiegogo! Our retail price will become USD $4.80/per bottle (including shipping within the U.S.) once Indiegogo campaign is completed in mid-August. 

Be among the first in the world to join us on our mission to beautify the world one gấc bottle at a time.

 

What does gac fruit taste like?

The gac fruit tastes very mild, similar to an avocado but slightly sweeter, it also comes with a refreshing aroma that can remind you of cucumbers. It does not taste bitter or sour. Its sugar level is naturally low, between that of lemons and strawberries.

Because of its mild tastes, gac complements very well with other fruits. Our beverage developer mix gac with other fruits juices to create a nutritious and tasty skincare tonic. We have gac + lemon, gac+peach, gac+pineapple, gac+passion fruit and gac+mango.

 

Are there any side effects I should be aware of?

There are no known side effects of consuming gac aril or the other 100% pure fruit juices we use in the product. However, please discontinue use immediately if you experience any uncomfortable side-effects.
 

Where is GacLife manufactured?

Our beverages will be manufactured in Los Angeles, U.S.A. 

 

Is GacLife available internationally?

Yes! But additional shipping charges will apply. Select the Perks you want to see the rates. 

 

How do I contact you for more questions?

Email hello@gaclife.com, text 310-598-5991, or message us on Facebook.

 

Is GacLife FDA approved?

GacLife products are beverages, and are FDA compliant. This means that the ingredients used are considered safe within the FDA monograph system. Additionally, every step of our sourcing, testing, and manufacturing complies with the requirements set forth in the FDA regulations.

 

Can you share the science research on gac?

Yes. Please read more below. 

(1). Antioxidant carotenoids & Other bioactive compounds in gac fruit:

  • University of Hawaii: Momordica cochinchinensis Spreng. (gac) fruit carotenoids reevaluated. 
  • Underutilized β-Carotene–Rich Crops of Vietnam. Food and Nutrition Bulletin, vol. 21, no. 2 (2000), The United Nations University.
  • Gac fruit (Momordica cochinchinensis Spreng.): a rich source of bioactive compounds and its potential health benefits. Food Science & Technology, Vol 50. Issue 3, 2015.  
  • University of New Castle. Gac Fruit: Bioactive Compounds, options for process, and utilization of process products. 
  • Ishida, B.K., Turner, C., Chapman, M.H., McKeon, T.A. 2004. Fatty acids and carotenoid composition in gac (momordica cochinchinensis spreng) fruit. Journal of Agricultural and Food Chemistry. Vol 52, p. 274-279. 

 

(2) Superior bio accessibility of natural carotenoids in gac fruit

  • Müller-Maatsch, Judith, et al. "Carotenoids From Gac Fruit Aril (momordica Cochinchinensis [lour.] Spreng.) Are More Bioaccessible Than Those from Carrot Root and Tomato Fruit." Food research international (2017) 
  • Plasma beta-carotene and retinol concentrations of children increase after a 30-d supplementation with the fruit Momordica cochinchinensis (gac). Am J Clin Nutr. 2002 May;75(5):8729. 

 

(3) Carotenoids and Skin, Vision health research

  • Vandersee S, Beyer M, Lademann J, Darvin ME. Blue-Violet Light Irradiation Dose Dependently Decreases Carotenoids in Human Skin, Which Indicates the Generation of Free Radicals. Oxidative Medicine and Cellular Longevity.
  • Darvin, Maxim & Sterry, Wolfram & Lademann, Juergen & Vergou, Theognosia. (2011). The Role of Carotenoids in Human Skin. Molecules. 16. 10491-10506. 10.3390/molecules161210491. 
  • Influence of the dietary carotenoids lutein and zeaxanthin on visual performance: application to baseball. 
  • Darvin, M.; Patzelt, A.; Gehse, S.; Schanzer, S.; Benderoth, C.; Sterry, W.; Lademann, J. Cutaneous concentration of lycopene correlates significantly with the roughness of the skin. Eur. J. Pharm. Biopharm. 2008, 69, 943-947. 

 

(4) Lycopene & Athletic Performance

  • https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3494535/ 

  • https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3238154/ 

  • https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/23291317

 

(5) Gac for Topical Use: 

  • Clinical evaluation of Gac extract (Momordica cochinchinensis) in an antiwrinkle cream formulation

 

(6) Cancer research on Gac seed extract:

  • Tien, PG, et al. Inhibition of tumor growth and angiogenesis by water extract of Gac fruit (Momordica cochinchinensis Spreng). Int J Oncol. 2005 Apr;26(4):881-9. 
  • Yu, Jae Sik et al., Antiproliferative effect of Momordica cochinchinensis seeds on human lung cancer cells and isolation of the major constituents, Revista Brasileira de Farmacognosia, Volume 27, Issue 3, 2017. 329-333. 
  • Momordica cochinchinensis Spreng. seed extract suppresses breast cancer growth by inducing cell cycle arrest and apoptosis. Mol Med Rep. 2015 Oct;12(4):6300-10.
