story:
Welcome to GenuineDocs®

Campaign

 

 

 

Summary:

GenuineDocs is a pioneer of diploma authentication over the internet.

Its objective is to deliver an additional layer of diploma security that is completely detached from the hard copies. The solution will act as an anti-tampering and anti-fraud counter-measure. It will protect the integrity of any document in time and space.

GenuineDocs Ltd is located in Toronto, Canada.

What it is ?

Diploma authentication is a new document fraud counter-measure service designed to protect the authenticity of originals. It is a smart solution to guard against credentials fraud by leveraging the power of the internet.

Genuinedocs acts as an authentication registry and custodian of an exact electronic copy of the original parchment.

 Why ?

Diploma fraud has been rampant, borderless and a serious issue for a number of years.

There is a multitude of providers that will sell you a diploma of your choosing for less than 100$. This is not fair to all others who earned their degrees the old fashioned way at great sacrifice and expense.

The proliferation of websites selling “novelty diplomas” of reputed institutions has made credentials fraud very easy and widespread. Document tampering and reproduction is increasingly difficult to detect.

Most of the time, credentials fraud is uncovered after the fact. Prevention is the best solution.

We need innovative solutions to counter diploma fraud.

How ?

The best way to protect a diploma is to create a cyber-copy and place it on the internet. This will detach the security feature from the document and place it out of reach of counterfeiters.

Our solution is simple yet valuable because it protects the most treasured investment in your life: Education.

The solution is borderless and timeless: Anywhere, Anytime, Permanent protection.

Mission:

Our mission is to provide a simple and easy way to authenticate documents instantly without hindrance, delays or red tape.

Our objective is to enhance confidence in document security with maximum assurance for holders and users anytime, anywhere.

How it works ?

At the time of issuance, an electronic scanned copy of the diploma is registered with GenuineDocs and assigned a unique reference number. The scan is added to the registry and made available for consultation on the web.

 

 

The diploma check portal is simple:

 

The solution is portable:

 

 

Benefits:

For Documents

- Safeguard authenticity
- Protect in time and space
- Enhanced security and watermarking
- Detached security features
- Enhanced trust by users
- Easily verifiable
- Less prone to tampering

For Students

- Belonging to protected institutions
- Enhanced confidence in their credentials
- Easier enrollment by other institutions
- Higher trust by employers
- Speedier employment

 For Institutions

- Protect your valuable reputation
- Be part of a protected institutions network
- Eliminate and counter fraud targeting
- Enhance confidence in your students
- Increase trust by employers
- Speedier hiring of your graduates

What We Need & What You Get :

The funds raised in this campaign will go to the marketing of this new document security tool. Your contribution will help spread the adoption of this bullet-proof anti-tampering solution.

In return for your contribution, we have designed a set of perks that will allow you to register your proudest achievement. You will send your original diploma for in-house scan and it will be returned to you. All registrations perks are subject to verification.

Be a proud sponsor of GenuineDocs ground breaking solution.

    Perk 1 - Proud Pioneer   $10: 

Show us your support and we'll send you exclusive updates and information as we build the brand. Thanks!

    Perk 2:  Future Graduate Pioneer $25

Graduating soon or know someone who is? Register your future diploma when you receive it. (2014 and 2015 graduates).

    Perk 3:  Bachelor Pioneer $30

Register a Bachelor degree in your personal name and give it that extra benefit. Add $10 Canada, $15 USA and International for registered return mail.

    Perk 4:  Master Pioneer $55

Register a Bachelor and a Master degree (same person only). Add $10 Canada, $15 USA and International for registered return mail.

    Perk 5:  Ph.D. Pioneer $85

Register a Bachelor, Master AND Ph.D. degree (same person only). Add $10 Canada, $15 USA and International for registered return mail.

    Perk 6:  Group Pioneers $115

Register any 4 degrees for 4 different persons. Add $10 Canada, $15 USA and International for registered return mail.

    Perk 7:  Founder’s Circle $250:

Register 1 degree and be listed on the Founder's Circle page as the first angel funders. (Registered degrees return mail free).

All registrations are subject to verification.

Other Ways You Can Help

If can’t contribute that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Please get the word out and talk to your circle and friends
  • Talk to your alumni asocaition or college.
  • Blog about Genuinedocs
  • Share our campaign with http://igg.me/at/genuinedocs
  • Our website : http://www.genuinedocs.com/

GenuineDocs Ltd was founded by M. Hatem Soltani, a veteran of the IT industry having held various positions with IBM, Dell and Celestica.

If you have any questions, please contact us at inquiries@genuinedocs.com

Its objective is to deliver an additional layer of diploma security that is completely detached from the hard copies. The solution will act as an anti-tampering and anti-fraud counter-measure. It will protect the integrity of any document in time and space.
GenuineDocs Ltd is located in Toronto, Canada.What it is ?
Diploma authentication is a new document fraud counter-measure service designed to protect the authenticity of originals. It is a smart solution to guard against credentials fraud by leveraging the power of the internet.
Genuinedocs acts as an authentication registry and custodian of an exact electronic copy of the original parchment.
 Why ?
Diploma fraud has been rampant, borderless and a serious issue for a number of years.
There is a multitude of providers that will sell you a diploma of your choosing for less than 100$. This is not fair to all others who earned their degrees the old fashioned way at great sacrifice and expense.
The proliferation of websites selling “novelty diplomas” of reputed institutions has made credentials fraud very easy and widespread. Document tampering and reproduction is increasingly difficult to detect.
Most of the time, credentials fraud is uncovered after the fact. Prevention is the best solution.
We need innovative solutions to counter diploma fraud.
How ?
The best way to protect a diploma is to create a cyber-copy and place it on the internet. This will detach the security feature from the document and place it out of reach of counterfeiters.
Our solution is simple yet valuable because it protects the most treasured investment in your life: Education.
The solution is borderless and timeless: Anywhere, Anytime, Permanent protection.
Mission:
Our mission is to provide a simple and easy way to authenticate documents instantly without hindrance, delays or red tape.
Our objective is to enhance confidence in document security with maximum assurance for holders and users anytime, anywhere.
How it works ?
At the time of issuance, an electronic scanned copy of the diploma is registered with GenuineDocs and assigned a unique reference number. The scan is added to the registry and made available for consultation on the web.
 
 
The diploma check portal is simple:
 
The solution is portable:
 
 
Benefits:
For Documents 
- Safeguard authenticity  - Protect in time and space - Enhanced security and watermarking - Detached security features - Enhanced trust by users - Easily verifiable - Less prone to tampering
For Students
- Belonging to protected institutions
- Enhanced confidence in their credentials
- Easier enrollment by other institutions
- Higher trust by employers
- Speedier employment
 For Institutions
- Protect your valuable reputation - Be part of a protected institutions network - Eliminate and counter fraud targeting - Enhance confidence in your students - Increase trust by employers - Speedier hiring of your graduates
What We Need & What You Get :
The funds raised in this campaign will go to the marketing of this new document security tool. Your contribution will help spread the adoption of this bullet-proof anti-tampering solution.
In return for your contribution, we have designed a set of perks that will allow you to register your proudest achievement. You will send your original diploma for in-house scan and it will be returned to you. All registrations perks are subject to verification.
Be a proud sponsor of GenuineDocs ground breaking solution.
    Perk 1 - Proud Pioneer   $10: 
Show us your support and we'll send you exclusive updates and information as we build the brand. Thanks!
    Perk 2:  Future Graduate Pioneer $25
Graduating soon or know someone who is? Register your future diploma when you receive it. (2014 and 2015 graduates).
    Perk 3:  Bachelor Pioneer $30
Register a Bachelor degree in your personal name and give it that extra benefit. Add $10 Canada, $15 USA and International for registered return mail.
    Perk 4:  Master Pioneer $55
Register a Bachelor and a Master degree (same person only). Add $10 Canada, $15 USA and International for registered return mail.
    Perk 5:  Ph.D. Pioneer $85
Register a Bachelor, Master AND Ph.D. degree (same person only). Add $10 Canada, $15 USA and International for registered return mail.
    Perk 6:  Group Pioneers $115
Register any 4 degrees for 4 different persons. Add $10 Canada, $15 USA and International for registered return mail.
    Perk 7:  Founder’s Circle $250:
Register 1 degree and be listed on the Founder's Circle page as the first angel funders. (Registered degrees return mail free).
All registrations are subject to verification.
Other Ways You Can Help
If can’t contribute that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

Please get the word out and talk to your circle and friends
Talk to your alumni asocaition or college.
Blog about Genuinedocs
Share our campaign with http://igg.me/at/genuinedocs

Our website : http://www.genuinedocs.com/


GenuineDocs Ltd was founded by M. Hatem Soltani, a veteran of the IT industry having held various positions with IBM, Dell and Celestica.
If you have any questions, please contact us at inquiries@genuinedocs.com

story:
86 year old Australian aged pensioner, Dietrich Durdis travelled to Bali, Indonesia in early August, shortly thereafter he fell and broke his hip. Dietrich is without travel insurance, and due to his injury was unable to return on his booked flight back to Australia, so has spent the last 9 weeks in traction at Sanglah Hospital in Bali. Sanglah Medical Practitioners have advised that Dietrich requires surgery and have quoted approximately $15000 AUD to undertake the operation. Dietrich is extremely hesitant to undergo the surgery in Indonesia and would rather receive medical treatment in Australia. Without travel insurance Dietrich's options to return to Australia for medical treatment are extremely limited. Due to his injuries, Dietrich is required to travel on a stretcher and with a medical escort. The only airline that is able to accommodate such a requirement from Bali, Indonesia, to Darwin, Australia (one way) is Silk airlines, their quote of $30000 AUD is considerably less that the quote received from Flight Care International (Australia) which came in at $39773.93 AUD (though would require travel from Australia to Indonesia return). The Australian Embassy is able to assist with the making of arrangements and have been very helpful, though unfortunately are unable to assist financially. Sanglah Hospital are charging $100 AUD per day, and to date, directly related expenses have reached over $8000 AUD (which has been met by friends and family within the community). Dietrich is also being fined daily by the Indonesian Government for overstaying his Visa due to not being able afford appropriate travel and leave Indonesia. During the last 9 weeks, Dietrich's health has deteriorated and he has suffered significant weight loss.

My name is Darlene Devery, I am a family friend of Dietrich. I am a long term resident of Darwin and an active member of my community. I hold very grave concerns for Dietrich's health and feel that if Dietrich is not financially assisted to return to Australia for medical treatment it may ultimately result in his demise. My goal is to assist Dietrich to return to Australia in any way that I possibly can. Myself and other members of the Darwin (and indeed nationally throughout Australia) community have banded together and created a group page on Facebook where our progress, ideas and support are being posted, you can find this page at www.facebook.com/groups/BringDietrichHome

We believe that if we can raise enough community awareness about Dietrich's plight and disastrous circumstances we will reach our fundraising goal of $55000 AUD. Social networking is a fabulous tool and can really be used to benefit this gentleman to return home to Australia to undergo medical treatment and regain his health. If the fundraising goal of $55000 is reached, these funds will be used directly to pay hospital expenses, fines in relation to Dietrich's overstay of his visa in Indonesia and retrieval from Bali returning him home to Darwin and Australian medical treatment. If the goal of $50000 is not reached, we will continue to fundraise until we can afford to get Dietrich home to Australia.

With Australian 'Schoolies Week' fast approaching us, this campaign can also be utilised as a community education tool, to ensure that youths and their parents who may be travelling abroad to celebrate 'Schoolies Week' take out appropriate travel / health insurance as in Dietrich's circumstances, one never knows when something as disastrous as this can happen to an individual whilst abroad.

Whilst I understand that not everyone can afford to donate financially to the 'Bring Dietrich Home to Australia' Campaign there are many other ways that you can contribute to the cause. You can share posts from our Facebook page to raise community awareness, you could encourage your friends to do the same. Our campaign also relies heavily on community support and anything else you can do to help spread our message.

So far: Contacts in Bali will be visiting Dietrich whilst he is in hospital; Darwin community members who are travelling to Bali in the near future have committed to taking required items to Dietrich; we have been interviewed by the Northern Territory News (Darwin) and they have committed to featuring an article to raise awareness of our campaign. We are also contacting local government members and other community groups and or organisations to ascertain what assistance they may provide.

I have so far emailed / facebook messaged / telephoned :

Mission Australia, Red Cross Australia, Sommerville Community Services, The Salvation Army, Australian Embassy, NT News, The Sydney Morning Herald, Take 5 Magazine; Australian Womens Weekly, The Today Show, Sixty Minutes, Sunday Night, The Morning Show,  Inside Edition, Sky News, The Australian, United Nations News, Auustralian Story, Mix 104.9 Radio Station, Hot 100 Radio Station, A Current Affair, Nine News Darwin, Perth Now, Advertiser, Womans Day, New Idea, The Age, Courier Mail, Daily Telegraph, Herald Sun, Seven News Perth, Sunday Telegraph, Sunday Herald, Sunday Telegraph and the West Australian. Although I have not yet had responses from all of these organisations the campaign is only but young.

story:
Hello!

 

Please allow me to introduce myself and explain my campaign and why it is so important to me.

My name is Tracy Wilder-Garmon. In July of 1986, while pregnant with my first child, my mother Anne Wilder was diagnosed with breast cancer. In September of '86, she underwent a double mastectomy and a lymphectomy. At that time, her oncologist declared her 'cancer free' and sent her on her way. Fast forward to Christmas Eve, 1987; while showering that night, my mother felt a hard mass on her breast bone. She didn't tell our family until after the holidays and after her follow-up with her oncologist. Sadly, the breast cancer had returned. When I got the news, I was incredulous! I did not understand how a woman with no breast, no breast tissue and no lymph nodes could have breast cancer again. It was explained to us that a rogue cell had escaped the surgery and that my mom was no in the fight of her life. The mass was removed and my mother began a regimen of chemo and radiation. She did it with bravery and a sense of humor. She kept our spirits up with her grace and courage. In the midst of her treatments and two months after finding out I was expecting my second child, my daddy succumbed to a massive heart attack. It punched a hole in our world...in our hearts and I could see in my mom's eyes that she was losing her will to fight. She continued her treatments, but she had no fight left in her. Even the birth of a second grandbaby was not enough to bring the life back in her eyes and on March 21, 1991, after an almost five year battle with breast cancer, my mom passed away. Not a day goes by that I don't miss my mom and wish she had won her battle. She missed out on so much. The birth of a third grandbaby. All the joys that come along with being 'Grandma'. Watching those gBabies grow up and have babies of their own. She would be overjoyed to spoil her two GREAT granddaughters!

That is what brings me here to Indiegogo and my campaign to 'Kick Cancer's Ass!'. Since October is Breast Cancer Awareness Month, I felt like this would be a good time to launch my campaign and let people know about the project I have planned for this month. One of my mother's many talents was sewing and she passed that talent and love on to me. I know own my own sewing and embroidery company. During the month of October, I will be selling quilt panels and when I have finished the quilt, there will (hopefully) be at least 100 squares honoring and/or memorializing loved ones who are battling, have battled and won their fight with cancer or battled and sadly lost their courageous battle.

 

The quilt panels are $25.00 each. Each panel will be approximately 7” x 7” and I will monogram each panel that is sold. For example, I will buy a panel that says 'In Memory Of Anne Wilder'. You can buy more than one panel and each honoree can have more than one panel. Every single person reading this has been touched by cancer in some way. It is a cruel and relentless disease when left untreated. Even those this is Breast Cancer Awareness Month, you can honor anyone with any kind of cancer.

 

I am not limiting myself to just 100 panels, but that is my first goal. If more panels are sold, there will be another quilt. I will make a hundred quilts if need be! Once completed, the quilt(s) will be presented to the cancer unit at Northside-Forsyth hospital here in Cumming, GA. All proceeds raised will go to the Susan G. Komen Race For The Cure. My oldest granddaughter Brooklyn will present the quilt(s) and the check. Even though she is only four, she understands the magnitude of the loss of my 'mommy'. In the last two years, Brooklyn has raised close to $1500.00 for The American Cancer Society and Relay For Life.

 

So, in a nutshell, I am going to make quilt(s) and raise money and be a part of 'Kickin' Cancer' Ass!' and I am asking you to be a part of this with me! For the price of 2 large pizzas and a six pack or 2 movie tickets and a bucket of popcorn, you can help bring awareness and raise money for a disease that has touched every single person's life in one way or another. Whether a survivor or a warrior in the midst of battle or the loved one of them, we all know and love someone who has/had cancer.

 

After you make your donation, would you please pass the information along to your friends and family? Be vocal! Be obnoxious! Together we can make this happen! And, don't forget to use the Indiegogo 'SHARE' tools and send this to everyone you know! Please?

story:
The Alpha Spring system is a new and innovative device that absorbs water from the atmosphere and delivers pure drinking water in huge quantities. The quantity depends on the size of the installation. The apparatus works in manifold environents,  even in desserts.

The Alpha Spring design has been progressing for over ten years including extensive research, development work including the creation of several prototypes.

The current prototype has been running for over a year now and keeps delivering more than a hundred gallons of fresh, clean drinking water to Southern Germany.

We now plan on building an Alpha Spring pilot plant where it's needed most in the world.

Some of our goals for the Alpha Spring pilot plant are:

·         greater output
·         larger size 
·         serial production stage

We would like you to help decide where this amazing Alpha Spring pilot plant is going to be built: for exmaple, a refugee camp in Lybia, the Arizona desert, a town in the Sahara...?

After successful funding we will start building immediately. It will be a fascinating project developing anywhere in the world where people need it most.  

We estimate two years of pre-planning, production and constructing on site. By the end of 2014 the Alpha Spring System will be delivering about 5,000 gallons of drinking water per day, depending on the climatic zone. There will be clean water provided locally for humans, animals and even farming.

 

Frank Thielow, Alpha Spring inventor, and assistant working on the laterst Alpha Spring prototype.

Alpha Spring prototype on the test field, Bodnegg, Germany

Inside of the Alpha Spring reactor.

Test unit of the new develoved destilation system. 

Alpha Spring pilot plant.

Frank Thielow testing parts of the new reactor.

Our revolutionary new Cyclon Steam distillation system.

A part of the Alpha Spring reactor.

An absorbing plate for the Alpha Spring prototype.

Upper mold part of the Alpha Spring prototype in our workshop.

story:
Hello everyone, my name is Nathnael Haile. I am a student at St cloud state university. Me and my Friends are tying to raise money to help people in rural areas of Ethiopia and many other African countries who does not have clean water to drink.

 

  We are doing this through the organization I am a member of at my school called Ethiopian student association (ESA), which is also in collaboration with the bigger organization called Water to thrive in making this project happen.

 

we have the luxury of playing in water parks with clean water, showering for 30 min, drinking bottled water and more, lets remember there are people who walk 5 miles back and forth every day to get water to drink. water which can potentially kill them! we can make a difference and you can help!

story:
My Story

Several years ago, my life partner was diagnosed with a rare genetic disease called Porphyria and it had proven to be a struggle as many doctors had not had any experience. She can't be exposed to the sun for long, or she develops 3rd degree burns on her limbs that require constant attention.


These past few years we have adjusted and learned how to deal and adapt to this, after several hospital stays and constant fear that my partner would lose her life.

I couldn't be more proud of her now, overcoming such a painful and horrible disease and learning to live day by day.

 

A couple of months ago, I felt lumps on my breast and assumed it was fibercists sprouting up again. I was wrong.

I have been diagnosed with Stage 3A Breast Cancer and now I have to adjust to losing my hair, my breasts and everything I know.

I'm a musician, I'm a mother, I'm a life parnter, I'm a Buddhist, I'm a hippie... and soon, I hope to be a breast cancer survivor.

 
I have a team of doctors at UTMB Health Breast Center that working as diligently as they can to stop this cancer before it claims my life.
 

What We Can Expect

After many, many, many tests and doctor's appointments, we have determined the best course of action, unfortunately it requires nearly every treatment option known to breast cancer.

  • Continuous Doctor's Appointments
  • MRI
  • PET Scan
  • ECHO Scan
  • Blood Work
  • Biopsies

And this is all BEFORE actual treatment, and my medical bills have already staggered pretty high.

 

The doctors want to pursue an aggressive treatment, because my cells were considered a grade 3.... which means they are severely cancerous and aggressive. They have a 1 year plan to hopefully turn me into a breast cancer survivor.

The treatment includes:

  • A double mastectomy
  • Breast reconstruction
  • Chemotherapy
  • Radiation
  • HER2 Protein Therapy

 

Recovery aids include:

  • Heavy duty Aair sanitizers
  • Wigs
  • Probably much more I haven't thought of

We estimate these treatments to total over $10,000 (not including recovery aids) if not more in the next year. We do not expect to reach our full goal of course, but we hope to make at least enough to not cost our home and well-being in exchange for my life.

story:
What is the Expert Marksman System?

I came up with the idea for the EM system after supervising Small Arms Instructors (SAIs) for the US Coast Guard.  We would spend hours of instructor time and hundreds of bullets teaching a new shooter basic marksmanship to the point where they could qualify to carry a weapon.  The EM system was developed for military/police marksmanship training but is avalible for anyone wanting to improve their marksmanship skills.

The EM system is based on motion sensors like those found in your smartphone and most gaming systems.  These measure acceleration and rotation of the firearm during the trigger pull to display any mistakes the shooter makes while shooting.  By providing immediate feedback to the shooter, they can more quickly train themselves to perform a smooth trigger pull.  The EM system also works during live fire training to detect anticipation motion before firing!  

For experienced shooters, the EM system provides a great dry-fire warm-up to any range day and lets you diagnose shooting problems by seeing the detailed motion of your trigger pull like it has never been seen before.  The result is better shooting with fewer bullets!  The EM system is accurate to under .5 inches at 25 yards and under 2 inches at 100 yards.

The EM system works with a hand held or laptop device via a Bluetooth 4.0 connection available on all new iPhones and iPads and most Android phones and tablets.  The EM system can also interface with a 4.0 compatible windows device or windows based laptop via a USB dongle adaptor.  

The EM system can be integrated into the firearm in multiple ways but we have settled on the two best approaches.  The EM system can be attached to the rail mount system on most modern firearms for training and removed just as easily and is therefor the simplest approach that we will be launching with.  For firearms without a rail system, we can integrate the EM system into a magazine.  The large number of magazines that are currently used means that we will be rolling these devices out separately in the future.

Benefits of the EM system

The EM system include:

  • Reduced number of bullets required to initially training and maintain marksmanship competency.
  • Never before seen insight into what a student's trigger pull looks like and direct feedback on any errors.
  • Reduced workload for Small Arms Instructors to maintain firearms qualifications.

Project Status

The EM system has been under development for over three years and is ready for our first production run!  Some of the tasks completed are:

  • Fundamental physics is well understood and validated with experiments
  • A proof of concept device was fabricated and used to test the system and user interface.
  • A set of rail mount production prototypes were designed and fabricated for wireless units.
  • The basic iOS code has been developed.
  • A Li-Ion battery was found that can supply over 5 hours of continuous operation between charges.
  • The production prototypes have been extensively live fire tested.

 

The Race to Product Release!

We are attempting to finish the last few development tasks and go to production to launch the EM system at several Law Enforcement trade shows this fall with the big launch at the 2014 SHOT SHOW in Vegas!  This is where you can help.  The money raised in this project will be used to:

  • Initial Production run of the EM system.  We are looking at at least 1000 units with more if needed.
  • Complete the iOS user interface.  The iPhone/iPad software works but the user interface is a little clunky.  A big task will be to streamline the interface so that the system is easy and intuitive to use.
  • Develop Java based software for Android based systems.  We don't want to limit this to the Apple only crowd!
  • Trade shows here we come!

story:
I will be traveling to Kenya with Straw to Bread missions to work in a clinic alongside American and Kenyan doctors. I will be serving orphans and elders affected by the AIDS epidemic in a clinic in the impoverished region of the Nyakach Plateau. I have been praying to go back to Africa since the summer of 2011 and I am finally getting the chance return!  Once I become a doctor, my goal is to start my own medical mission in Africa. By sponsoring this trip you will be an integral part of improving the quality of life for the people of the Nyakach Plateau. Thank you so much for your generosity!  

Read more about my journey to Kenya!

Straw to Bread

story:
(Disclaimer — This is a REAL FUNDRAISER to raise funds for REAL GENDER-AFFIRMING SURGERY. We realize it all sounds absurd but that’s just ‘cuz we’re hilarious.)

From the fags who brought you KittyManTittyMay comes the special holiday edition: KITTYMANTITTY FOR THE CURE! -Never heard of Kitty Man Titty? Well it's this very special project where we encourage fellow homos to stuff a cat down their shirt long enough to snap a picture. You can check it out here—

https://www.facebook.com/events/454463137969743/

 Basically, we’re trying to get top surgery. Since our best efforts to get kitties to claw our tits off this spring obviously failed, we are asking for your help to do it the old fashioned way — with doctors and everything. Surgery is expensive  (8,000 a pop!) and we really need your help to make it happen!

Here's how you can help:

1. Donate money to our super awesome fundraiser, and get one of cat boob themed perks! (check out our sidebar of cat and boob themed swag) Invite your friends and family to do the same!

2. Post a picture of a cat in your boobs on your Facebook!

3. Vote for your favorite KittyTitty pic, the top twelve will be featured in our Real Kitties of Kitty Man Titty calendar!

About us:

JUDE is the lezziest lezbro ever to bro. Also, some kind of gender! Maybe! If you don’t know them, you really should because they tell the best fart jokes and originated the practice of putting cats in yr boobs.They are secretly, like, really smart and political and going to be a radical lawyer someday if they ever figure out how to shower on the regs.

Fun ManTittyPity Fact: when Jude puts their boobs over Grey’s face, his whole head actually disappears! For the love of tits, help them!

GREY identifies as an Italian princess trapped in the body of a (very small!) Russian Mafioso. Or vice versa. No one is sure! He is a closeted writer and out freak. For some reason, people let him care for their children! If you don’t know him, consider yrself lucky.

P.S. It's actually exhausting and debilitating and crippling-lyanxietiz-ing (uh?) to bind yr chest all the time! Not to mention hating yr body! We would like to breathe more, hate less! We would like to not guilt you or make you feel bad for us! But we would like to breathe more and feel ok in our bodies! This is the most we're gonna beg! Thanks!

story:
Macbook Down!

The Milkman and The Paperboy needs your help.  Due to an unfortunate incicident involving a three year old child - our Millennium Falcon (Tucker's Macbook) is down for the count. To get the show back on the air we need to raise some funds

What We're Asking For

The screen of the computer is destroyed.  We need to replace it otherwise we can't record.

  • To get back on the air we're going to need to raise 700 dollars
  • We're going to have some super cool perks for our backers

The Impact

In the absence of TMATPB Shamus has been wandering around Monmouth County and Tucker will not stop vining videos from the Sid and Marty Krofft show Lidsville.  For the good of all that is holy - help get these guys back behind the microphones. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We can't do this without your help.  Anything you can contribute would be appreciated.

story:
Hello and Thank You for taking the time to look at this Campaign. I know that Everyone has rough patches, Everyone has their own problems and no matter how bad Someone does have it, there is ALWAYS someone who has it worse, but if you have a few minutes to read our Families story and possibly help in anyway you can it would be greatly appreciated. I will tell the story of our Family and my Mom here, but I also tell it in the video as well, if you would rather watch than read. (Sorry its quite the long read). The reason we are needing to reach out is my Mom has Stage 3 Ovarian Cancer which has recently spread to her Brain, The costs of Treatments, Medications, and other Expenses like Gas to and from her Oncologist and Specialists that are a 5 to 6 hour round trip several times a week all adds up very fast, plus we have had several other issues that have come up recently and were barley keeping afloat as it is. My Dad and I are also both disabled so the little income we do get is gone before we get it, with the costs of all of our Medical Bills, Medications, etc. were barley staying a float. Also after a Recent storm our bathroom ceiling fell in & revealed not only do we have to fix the ceiling, but also there is Black Mold to deal with as well. If you have the time, I will tell our full story below. If you can share this link it would be much appreciated, www.4Lynnette.com.

My name is Richard, most people call me Rich. I would like the take the time to tell the story of our Family but most of all about my Wonderful Mom. My Mom Lynnette has had it particularly hard from a very young age, at the age of 9 she was first diagnosed with Kidney Disease and between the ages of 9 and 14 she spent more time in the hospital then at home. In 1978 she required a Kidney Transplant, the Doctors thought it would be a pretty easy match as my Mom is a Twin, but unfortunately in 1982 the Kidney started to reject and she required a 2nd transplant, she received a Kidney from her Brother Rick (which I was named after) and after that transplant all looked well! Except for the fact that she was told her body would not take well to a pregnancy, so when my parents found out they were pregnant the Doctors immediately told her to have a abortion. When my Mom found out that I would have a 90+% survival rate she refused the abortion.........even though SHE only had a 15% survival rate, that is just the type of loving and selfless person my Mother is! Although it was not a perfect pregnancy, she pushed through it, giving birth to me in 1984. Even though her new Kidney was not rejecting, it didn't mean her life was easy. She basically has NO Immune System and was constantly battling sickness, and actually had several near fatal incidents.

Although her life was hard and she had to fight daily, she still did not show signs of weakness and always stayed strong for her Family, always putting us first. She worked a Full Time job and was our Families only income after 1989, because my Dad was in a horrible accident. While riding his bicycle to work, a car ran a red light and hit my Dad, breaking his Back, Neck, several other bones and also leaving him with a Closed Head Injury, after half a dozen surgeries my Dad was still disabled and unable to work. My Mom still always made sure he was taken care of after every surgery, even after working a 10 hour job. She always stayed strong and always showed us love and care!

In early 2000s my Mom was in a pretty bad car accident which left her with a lot of added problems she didn't deserve like back and knee problems, she was a Pharmacy Tech so her job required her to be on her feet for 8-10 hours everyday and it just got to a point where the pain was to much for her and she had to stop working. She ended up having a Knee Replacement and several procedures to try and help her back with little to no relief. She still put a smile on her face not to show the pain she was in on a daily basis.

Then on July 30th, 2005 I was in a life changing motorcycle accident. I was cut off on the expressway, I had to slam my brakes on and unfortunately in doing so, the brakes locked up and I ended up going over the windshield of my motorcycle at 80MPH. I tumbled, slide, bounced and flew nearly a football field in length, leaving over 50% of my body burned from road rash. Treating me as a full burn victim, I was hospitalized for weeks and my Mom & Dad were there by my side as often and as much as they could be, even though they were going through their own pain, they wanted to be there for me! Even after leaving the hospital I had to be home cared for nearly a year after the accident and my Mom volunteered to be my at home nurse and change my bandages, clean me, give me my medications and anything that needed to be done to someone bed ridden, and she never once complained, and ALWAYS smiling, loving and caring. Even though she HAD to be in so much pain herself, she never ever made me feel like a burden, that's just the kind-hearted wonderful person she is! I am now disabled with problems with my Back, Hip, Both Knees, and Permanent Nerve Damage to most of the left side of my Body, she was always there for me. AND I love her SO MUCH for that!

Our Extended Family always called us the THREE MUSKETEERS! The 3 of us all Disabled, but we all depended and counted on each other. All three of us have been through so much, But even though we have been through so much we always liked to try and do for others. My Dad helps every single year a Local Organization put on a Motorcycle Rally and together they help raise nearly $80,000 every year for Hospice. My Mom was always giving back by donating to the food drive and clothing donations, she hated seeing things that COULD be used to benefit someone just siting in a closet so why not donate them to someone who could use them! And I ran a small Organization called Kids Get Diggin' and I helped raise Cash Donations and Equipment Donations to help less fortunate children and Families get Metal Detecting Equipment to help get them Active and spend time with their Families but also find Historical Artifacts that helps them learn American History! So I feel like our Family should have enough Karma to be able to relax and live a nice normal life, right? Unfortunately Not!

In December 2012 my Mom was Diagnosed with Stage 3 Ovarian Cancer, at first the doctors had mixed feelings about what diagnosis it was because of my Moms previous health issues and Kidney Transplants, etc. They first thought it was Stomach Cancer, either-way our Family was devastated to hear that my Mom was diagnosed with any type of Cancer. After the Diagnosis was firmly Ovarian Cancer her Oncologist worked with her Kidney Doctors to work out a plan to rid my Mom of this horrible disease! They treated her with Khemo, and everything looked to be going the right way, the Tumors were shrinking, the treatments were working. The Doctor felt comfortable enough to perform surgery and remove what needed to be removed. Again after the surgery she continued with her Khemo and everything was looking good. A year has past by now and after months and months of her numbers going in the RIGHT directions, Doctors started seeing things out of the ordinary, just to make sure everything was still on track the Doctors decided to do a complete check up on everything.

The day is July 31st, 9 years to the day since being in my Motorcycle accident. The day is particularly rough on me, but July 31st, 2014 was completely different, July 31st, 2014 is the day we found out that not only does my Mom have Stage 3 Ovarian Cancer......my Mom has Brain Cancer. My Mom has Brain Cancer, just take a second and say those words out loud. The words that can bring a grown man to his knees in tears. I was in shock at first, not wanting to hear it or believe it, maybe it is just a nightmare and I will wake up any minute now. But unfortunately I was not and am not dreaming. My Mom and Dad are literally my best friends, and they have been amazingly strong throughout this whole process, they have kept me stable over the years but July 31, 2014 was a day I cried the day away.

After finding out my Moms Cancer has spread to her Brain, her Doctors had to work on a strategy on her next steps and it all happens very fast, she found out she had Brain Cancer on July 31st, she met with her Neurologist on August 4th and her Procedure was scheduled for August 19th. After running several tests to assess the situation, they found that she had 6 masses that all varied in sizes from barely visible all the way to 4-5mm. Leading up to the Procedure I could tell my Mom was getting very nervous (with good reason), and I felt so useless with not being able to do nothing but comfort her. The Procedure she had done was called a 'Gamma Knife' and although they do not actually cut anything, the Procedure is still very uncomfortable, they have to put this big rigid, metal framing around her head and have to screw it into her skull so it does not move around, they then place her into a machine where she is unable to move what so ever for a couple hours as they precisely place Radiation Beams in the specific spots in her head where the masses are located.

After going through all that she still could get side effects from the procedure that could occur hours or even days after the procedure! So she was scared and uneasy that whole night. Her head was hurting all that night and her eyes actually swelled up so much she could barely even see out of them! I couldn't even imagine what my Mom has had to go through over these past 2 years but the past 2 years don't even come close to the amount of stress, scared and unknowing look that I seen in my Moms eyes over the past Month.

The unfortunate thing is after going though all that, the Procedure did not go as well as the Doctors had hoped for, and although nothing went "wrong", it did not go "well" either, so they had to schedule ANOTHER Gamma Knife Procedure for September 3rd, and this time with my Mom knowing what she was going to have to go through, she was even MORE stress and uneasy! After finishing the 2nd Gamma Knife Procedure the Doctors seemed like the procedure went the way they wanted it to, but unfortunately they will not know if it was a partial or complete success for what could be up to two MONTHS. If after the 2 months are up and the Doctors do not see what they are wanting to see, her other options are nothing the Doctors nor my Mom are wanting, with one of the options being "Experimental" means that if my Mom has to go that route that her Insurance would not cover it.

I am sorry for the long message, but if you made it this far the story must have touched your heart, so I hope that you can take the time to say a prayer, if you dont pray just keep her in your thoughts. Also if you can pass this Campaign along, that also would be greatly appreciated. If you are able to donate even just a little it would mean a lot to us, every little bit help! If you make a donation and would like to show your support even more by wearing a support bracelet just let me know and I will have one in the mail ASAP for you to show your support that way too! Thanks again for taking the time to read our story,

My Mom has Brain Cancer, just take a second and say those words out loud. The words that can bring a grown man to his knees in tears. I was in shock at first, not wanting to hear it or believe it, maybe it is just a nightmare and I will wake up any minute now. But unfortunately I was not and am not dreaming. My Mom and Dad are literally my best friends, and they have been amazingly strong throughout this whole process, they have kept me stable over the years but July 31, 2014 was a day I cried the day away.After finding out my Moms Cancer has spread to her Brain, her Doctors had to work on a strategy on her next steps and it all happens very fast, she found out she had Brain Cancer on July 31st, she met with her Neurologist on August 4th and her Procedure was scheduled for August 19th. After running several tests to assess the situation, they found that she had 6 masses that all varied in sizes from barely visible all the way to 4-5mm. Leading up to the Procedure I could tell my Mom was getting very nervous (with good reason), and I felt so useless with not being able to do nothing but comfort her. The Procedure she had done was called a 'Gamma Knife' and although they do not actually cut anything, the Procedure is still very uncomfortable, they have to put this big rigid, metal framing around her head and have to screw it into her skull so it does not move around, they then place her into a machine where she is unable to move what so ever for a couple hours as they precisely place Radiation Beams in the specific spots in her head where the masses are located.After going through all that she still could get side effects from the procedure that could occur hours or even days after the procedure! So she was scared and uneasy that whole night. Her head was hurting all that night and her eyes actually swelled up so much she could barely even see out of them! I couldn't even imagine what my Mom has had to go through over these past 2 years but the past 2 years don't even come close to the amount of stress, scared and unknowing look that I seen in my Moms eyes over the past Month.The unfortunate thing is after going though all that, the Procedure did not go as well as the Doctors had hoped for, and although nothing went "wrong", it did not go "well" either, so they had to schedule ANOTHER Gamma Knife Procedure for September 3rd, and this time with my Mom knowing what she was going to have to go through, she was even MORE stress and uneasy! After finishing the 2nd Gamma Knife Procedure the Doctors seemed like the procedure went the way they wanted it to, but unfortunately they will not know if it was a partial or complete success for what could be up to two MONTHS. If after the 2 months are up and the Doctors do not see what they are wanting to see, her other options are nothing the Doctors nor my Mom are wanting, with one of the options being "Experimental" means that if my Mom has to go that route that her Insurance would not cover it.I am sorry for the long message, but if you made it this far the story must have touched your heart, so I hope that you can take the time to say a prayer, if you dont pray just keep her in your thoughts. Also if you can pass this Campaign along, that also would be greatly appreciated. If you are able to donate even just a little it would mean a lot to us, every little bit help! If you make a donation and would like to show your support even more by wearing a support bracelet just let me know and I will have one in the mail ASAP for you to show your support that way too! Thanks again for taking the time to read our story,

story:
I will be traveling to Honduras over spring break 2015 with the University of Arizona's Global Medical Brigades chapter. Any donation for my upcoming trip would be amazing! Even a donation of advice would be extremely appreciated to someone who has never traveled to another country without her family.

Global Brigades is the world’s largest student-led global health and sustainable development organization. Since 2004, Global Brigades has mobilized tens of thousands of university students and professionals through skill-based programs that work in partnership with community members to improve quality of life in under resourced regions while respecting local culture.

Our Vision 
To improve equality of life by igniting the largest student-led social responsibility movement on the planet.

Our Mission 
To empower volunteers and under-resourced communities to resolve global health and economic disparities and inspire all involved to collaboratively work towards an equal world.

story:
Do you know how much water is enough for your kids? Gululu personalizes and sets goals based on your child’s age, weight, and location. Water intake data is automatically synced to the cloud through WiFi, letting you easily track your child’s water intake through the app.



 “Shake! Shake! – Be my friend!”

Shake two nearby Gululu bottles to make friends, then watch the pets play together. Kids can compare their hydration progress and habit scores, and parents can get a glimpse of their children's social circle.


Gululu is equipped with multiple embedded sensors that work together to not only measure water intake, but also to detect whether your child is drinking water, or pouring it out. The pets thrive in and explore the Gululu Universe as your child drinks more water. 


 “Kids will never get bored”

As our team of developers iterates the game to include more treasures, levels, characters and perhaps surprises, the bottle automatically updates, keeping your child engaged in fresh and exciting new challenges.

We carefully designed our bottle for the care-free little ones.  We took care of the details so that they can focus on being curious.  


Kids are quite active and careless sometimes. So we covered the bottle using a durable, eraser-like material to offer better grip and drop protection.


We thought it was really annoying have unreachable spots in our bottle. So we made ours with detachable spout so that you can easily clean or replace them.


No exposed metal, no plugs to plug.  Our bottle features a wireless charging cradle. So that all you have to do is drop it in the dock and watch the charging fish recharge itself. 


Drops happen.  Just pick it up and keep going.  Our bottle is covered in shock absorbing material to withstand drops up to 1 meter.  


Take Gululu for a wash! It is certified IP67 dust and water proof.  Meaning that it can be submerged in water within 1 meter for up to 30 minutes.   



Interaction with pets

Touching or shaking the bottle causes the virtual pet to react by laughing, leaping, and playing. Pets grow and evolve over time, and kids develop a connection to their animated pets. 



We define Gululu as a child-centric product, so working closely with the kids is a must! After a long time in the research and testing phase, Gululu has launched the pilot user program. We gathered pilot users from USA, UK and countries all around the world, and initialed the first Gululu community!

“This is a dream come true for me (and my daughter). It both allows me to monitor her water intake, even when she is away from me, at school, and it will help motivate her to remember to actually drink her water, plus it's made for kids, so durable!”  -Lisa
 "The 8 year old boy loved setting it up and bringing it to school!" -Michelle



"I wanted to tell you that my son loves his bottle. He won’t let it out of his sight!  He loves Ninji and the sword makes him laugh so loudly. " -Eva
"To make a comparison, wearable fitness trackers generally offer limited functionality as a stand alone device. Although additional information may be available through an app, the product can be used straight out of the box. " -Eric



In late 2014, Bowhead Technology was founded with a mission to improve children’s well-being through the use of IoT, smart technology, software and compelling digital content. We're a team consisting of senior experts in design, engineering, marketing and business development, with professional backgrounds in IDEO, HP, Intel, EA Popcap and world-class multinational corporations. We have also developed a partnership with a first-tier manufacturer and a Hollywood animated studio in order to generate a high quality product and experience.


If you have questions at any time, during the campaign or after it has closed, please reach out to us at customer-service@bowhead-tech.com
Or share your Gululove on facebook!



Are you shipping internationally?

Yes, we are shipping internationally. Please keep in mind that you will be responsible for any customs fees, duties, import taxes, special delivery fees administered by your government. These are not included in product price and shipping fee, and we are unable to estimate those fees for you.

How does Gululu connect to my app?

The Gululu Interactive Bottle connects to the connected app via Wi-Fi.

Is the App free?

Yes, the app is totally free. However, you will need a bottle to connect to the App to serve the whole purpose.

Does the App work for Android and iPhone?

Yes, the app will work for both Android and iPhone.

Is the App ready for download?

When you receive your bottle, you will be able to download the Gululu App from both Apple Store and Google Play.

How is the Gululu bottle charged?

The Gululu Interactive Bottle can be charged wirelessly via Wi-Fi once the bottle is placed on the charging dock. Six hours of charging provides two to three days of ordinary use or four to five days of standby

Is it dishwasher/freezer/microwave safe?

As we have an electronic screen and components, it is not recommended to put the Gululu Interactive Bottle into dishwater, freezer, or microwave, as this may cause injury or permanent damage to the bottle’s functionalities.

Is the bottle BPA Free?

Of course! The Gululu Interactive Bottle is 100% BPA FREE and complies with U.S. FDA standards (excluding the wireless charging dock).

Is there a straw?

No, the Gululu Interactive Bottle does not use a straw but has a spout specially designed for kids.

How do the touch sensor panels work?

Children can navigate between menu options and interact with other Gululu users by sliding their palms along the touch sensor areas on the side of the bottle.

Does Gululu have a touch screen?

No, the screen is not a touch screen as a touch screen cannot work well with water. However, there are touch sensor panles on the side of bottle, and motion sensors embedded inside the bottle that give similar functionality to a touch screen.

When will my Gululu bottle be shipped?

We’re mass production ready for hardware and currently running a pilot user program for us to fine-tune our software and app. We ship the product in batches. We close our shipment orders on the 8th (12am PST) of every month, and will ship them within the next month. For example, if you order on September 8th, we will deliver the product to you in October, and so on. 

We hope to start shipping Gululu to some of the backers right after the campaign period. We’ll keep you updated regarding our project milestones on Kickstarter/Facebook/Twitter and through newsletters.

Can you ship to different countries?

We will ship Gululu Interactive Bottles worldwide, with the exception of Republic of South Sudan, Netherlands Antilles, Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands, American Samoa, Niue, Wallis and Futuna, Pitcairn Islands, Fiji, Saint Helena, Réunion, Western Sahara, Sao Tome and Principe, Archipelago of the Azores, Madeira, Faroe Islands, Eritrea and Saint Vincent and the Grenadines. Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees, and taxes applicable in your region.

How long is the warranty?

A limited one-year repair warranty is given for defective or damaged products.

Advanced sensors in the hardware, together with reward-based game design and social software, let you care for their virtual pet and make new friends. Automatic software update continues to push add-on digital content and makes the Gululu Universe ever expanding to enable a healthy habit.












Share our Indiegogo page and get our special gifts: Gululu coloring pages! In order to share and get your free coloring pages, follow the steps below and click on the buttons

story:
After the 7.9 magnitude earthquake hit Nepal on April 25 2015, rural villages bordering Kavre and Bhaktapur Districts have been completely decimated. Approximately 500 homes have either been destroyed or uninhabitable from villages including Sanga (42), Kakrabaari (350), Khalchowk (400), Gyasingtar (48), Ashapuri (28), Falasey (32). The villages, mainly from Tamang, Magar or Gurung communities have  lost along with their belongings, their sources of income. With growing casualties and pending monsoon- the next biggest threat is of landslides, spreading of diseases and further damage of farms. 

About 500 households are now close to being completely homeless. Although incredibly resilient, they need help to make sure they are able to survive through the monsoon. We are on our third day and so far they have received no help.

We are currently focusing on making sure that the community has most urgent supplies, please donate to this fund so we can mobilize our efforts immediately.

We will be obtaining most of our tents from Abari - http://abari.org where Architect Nripal Adhikary is building canvas tents: http://www.gofundme.com/tentsfornepal


How can you support?

Donate: Rabindra Puri, who is an award-winning conservation architect from Bhaktapur, has a foundation which will take all the funds that are raised. These funds will be used to buy emergency supplies in these rural regions of Kavre district (except the cut from indiegogo for their fees). 

Volunteer: If you are going to Nepal or already are in Nepal, please contact Rajeev Goyal at 9804091703 to begin helping with the setting up of tents and distribution.

Supplier: If you are a supplier and are looking to connect to a community in need, please contact Rajeev at 9804091703.

Aid agency: Please connect to these communities and begin your needs assessment. 


About Us:

Along with the farming community of Kavre District, this relief effort will be organized voluntarily by Rajeev Goyal, a former Peace Corps volunteer along with Architect Rabindra Puri, a world renowned conservation architect from Bhaktapur District.


Photo Courtesy: Bhushan Shilpakar

As Rajeev is without internet or a smartphone- we are not able to get photos from the field- but will update as soon as possible. 

Thank you for your support.

story:
Are you tired of losing your pet, your keys, your wallet or even your phone ?


The average person spends 1h30 each month looking for misplaced items or pets. If you’re tired and frustrated of wasting your time, Wistiki is the solution ! 

 


INTRODUCING OUR
 3 CONNECTED JEWELS

Each jewel is a small connected device that you can attach to anything you do not want to lose anymore. 

Wistiki and the famous creator Philippe Starck designed 3 different shapes so you can choose your favorite Wistiki!


SUGGESTED USE CASES 



PREMIUM TRACKING DEVICES, DESIGNED BY STARCK

Philippe Starck has selected four trendy colors so you can personalize your tracker. Choose in between the 4 available colors yellow, blue, orange and pink and give any item the french designer’s touch.


WATCH AND CHECK OUT OUR NICE DESIGN

      


Experience the joy of quickly finding what you need by making Wistiki ring or locating it from your smartphone. 


SEEN ON



                WISTIKI FEATURES

GPS Locator: Locate the item you have lost anywhere in the world on the Wistiki app map using its most recent GPS coordinates. The app records the last time that you were close to your Wistiki. Afterwards the crowd GPS takes over. Each person who has the Wistiki smartphone app, anonymously updates the GPS data of all lost Wistiki around.


Ringtone and hot/cold Radar : You’re desperately looking for your remote because your favorite TV show is starting in a minute ? Save time and find it quickly by making it ring and locate it under your sofa cushions. 


Reverse Ringtone : If you have lost your smartphone ... make it ring by pressing the button on your Wistiki. Imagine you’re in a morning rush and you’ve got your keys but can’t find your phone, well we have a solution either way !


Virtual Leash : You can activate the electronic leash mode in order to be alerted when your item is moving away from your Smartphone. Put a Wistiki onto your bike parked in front of your house ; if someone takes it away you’ll get a warning.

Note: The Wistiki app is free, without subscription.


UNIQUE TECHNICAL SPECS

OUR STORY

We are three brothers and co-founders of Wistiki. At the very beginning, 

we wanted to find a cool way to locate our cat « Minou » in order to find him when playing hide and seek at dinner time at home.


About 2 years ago Wistiki’s first tracker was launched in France. 

We sold many of them, and it proved that French people lose their things a lot !

Seems like French people are very distracted, but what about the rest of the world ?

Strenghtened by three years of intensive R&D and a team of 25 players we are back on Indiegogo giving you the chance to pre-order our brand new innovation, specifically designed for distracted people looking for reliable, affordable yet fashionable accessories to support them finding their lost items from their smartphone.

BE AMONG THE FIRST TO RECEIVE THE BEAUTIFUL "WISTIKI BY STARCK" COLLECTION AT PREFERRED PRICING !


 

CONNECTING LIVES WITH NEW HOPE

We are three brothers and co-founders of Wistiki. Our childhood was filled with joy and happiness, and we are grateful for this. Not only are we here to help tackle the small things, but the big things too. While we are conscious that people get over losing their small belongings, we want to serve a bigger cause and help those who are in need of more significant things, things you cannot get back with a tracker such as a lost home, a lost hope or a lost parent. In line with this we will create the « Wistiki Foundation » partnering with charity organizations. This year Wistiki plans to donate 25% of its 2015 (operating year from March ’15 to March ’16) net profits to international children’s organizations.

THE WISTIKI TEAM SAYS 'THANK YOU' FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

FAQ

Can I share my Wistiki with other people?
Yes. You can share any Wistiki with as many people as you want.

Can I use multiple phones with my Wistiki?
Yes. The app is free and you can access your app account on multiple phones.

How many Wistiki can one smartphone control?
You can control unlimited Wistiki devices with your Wistiki App.

How long does Wistiki battery last?
Wistiki lasts up to 3 year running on a single battery.

Is Wistiki waterproof?
Yes.

What is the range of Wistiki ?
You can Scan & Beep a Wistiki up to 330feet (100) in line of sight. This distance can be shorter depending on the environment. But because every Wistiki you own connects you to the vast Wistiki network, you can virtually track it anywhere. Anytime another user passes by your Wistiki, they will update its position.

How durable is Wistiki?
Wistiki is very robust, built to handle all kind of shock and impact.

Is the Android and iPhone App free?
Yes. It's absolutely free and there are no additional charges whatsoever.

What kind of battery does Wistiki use?
Wistiki uses a common CR2032 watch battery.

What mobile devices are compatible with the Wistiki App?
iOS devices with Bluetooth 4.0 and running 8.0 or above, and Android devices with Bluetooth 4.0 and running Android 4.3 or above. We test and guarantee compatibility with iPhone 4S, 5, 5S, 5C, 5S, 6, 6+, 6S, 6S+; iPad Mini, iPad 3rd and 4th Gen; iPod Touch 5th Gen; Samsung Galaxy S3, S4, S5, S6, S6Edge, S6Edge+, Note3, Note4; Google Nexus 5, 6; LG G2, G3; HTC One; Sony Xperia Z2, Z3; Moto X.

How does it connect to my phone?
Wistiki connects to your smartphone via Bluetooth Low Energy.

Can other Wistiki users scan and track my Wistiki?
No. Unless you explicitly decide to share access to your Wistiki, or publicly report them as lost, only you can see where they are.

Do other Wistiki users know when I pass by their Wistiki?
No. No user in the Wistiki network will know when he or she passes by your Wistiki, and neither will you know when you pass by theirs (unless they explicitly share or report their Wistiki as lost).

What countries will you ship to?
All of them. We’ll ship Wistiki worldwide.

How much does shipping cost? 

Shipping is free worldwide and on all orders.

When will I choose my color
Once the product will ship you will receive an email asking for your color preference!

                WISTIKI FEATURES



GPS Locator: Locate the item you have lost anywhere in the world on the Wistiki app map using its most recent GPS coordinates. The app records the last time that you were close to your Wistiki. Afterwards the crowd GPS takes over. Each person who has the Wistiki smartphone app, anonymously updates the GPS data of all lost Wistiki around.



Ringtone and hot/cold Radar : You’re desperately looking for your remote because your favorite TV show is starting in a minute ? Save time and find it quickly by making it ring and locate it under your sofa cushions. 



Reverse Ringtone : If you have lost your smartphone ... make it ring by pressing the button on your Wistiki. Imagine you’re in a morning rush and you’ve got your keys but can’t find your phone, well we have a solution either way !


Virtual Leash : You can activate the electronic leash mode in order to be alerted when your item is moving away from your Smartphone. Put a Wistiki onto your bike parked in front of your house ; if someone takes it away you’ll get a warning.


Note: The Wistiki app is free, without
subscription.






UNIQUE TECHNICAL
SPECS




OUR STORY



We
are three brothers and co-founders of Wistiki. At the very beginning, 
we
wanted to find a cool way to locate our cat « Minou » in order to
find him when playing hide and seek at dinner time at home.





About 2 years ago Wistiki’s first tracker was launched in France. 
We
sold many of them, and it proved that French people lose their things a
lot !

Seems
like French people are very distracted, but what about the rest of the
world ?
Strenghtened by three years of
intensive R&D and a team of 25 players we are back
on Indiegogo giving you the chance to pre-order our brand new
innovation, specifically designed for distracted people looking for
reliable, affordable yet fashionable accessories to support them finding their lost
items from their smartphone.





BE AMONG THE FIRST TO RECEIVE THE BEAUTIFUL
"WISTIKI BY STARCK" COLLECTION AT PREFERRED PRICING !

 

CONNECTING LIVES WITH NEW HOPE

We are three brothers and co-founders of Wistiki. Our childhood was filled with joy and happiness, and we are grateful for this. Not only are we here to help tackle the small things, but the big things too. While we are conscious that people get over losing their small belongings, we want to serve a bigger cause and help those who are in need of more significant things, things you cannot get back with a tracker such as a lost home, a lost hope or a lost parent. In line with this we will create the « Wistiki Foundation » partnering with charity organizations. This year Wistiki plans to donate 25% of its 2015 (operating year from March ’15 to March ’16) net profits to international children’s organizations.


THE WISTIKI TEAM SAYS 'THANK YOU' FOR YOUR SUPPORT!










FAQ
Can I share my Wistiki with other people?Yes. You can share any Wistiki with as many people as you want.
Can I use multiple phones with my Wistiki?Yes. The app is free and you can access your app account on multiple phones.
How many Wistiki can one smartphone control?You can control unlimited Wistiki devices with your Wistiki App.
How long does Wistiki battery last?Wistiki lasts up to 3 year running on a single battery.
Is Wistiki waterproof?Yes.
What is the range of Wistiki ?You can Scan & Beep a Wistiki up to 330feet (100) in line of sight. This distance can be shorter depending on the environment. But because every Wistiki you own connects you to the vast Wistiki network, you can virtually track it anywhere. Anytime another user passes by your Wistiki, they will update its position.
How durable is Wistiki?Wistiki is very robust, built to handle all kind of shock and impact.
Is the Android and iPhone App free?Yes. It's absolutely free and there are no additional charges whatsoever.
What kind of battery does Wistiki use?Wistiki uses a common CR2032 watch battery.
What mobile devices are compatible with the Wistiki App?iOS devices with Bluetooth 4.0 and running 8.0 or above, and Android devices with Bluetooth 4.0 and running Android 4.3 or above. We test and guarantee compatibility with iPhone 4S, 5, 5S, 5C, 5S, 6, 6+, 6S, 6S+; iPad Mini, iPad 3rd and 4th Gen; iPod Touch 5th Gen; Samsung Galaxy S3, S4, S5, S6, S6Edge, S6Edge+, Note3, Note4; Google Nexus 5, 6; LG G2, G3; HTC One; Sony Xperia Z2, Z3; Moto X.
How does it connect to my phone?Wistiki connects to your smartphone via Bluetooth Low Energy.
Can other Wistiki users scan and track my Wistiki?No. Unless you explicitly decide to share access to your Wistiki, or publicly report them as lost, only you can see where they are.
Do other Wistiki users know when I pass by their Wistiki?No. No user in the Wistiki network will know when he or she passes by your Wistiki, and neither will you know when you pass by theirs (unless they explicitly share or report their Wistiki as lost).
What countries will you ship to?All of them. We’ll ship Wistiki worldwide.
How much does shipping cost? 
Shipping is
free worldwide and on all orders.
When will I choose my colorOnce the product will ship you will receive an email asking for your color preference!

story: About ila: the sacred essence of ila is echoed through age-old beauty rituals and divine smells chosen to promote biological change and harnessed from an incredibly rare level of organic purity. Renowned for their earth-to-skin ethical, environmental and sustainable practices, ila directly source wild harvested ingredients each chosen for an ability to nourish the heart. Few other brands work at such a profound level. Every cream, oil, scrub, mask, candle and fragrance is created using minimal processing and is hand blended in a meditative atmosphere in the British countryside. Infused with meaning, blessed with positive intentions, ila’s products and treatments have long been used in high end spas worldwide as well as in everyday bathrooms around the globe.

story:
Kurzbeschreibung

http://www.schwaebische.de/region_artikel,-Der-...

Es soll Tuttlingens erster Stocherkahn angeschafft werden, den ich pflege, betreue und gerne auch fahre, sofern ich natürlich da bin. Das heist ich möchte mit eurer Hilfe der erste "Gondoliere" von Tuttlingen sein und diese "Boote" zur Vergnügung auf der Donau etablieren. An Bord kann gesessen, gegrillt, gechillt, gesonnt und getrunken werden. Wer schon einmal in Tübingen auf dem Neckar unterwegs war weis wie toll das sein kann. Auch ein Winterlager stelle ich nahe der Donau zur Verfügung. Sollte diese Idee viele "Tuttlinger" Unterstützer finden, würde ich mich freuen und könnte mir vorstellen das ganze auch auszuweiten und bei Erfolg noch mehrere Kähne anzuschaffen die dann von uns "Tuttlingern" genutzt werden.

Was du uns gibst & was du bekommst

Ziel ist die Anschaffung des ersten Stocherkahn Tuttlingens und entsprechender Ausrüstung. Der Kahn soll 16 Plätze haben. Sollte diese Kampagne erfolgreich  sein, werde ich den Kahn bei dem Bootsbauer Rudolph Raidt aus Tübingen in Auftrag geben. 
http://www.stocherkahnbau.de/index.html

Die Bauzeit liegt letzten Angaben zur folge bei ca. 3 Monate

Ihr und Ich werdet dann mit dem Kahn auf der Donau, vom Golem bis zum Koppenland unterwegs sein können, ich zeig euch gerne wie's geht und dann kann's los gehen. Es soll ein Kahn für Tuttlingen sein der von allen benutzt werden kann und soll.

Risiken & Herausforderungen

Ich hoffe nicht das dies ein Risiko ist aber es muss an der Stelle angesprochen werden. Es besteht das Risiko das Stadt, Behörden, Land oder EU natürlich nicht mitspielen, was ich nicht hoffe, und dem Vorhaben einen Strich durch die Rechnung machen. Ich werde aber alles in meiner macht stehende versuchen das es hier zu einer Einigung kommt.

Die Kampagne kann Plattform bedingt nur 60 Tage laufen, sollte es in dieser Zeit nicht möglich sein den Betrag zu erreichen, ist zu überlegen ob diese Kampagne nochmals aufgesetzt wird um den Restbetrag zu Sammeln. Das würde ich aber von der Beteiligung der bisherigen Unterstützer abhängig machen, welchen man jetzt schon mal einen herzlichen Dank aussprechen muss!

Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann

Wenn der Kahn angeschafft ist, brauche ich natürlich auch Helfer die den Kahn über die Donau bewegen, ihn hegen und pflegen, wenn ich dies nicht kann. Gerne zeig ich euch wie's geht ;-)

story: Losing your breasts is already hard enough. To still be left after everything, without a tangible nipple, can be extremely hard to accept. In the USA alone, 2.8 MILLION women have had to experience the tragedy of breast cancer.Through your funding of this project I will be able to personally give women this service for free. Your donation will pay me, and I will in turn be free to do these on every woman that desires this life changing product. My hope is that, also through your funding I can continue to move on to the next stage of my vision which is expanding the team of people who I have trained and given access to my product so that women all over the world can be getting this done without having to gather at one location. To be able to spread this out would impact more women per day which is what we all want. Costs have been carefully calculated. Raising money for staff and medical experts, medical representatives, supplies, travel, increase production, raise awareness, etc. Out of all of different funding causes I haven't seen one more life changing or worthy of help. The real impact on lives can be felt inside your heart. Please support this worthy cause. Thank you.

story: I am starting this fundraiser for my wife because she had an emergency surgery done and it was unexpected. We are newly weds of just four weeks and we lost someone very close to us just two weeks ago. With everything that has happened within a short period of time and lack of income we are needing help. We were in the emergency room for twelve hours and they finally told us that she was going to have surgery done on her three hours later. With no time to contact our love ones, they went ahead with the surgery. We have tried our families, getting some kind of medical aid, and even working our jobs its still not enough. We need help with paying for transportation, the emergency surgery, all the medications that she will have to have and any follow up appointments. Please help us.

story:
About The Get Him Out of His Skin Project
My name is Steven Farmer and I'm a fitness professional that has been training Randy Gill for a little over a year. Within that time he has lost 130lbs and 16% Body Fat.


This is important to me because it's important to Randy. This all he lives for. Randy was on the verge of serious health problems, almost being fired for his heavy breathing, had trouble sleeping, heart palpatations., and even had a hunch on his back. Now he's in tremendous shape, and he only cares about working out. I'd like him to finally be able to reach his goals so he can focus on the other areas of his life. No one deserves this more than Randy
Randy will go from being almost 500lbs to having a 6 pack. Randy will be able to become a personal trainer, working in the field he loves. Randy will finally be able to walk around without a shirt and not be self-conscious. Randy will meet more girls(sounds shallow but you know it's true), more opportunites in life, and show that no matter where you started you can achieve your goals.

Donations Are Tax Deductible!

What We Need & How We Would Like To Thank You For Your Support
We need $9,000 and we'll update you on the progress. I'll even post videos of Randy's workouts as well. With enough contribution I"ll even help you with your fitness progress.


We need $9,000 and it will all go towards Randy's skin reduction surgery. Removing excess tissue from his midsection as well as give him a pectoral lift.


I'll send you a free nutrition guide, and a shout out on my weekly videos.


I'll give you that, and a free email consultation.


I'll give you that, and a free phone consultation.


I'll give you that for a month.


This project will show that no matter who you are and where you're starting, you can achieve it. Randy will prove that you can go from morbidly obese to a chiseled athlete in less than two years.
It will still go towards the surgery.


Urgent Help Needed Now

While we know you know this project is worthy of support all on its own, 

The Impact
You'll feel the impact as you see the before and after photos, updates on Randy's success, and a special thank you video from us.


PLEASE CONSIDER SUPPORTING THIS IMPORTANT PROJECT!

Other Ways You Can Help
I've got Randy this far, there's no way I'm stopping now. I want to take him to the furthest point.
Make it real for people and build trust.
No reason to not trust me. Not only am I Randy's trainer, mentor, and friend. This is also great marketing for me. So trust me, the money will be used for his surgery.


Other Ways You Can Help


You can also help him by sending him encourgaging things and friending him on facebook to let him know how much of an impact he's made on you. He doesn't feel worthy of this amount of attention so let him know he is.
Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
Please forward this to all your friends and family and coworkers. I'd like this to happen quickly to prove the power of inspiring others.

Don't forget to use the Indigogo share tools to let others know about it.

If you cannot donate right now, PLEASE help by posting links to this campaign  in as many places as possible! I really appreciate this and know we can go all the way. I've already raised around $1000 with a local fundraiser, now all we need is $9000 more from all you good people around the world. Please show Randy that dreams are not impossible when ask for help from others.

indiegogo.com/GetHimOutofHisSkin
